        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         🌟 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐭𝐨𝐩 𝟏𝟎 𝐨𝐟𝐟𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐬𝐨𝐟𝐭𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐝𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟒! 🌟
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Looking to leverage global talent and innovative solutions for your next big project? Our latest guide highlights the most trusted and skilled offshore software development companies that can help you achieve your business goals efficiently and cost-effectively. From custom software development to digital transformation, these companies offer a wide range of services to cater to your specific needs.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝙀𝙭𝙥𝙡𝙤𝙧𝙚 𝙤𝙪𝙧 𝙩𝙤𝙥 𝙥𝙞𝙘𝙠𝙨 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙛𝙞𝙣𝙙 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙥𝙚𝙧𝙛𝙚𝙘𝙩 𝙥𝙖𝙧𝙩𝙣𝙚𝙧 𝙛𝙤𝙧 𝙮𝙤𝙪𝙧 𝙨𝙤𝙛𝙩𝙬𝙖𝙧𝙚 𝙙𝙚𝙫𝙚𝙡𝙤𝙥𝙢𝙚𝙣𝙩 𝙟𝙤𝙪𝙧𝙣𝙚𝙮!

    <div class="update-components-article--with-large-image">
     <div class="update-components-article__link-container">
      <a aria-label="Open article: The Complete Guide to Offshore Software Development &amp; Why it's the Future by SiliconNexus • 3 min read" class="app-aware-link update-components-article__image-link tap-target" data-test-app-aware-link="" href="https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/complete-guide-offshore-software-development-why-its-future--1e?trackingId=kPvKCSdSRq%2BHNo3UU36iKA%3D%3D" target="_self">
       <div class="ivm-image-view-model">
        <div class="ivm-view-attr__img-wrapper">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Looking to develop custom software for your business? Do you think hiring one programmer is a cost-effective way to meet your software development needs?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Wait.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         You can’t expect one programmer to wear six hats!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Hiring a programmer is just one part of a software project, and even good programmers can’t be adept at all tasks. Thus, it’s not just a programmer but a team of professionals, including a project manager, system architect, software developers, and software testers that you need in order to complete a software development project successfully.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         But, hiring an in-house team to help you accomplish your software goals will be costly. Then, what’s the solution?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Partnering with an offshore software development company is the way to go.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/ditstek-florida/">
          Ditstek Florida
         </a>
         is a reliable custom onshore/offshore software development partner serving global software outsourcing needs across diverse industry verticals.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Whether you want to build custom software, or web apps, update your legacy system, or ensure QA requirements, we work as your dedicated team to help you achieve your goals.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         You can visit
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://lnkd.in/gWPTEU-V" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/gWPTEU-V
         </a>
         to learn more about our services.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Or, drop a mail at
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="mailto:andrew.adrian@ditstek.com" target="_self">
          andrew.adrian@ditstek.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         .
         <br/>
         .
         <br/>
         .
         <br/>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Offshore tech staffing is becoming increasingly popular for startups and tech companies looking to hire specialized talent without having to expand an in-house software development team. Offshore staff augmentation offers a range of benefits such as significant cost savings, access to top global talent, and much more flexibility.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         However, it’s important to understand the legal aspects when working with offshore employees so that you remain compliant with local laws and regulations of the countries you are operating in. Our latest and greatest article discusses all the key legal factors to consider when hiring tech offshore talents for your startup or tech company.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoretechstaffing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7131072896810020864">
          #Offshoretechstaffing
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=startups&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7131072896810020864">
          #startups
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=inhouse&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7131072896810020864">
          #inhouse
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopmentteam&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7131072896810020864">
          #softwaredevelopmentteam
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoreemployees&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7131072896810020864">
          #offshoreemployees
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=legal&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7131072896810020864">
          #legal
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:412.71875px" type="button">

<div class="feed-shared-update-v2 feed-shared-update-v2--minimal-padding full-height relative feed-shared-update-v2--wrapped" data-urn="urn:li:activity:7207732343304773632" id="ember874" role="region">
 <div>
  <div role="status">
   <!-- -->
  </div>
  <h2 class="visually-hidden">
   Feed post
  </h2>
  <div id="fie-impression-container">
   <!-- -->
   <div class="relative">
    <div class="update-components-actor display-flex update-components-actor--with-control-menu">
     <!-- -->
     <div class="update-components-actor__container display-flex flex-grow-1">
      <a aria-label="Sumit Singh, graphic." class="app-aware-link update-components-actor__image relative" data-test-app-aware-link="" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/sumit-singh-a87abb176?miniProfileUrn=urn%3Ali%3Afs_miniProfile%3AACoAACnPY0cB5k1yrhvJ1G-t-u5Uqkd3rtUNFk8" target="_self">
       <span class="js-update-components-actor__avatar">
        <div class="ivm-image-view-model update-components-actor__avatar">
         <div class="ivm-view-attr__img-wrapper">
          <!-- -->
          <!-- -->
          <img alt="Sumit Singh" class="ivm-view-attr__img--centered EntityPhoto-circle-3 update-components-actor__avatar-image evi-image lazy-image ember-view" height="48" id="ember875" loading="lazy" src="https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D03AQFrdOtTyQTaDw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0/1692346744398?e=1725494400&amp;v=beta&amp;t=WLDrbcjlAfoLGy-MgTrvogQLnE_GzRJwJNCYFsWhhJc" width="48"/>
         </div>
        </div>
       </span>
      </a>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--2-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Are you looking to accelerate your software development process and reduce costs? You might want to consider offshore software development. 🌐
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Offshore software development can offer incredible benefits for businesses. One of the most significant being cost-effectiveness. By outsourcing, you have the opportunity to tap into a pool of global tech talent without the high overhead costs associated with in-house development teams.💰
         <br/>
         <br/>
         It's not just about cutting costs though, it's also about quality. Offshore developers bring diverse experiences and fresh perspectives to your projects, often resulting in innovative solutions that can give your business a competitive edge. 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The continuous availability of developers in different time zones can also mean faster turnaround times, helping your business stay agile and responsive in today's fast-paced market.⏱️
         <br/>
         <br/>
         However, it's crucial to choose the right offshore development team. Prioritize communication skills, technical expertise, and a compatible company culture to ensure success.👩‍💻
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What's stopping you from considering offshore software development? Please share your thoughts or concerns.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207732343304773632">
          #OffshoreDevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207732343304773632">
          #SoftwareDevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=businessstrategy&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207732343304773632">
          #BusinessStrategy
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=beesolver&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207732343304773632">
          #Beesolver
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=beesolvertechnology&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207732343304773632">
          #BeesolverTechnology
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Our latest article delves into how industry leaders like Microsoft, Accenture, and HSBC have successfully navigated these challenges, offering valuable insights for companies looking to leverage offshore development.
         <br/>
         From addressing data privacy regulations like GDPR to protecting intellectual property and ensuring regulatory compliance in highly regulated industries, we explore the strategies and best practices that have enabled these companies to thrive in the global development landscape.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Discover how prioritizing data privacy and security, implementing robust IP protection measures, staying ahead of regulatory requirements, fostering a culture of compliance, and leveraging technology can help your company navigate the legal and compliance landscape of offshore development.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Whether you're in tech, finance, or any other industry, these real-world lessons provide a roadmap for successful, compliant offshore software development. Join us as we unpack these crucial considerations and explore how Nextway Technology can help you build innovative, compliant software solutions that drive your business forward.
         <br/>
         <br/>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Looking to Partner with an Outsourcing Company for an Offshore Development Centre? Look no further!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         At
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/ivalueplus-services-pvt-ltd/">
          iValuePlus Services Pvt. Ltd.
         </a>
         , we are your reliable and experienced software development partner. Our dedicated ODC team is committed to delivering innovative and scalable solutions that meet your business objectives.
         <br/>
         Click here to know more:
         <a data-attribute-index="15" href="https://lnkd.in/d5BXETQa" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/d5BXETQa
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Ready to take your software development to the next level? Let's connect and discuss how we can help you succeed.
         <br/>
         <br/>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hello,
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Amazing Opportunity at Alvi Software Pvt Ltd !
         <br/>
         Come and join our amazing team!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are looking for result-driven
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=dotnetdevelopers&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7098229412101304320">
          #dotnetdevelopers
         </a>
         to join our awesome team!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Type : Full-time
         <br/>

      <button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Open control menu for post by Lordly Raye Flores" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember992" tabindex="0" type="button">

      <div aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Control Menu Options" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember993" tabindex="-1">

   <!-- -->
   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        Hello, I run an outstaffing business.
        <br/>
        We specialize in outstaffing offshore software developers to US companies and have established a strong system for navigating US labor laws, regulations, and tax requirements.
        <br/>
        However, we continue to face unique challenges related to cultural and language barriers, which is why we are looking to hire a dedicated communicator to participate in client interviews and meetings on behalf of our developers.
        <br/>
        This will increase the likelihood of passing job interviews and ensure smooth communication while allowing our developers to focus on development.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We are looking for someone who:
        <br/>
        • Is a native or fluent English speaker
        <br/>
        • Has 5 years of experience in software development (React, React Native, Angular, Vue, Node, JavaScript, TypeScript, Next, AWS, GraphQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL etc)
        <br/>
        • Possesses excellent communication skills and experience in client-facing roles
        <br/>
        • Is willing to support our company for at least 6 months once started (the longer, the better)
        <br/>
        • Is comfortable impersonating our developers during video interviews including introductory, technical, and cultural interviews with clients
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We will pay you based on an hourly, weekly, or monthly salary. (flexible )
        <br/>
        We offer bonus points or increasing salary for good progress during interviews or when things are going well.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Thank you for considering this opportunity, and we look forward to hearing from you!
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:392.6875px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more
      </span>

   <div class="update-v2-social-activity" id="ember994">

     <div class="display-flex flex-grow-1">
      <div class="relative full-width">
       <ul class="display-flex">

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         In the intricate world of software development, choosing an offshore outsourcing company that meets all your requirements can be a complex decision. You need a trusted partner who can understand your vision, uphold quality standards and is easy to communicate with. Beesolver Technology ticks all these boxes!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         With our strong technical expertise, Beesolver Technology has consistently provided robust and scalable solutions to meet the diverse needs of our clients. We are not just service providers, we are your partners in growth. Our team of experienced professionals are committed to delivering value, providing you with world-class software that is reliable, innovative, and user-friendly.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         At Beesolver Technology, we understand that every business has unique requirements. Therefore, we offer custom solutions tailored to your specific needs. Our flexibility and commitment to quality have made us a preferred choice among companies looking for offshore software development outsourcing. We believe in providing solutions that not only meet but exceed client expectations.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         In conclusion, if you're looking for a reliable offshore software development company, Beesolver Technology is your answer.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What aspects do you prioritize when choosing an offshore software development company and why?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoresoftwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207917304788000769">
          #OffshoreSoftwareDevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=beesolvertechnology&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207917304788000769">
          #BeesolverTechnology
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwareoutsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207917304788000769">
          #SoftwareOutsourcing
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--1-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        Here is the outline of the business.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Hello, I run an outstaffing business.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We specialize in outstaffing offshore software developers to US companies and have established a strong system for navigating US labor laws, regulations, and tax requirements.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        However, we continue to face unique challenges related to cultural and language barriers, which is why we are looking to hire a dedicated communicator to participate in client interviews and meetings on behalf of our developers.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        This will increase the likelihood of passing job interviews and ensure smooth communication while allowing our developers to focus on development.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We are looking for someone who:
        <br/>
        <br/>
        • Is a native or fluent English speaker
        <br/>
        <br/>
        • Has 5 years of experience in software development (React, React Native, Angular, Vue, Node, JavaScript, TypeScript, Next, AWS, GraphQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL etc)
        <br/>
        <br/>
        • Possesses excellent communication skills and experience in client-facing roles
        <br/>
        <br/>
        • Is willing to support our company for at least 6 months once started (the longer, the better)
        <br/>
        <br/>
        • Is comfortable impersonating our developers during video interviews including introductory, technical, and cultural interviews with clients
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We will pay you based on an hourly, weekly, or monthly salary. (flexible )
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We offer bonus points or increasing salary for good progress during interviews or when things are going well.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Thank you for considering this opportunity, and we look forward to hearing from you!
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         At Webline Group, we strongly believe that partnerships and collaborations play a pivotal role in achieving success. Therefore, we actively seek strategic allies who share our vision and are eager to unite with us.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If you're looking for an OFFSHORE TECHNOLOGY PARTNER Webline has resources available on the bench. We are eager to establish a connection with you and engage in a conversation about how we can collaborate to achieve our objectives.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We can work on a project basis or on a retainer as well.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Drop us a line:
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="http://www.weblineindia.com" target="_self">
          www.weblineindia.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="http://www.weblineglobal.com" target="_self">
          www.weblineglobal.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Embark on this thrilling journey with us and become an integral part of the IT revolution.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Look forward to connecting!
         <br/>

     <div class="artdeco-dropdown artdeco-dropdown--placement-bottom artdeco-dropdown--justification-right ember-view" id="ember1194">
      <button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Open control menu for post by Lordly Raye Flores" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember1195" tabindex="0" type="button">
       <svg aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" data-supported-dps="16x16" data-test-icon="overflow-web-ios-small" height="16" role="none" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

      <div aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Control Menu Options" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember1196" tabindex="-1">

    </div>

   <!-- -->
   <!-- -->
   <!-- -->
   <!-- -->
   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        Here is the outline of the business.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Hello, I run an outstaffing business.
        <br/>
        We specialize in outstaffing offshore software developers to US companies and have established a strong system for navigating US labor laws, regulations, and tax requirements.
        <br/>
        However, we continue to face unique challenges related to cultural and language barriers, which is why we are looking to hire a dedicated communicator to participate in client interviews and meetings on behalf of our developers.
        <br/>
        This will increase the likelihood of passing job interviews and ensure smooth communication while allowing our developers to focus on development.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We are looking for someone who:
        <br/>
        • Is a native or fluent English speaker
        <br/>
        • Has 5 years of experience in software development (React, React Native, Angular, Vue, Node, JavaScript, TypeScript, Next, AWS, GraphQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL etc)
        <br/>
        • Possesses excellent communication skills and experience in client-facing roles
        <br/>
        • Is willing to support our company for at least 6 months once started (the longer, the better)
        <br/>
        • Is comfortable impersonating our developers during video interviews including introductory, technical, and cultural interviews with clients
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We will pay you based on an hourly, weekly, or monthly salary. (flexible )
        <br/>
        We offer bonus points or increasing salary for good progress during interviews or when things are going well.
        <br/>

        Thank you for considering this opportunity, and we look forward to hearing from you!

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        Here Is The Outline Of The Business.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Hello, I run an outstaffing business.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We specialize in outstaffing offshore software developers to US companies and have established a strong system for navigating US labor laws, regulations, and tax requirements.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        However, we continue to face unique challenges related to cultural and language barriers, which is why we are looking to hire a dedicated communicator to participate in client interviews and meetings on behalf of our developers.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        This will increase the likelihood of passing job interviews and ensure smooth communication while allowing our developers to focus on development.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We are looking for someone who:
        <br/>
        <br/>
        • Is a native or fluent English speaker
        <br/>
        <br/>
        • Has 5 years of experience in software development (React, React Native, Angular, Vue, Node, JavaScript, TypeScript, Next, AWS, GraphQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL etc)
        <br/>
        <br/>
        • Possesses excellent communication skills and experience in client-facing roles
        <br/>
        <br/>
        • Is willing to support our company for at least 6 months once started (the longer, the better)
        <br/>
        <br/>
        • Is comfortable impersonating our developers during video interviews including introductory, technical, and cultural interviews with clients
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We will pay you based on an hourly, weekly, or monthly salary. (flexible )
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We offer bonus points or increasing salary for good progress during interviews or when things are going well.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Thank you for considering this opportunity, and we look forward to hearing from you!
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

   Feed post
  </h2>

      <div class="update-components-actor__meta relative">
       <a aria-label="View: TheTekSol 588 followers" class="app-aware-link update-components-actor__meta-link" data-test-app-aware-link="" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/theteksol/posts" target="_self">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Looking for an offshore outsourcing company? Here's what to consider.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Offshore outsourcing can be a great way to save money, improve efficiency, and gain access to specialized skills and expertise.
         <br/>
         But with so many companies to choose from, it can be hard to know where to start.
         <br/>
         Here are a few things to consider when choosing an offshore outsourcing company:
         <br/>
         1. The type of services you need: Do you need help with software development, customer service, or something else?
         <br/>
         2. The location of the company: Where is the company located? This can affect the cost of services, the time zone difference, and the cultural fit.
         <br/>
         3. The company's experience: How much experience does the company have in your industry?
         <br/>
         4. The company's reputation: What are other businesses saying about the company?
         <br/>
         5. The company's communication and collaboration tools: What tools does the company use to communicate and collaborate?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Once you've considered these factors, you can start narrowing down your options. Be sure to get everything in writing, including the scope of work, the timeline, and the pricing. And don't be afraid to ask questions!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Need help finding an offshore outsourcing company?
         <br/>
         Read More:
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://lnkd.in/dnqBWyEY" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/dnqBWyEY
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7100752846651846656">

         </a>

          #outsourcingservices
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoreoutsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7100752846651846656">
          #offshoreoutsourcing
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcingcompany&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7100752846651846656">
          #outsourcingcompany
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=freelancedeveloper&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7100752846651846656">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hello, I'm looking a Software Developer.
         <br/>
         We specialize in outstaffing offshore software developers to US companies and have established a strong system for navigating US labor laws, regulations, and tax requirements.
         <br/>
         However, we continue to face unique challenges related to cultural and language barriers, which is why we are looking to hire a dedicated communicator to participate in client interviews and meetings on behalf of our developers.
         <br/>
         This will increase the likelihood of passing job interviews and ensure smooth communication while allowing our developers to focus on development.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are looking for someone who:
         <br/>
         • Is a native or fluent English speaker
         <br/>
         • Has 5 years of experience in software development (React, React Native, Angular, Vue, Node, JavaScript, TypeScript, Next, AWS, GraphQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL etc)
         <br/>
         • Possesses excellent communication skills and experience in client-facing roles
         <br/>
         • Is willing to support our company for at least 6 months once started (the longer, the better)
         <br/>
         • Is comfortable impersonating our developers during video interviews including introductory, technical, and cultural interviews with clients
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We will pay you based on an hourly, weekly, or monthly salary. (flexible )
         <br/>
         We offer bonus points or increasing salary for good progress during interviews or when things are going well.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Thank you for considering this opportunity, and we look forward to hearing from you!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=linkedinpremium&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7210278497196404736">
          #linkedinpremium
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:392.6875px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more
      </span>
     </button>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--2-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         How do you know you're choosing the right team when outsourcing your software development project? Here are 3 things to consider:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         1️⃣ Time Zone Differences
         <br/>
         Working with a nearshore company can greatly reduce the delays in communication and allow for wider times to meet during US hours instead of nights and early mornings that offshore projects require.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         2️⃣ Communication and Culture
         <br/>
         Understanding cultural differences is key, as subtle communication patterns can lead to misunderstandings. To prevent communication issues, documentation and knowledge transfer are vital.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         3️⃣ Hidden Costs
         <br/>
         Ensure your partner is transparent about pricing, resource utilization, and project management processes. Fully-documented requirements can prevent scope creep and unexpected costs.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What other advice would you give to someone who is looking to outsource?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7109945046480650242">
          #SoftwareDevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=appdevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7109945046480650242">
          #AppDevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=businessstrategy&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7109945046480650242">
          #BusinessStrategy
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--2-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Are you looking to outsource your software development to an offshore company? Unsure where to start? 🤔
         <br/>
         <br/>
         👇 Here are 10 simple steps to help you find the right offshore software development company:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         1️⃣ Determine your software development needs and goals.
         <br/>
         2️⃣ Research potential countries with favorable offshore software development laws.
         <br/>
         3️⃣ Check the country's political stability and economic conditions.
         <br/>
         4️⃣ Look for a reputable and reliable offshore software development service provider.
         <br/>
         5️⃣ Review the company's track record and client feedback in software development.
         <br/>
         6️⃣ Choose a suitable offshore location and software development team structure.
         <br/>
         7️⃣ Consider the expertise and experience of the software development team.
         <br/>
         8️⃣ Verify the legality of the offshore software development company and its operations.
         <br/>
         9️⃣ Understand the costs and fees involved in outsourcing software development.
         <br/>
         🔟 Seek professional advice and guidance throughout the software development outsourcing process.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         💬 What's your biggest challenge when it comes to outsourcing software development? Share your thoughts below!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         🌏 Offshore Development Center vs. Outsourcing: What’s the Difference? 🌏
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Confused about the difference between an offshore development center and outsourcing? Here’s a simple explanation:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Outsourcing:
         <br/>
         - What it is: Hiring an external company to handle specific tasks or projects.
         <br/>
         - Scope: Can be local or international, often project-based.
         <br/>
         - Control: Limited control over the team and processes.
         <br/>
         - Example: Contracting a company to develop your website's development with a fixed scope or requirements.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Offshore Development Center:
         <br/>
         - What it is: Setting up your own dedicated team in another country.
         <br/>
         - Scope: Long-term, often involves setting up infrastructure and hiring staff.
         <br/>
         - Control: Full control over the team, processes, and project management.
         <br/>
         - Example: Establishing a software development team in India to work on your projects continuously.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         At
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/peritystech/">
          Peritys
         </a>
         , we help businesses navigate these decisions by offering tailored solutions that maximize efficiency and minimize risks. Whether you’re looking to offshore or outsource, our expertise ensures seamless integration and optimal results.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         📈 Looking to transform your operations? Let’s connect and discuss how we can support your growth journey!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=businessstrategy&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7205486296125865984">

         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7205486296125865984">
          #Outsourcing
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7205486296125865984">
          #Offshoring
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=techsolutions&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7205486296125865984">
          #TechSolutions
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=operationalefficiency&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7205486296125865984">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--2-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         We are still
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7082364188672598016">
          #hiring
         </a>
         ! Know anyone who might be interested?
         <br/>
         Business Analyst-1-2 yrs
         <br/>
         <br/>
         IT Business Analyst- USA based company
         <br/>
         Experience: 1 - 2 yr(s).
         <br/>
         Location: Ahmedabad
         <br/>
         Company Details :
         <br/>
         AllianceTek Inc. is a leading software development company in Pennsylvania, US. Our experienced IT team provides customized software &amp; web solutions using technologies like .NET, SharePoint, PHP, Salesforce, React JS, Node JS etc. &amp; mobile platforms like iOS, Android &amp; Windows. We provides an onshore client service &amp; project management team along with overseas developers &amp; designers to deliver the maximum benefit to our clients.
         <br/>
         Since a decade, we have provided innovative, technologically advanced solutions across industries including mobile solutions, ERP, EMR, E-learning, Enterprise Content Management, Cloud, Collaboration, Business Intelligence, Business Process Management, Customer Relationship Management, Integration solutions, among others.
         <br/>
         Alliancetek having its existence globally possess its offshore development centres and existence in India at Rajkot and Ahmedabad location at the name of Denali Software Solutions.
         <br/>
         As a part of expansion of our team in India, AllianceTek is looking for talented people who aspires to grab great opportunities available with the organization and Our talented and experienced team would like to welcome the young professionals who have keen interest to explore their knowledge and skills for career goal.
         <br/>
         For more details, visit our website:
         <br/>
         USA:
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://lnkd.in/dTHgBwKd" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/dTHgBwKd
         </a>
         <br/>
         India:
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://lnkd.in/dAcjgKxW" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/dAcjgKxW
         </a>
         <br/>
         and have a look on our reviews on:
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://lnkd.in/drFq_t3v" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/drFq_t3v
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Why to join AllianceTek:
         <br/>
         5 working days
         <br/>
         Flexible working culture
         <br/>
         Job Security
         <br/>
         No probation period
         <br/>
         Exposure of latest technologies
         <br/>
         Employee friendly policies
         <br/>
         Direct Exposure with international clients
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAACq_Z3UB3cbTLd9mPhM3ab2rQHBlf5fBc8o">
          Gargi Nathvani
         </a>
         <strong>
          AllianceTek Inc.
         </strong>
        </span>
       </span>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Looking for a trusted offshore IT partner for your business?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         With Techmango you can get seamless access to a talent pool of highly skilled professionals. Thereby, succeed in building your own custom software quickly and within your budget. Get ready to face cutthroat competition in the IT sector.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         know more at:
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://lnkd.in/gzfr7C3j" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/gzfr7C3j
         </a>
         <br/>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Warm Greetings...! From Evoke Technologies (
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="http://www.evoketechnologies.com" target="_self">
          www.evoketechnologies.com
         </a>
         )
         <br/>
         Little brief about us: Evoke Technologies is a leading global IT services consulting company. Incorporated in 2003, Evoke has developed a proven roadmap for offshore outsourcing, software development, maintenance and support that delivers, We boost our partners’ business, using the most advanced technology and the best professionals in the sector.
         <br/>
         Evoke has more than 1300 employees across our offices in USA, India, Poland (Wroclaw), Australia, and UK
         <br/>
         We are Looking for an Automation Test Engineer Position.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The Role:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are looking for a Software Test Engineer to join our Testing Team. We are looking for a talented, self-driven and customer focused Automation Test Engineer, someone who is passionate about writing and maintaining high-quality software that solves real-world meaningful problems at scale. This is an exciting opportunity for highly motivated individuals to work in a fast-paced customer focused Role.
         <br/>
         As part of an agile development team, you will play a key role in defining and shaping new products and systems to deliver a better experience for our client projects.
         <br/>
         Location: Wroclaw – Poland.
         <br/>
         Mode of Work – Hybrid
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The JD is as follows:
         <br/>
         Minimum 3+ Years exp in Manual Teasting
         <br/>
         Selenium WebDriver with 1+years exp.,
         <br/>
         Experience in Xpath and CSS Selector is added advantage.
         <br/>
         Should work independently and coordinate with the client teams.
         <br/>
         Strong customer focus, problem solving and analytical ability.
         <br/>
         Knowledge on TFS.
         <br/>
         Excellent Communication.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Send your CV to
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="mailto:msarana@evoketechnologies.com" target="_self">
          msarana@evoketechnologies.com
         </a>
         and join our team!
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:414.953125px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more
      </span>
     </button>

    <div class="update-components-article--with-small-image update-components-article--with-small-image-fs">
     <div class="update-components-article__link-container">
      <a aria-label="Open article: Evoke Technologies - Custom Software Development &amp; IT Services Company by evoketechnologies.com" class="app-aware-link tap-target" data-test-app-aware-link="" href="http://www.evoketechnologies.com" target="_blank">
       <div class="ivm-image-view-model">
        <div class="ivm-view-attr__img-wrapper">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        Can we get a dedicated offshore team from India for US companies?
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Yes, it is possible for US companies to hire a dedicated offshore team from India. Offshore teams are teams of professionals who are based in a different country from the company that hires them. This can be an effective way for companies to access skilled personnel at a lower cost than hiring in-house staff.
        <br/>
        India is a popular destination for offshore teams due to its large and skilled technology workforce, as well as its favorable time zone and cost advantages. Companies can hire offshore teams in India to work on a variety of IT and other technical projects, such as software development, data analysis, and customer support.
        <br/>
        There are a number of options for companies looking to hire an offshore team in India, including hiring individuals directly or working with a staffing agency or offshore service provider. It is important for companies to carefully consider their needs and requirements and do their due diligence when hiring an offshore team to ensure that they are able to effectively collaborate and meet their objectives.
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:435.921875px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more
      </span>
     </button>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         🚀 Supercharge Your Offshore Business with Suma Soft's IT Services! 🌐
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Looking to optimize operations and drive cost savings for your offshore company? Look no further! Suma Soft is your go-to partner for exceptional IT services, backed by over 23 years of industry-leading experience.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         With ISO 9001:2015 and 27001:2013 certifications, we prioritize quality and security in everything we do. Discover how our comprehensive IT services can benefit your offshore business:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌟 Software Development: Leverage our expertise in PHP, JAVA, C, C++, SharePoint, DOT NET, C#, Ruby, Python, AngularJs, SQL, PostGreSQL, LAMP Stack, Salesforce, CRM, and more to develop robust software solutions tailored to your unique requirements.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌟 Quality Assurance Testing: Ensure flawless performance and user experience with our comprehensive range of testing services, including automation, manual testing, performance testing, mobile app testing, ERP testing, PLM testing, penetration testing, and security testing.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌟 Technical Support: Stay ahead with our reliable technical support services, encompassing IT help desk services, Level 1 &amp; 2 product support, remote monitoring services/NOC, database support services, network support services, and IT infrastructure services.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Partnering with Suma Soft unlocks substantial cost savings and elevates your productivity to new heights. Join forces with our team of experts and propel your offshore business to success!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Reach out to us today to discuss your specific requirements and embark on a transformative journey together.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Get in touch:
         <br/>
         📧
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="mailto:shekhar.bhosale@sumasoft.net" target="_self">
          shekhar.bhosale@sumasoft.net
         </a>
         <br/>
         📞 +1 (281) 205-0233
         <br/>
         🔵
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="http://www.sumasoft.com" target="_self">
          www.sumasoft.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Let's drive offshore excellence together.
         <br/>
         <br/>

      <button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Open control menu for post by Aleksandra Patlazhan" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember1710" tabindex="0" type="button">
       <svg aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" data-supported-dps="16x16" data-test-icon="overflow-web-ios-small" height="16" role="none" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

      </button>
      <div aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Control Menu Options" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember1711" tabindex="-1">

   <!-- -->
   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        Hi!
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Today I'm continuing my series of posts about working for a remote team and I'll be looking forward to your reactions and comments:
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Outsourcing Problems and How To Deal With Them
        <br/>
        Many companies are using offshore outsourcing teams as their core teams or as an addition to existing in-house departments. We will focus on the typical challenges of offshore outsourcing teams and effective solutions for those who have just started using this approach. This article will be especially useful for those who don’t understand how to eliminate challenges and don’t benefit from this software development approach as a result.
        <br/>
        1. Lack of Experience with Outsourcing
        <br/>
        Solution: if you don’t have outsourcing experience, a vendor that has years of proven experience in onboarding newcomer clients to this model of cooperation will be a big help;
        <br/>
        2. Hassle with contractual and legal processes
        <br/>
        Solution: be ready to conduct some research and arrange consultations with law experts to get more understanding of this aspect. You need to discuss and document everything related to payment terms, reporting, confidentiality, security, data, and intellectual rights transfer;
        <br/>
        3. Not effective knowledge transfer
        <br/>
        Solution: you should always prevent any knowledge transfer issues by keeping the documentation of the project in check and always pay close attention to documentation management;
        <br/>
        4. Making the wrong vendor choice
        <br/>
        Solution: objectively assess your company: its size, number of employees, growth potential, revenue, brand awareness, etc. Do not go for a large outsourcing company if you are still in the startup phase. The money you would spend on it would be enough to cover a paycheck of an in-house specialist;
        <br/>
        There are many more challenges that companies face when outsourcing. Please contact us and stay tuned to find out how to deal with major problems in outsourcing.
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:426.203125px" type="button">

       …more
      </span>
     </button>

         <br/>
         Hi Connections,
         <br/>
         NeoSOFT is hiring for International Business Development Professional
         <br/>
         <br/>
         NeoSOFT is a CMMI Level 5, global IT Consulting &amp; Outsourcing organization with 9 delivery centers in India and 10 global offices. Backed with 25+ years and a fast-growing family of 4000+ engineering professionals, our capabilities span across IT Consulting, Digital Transformation, Product Engineering, IoT, and Strategic Team Augmentation.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Total Experience- 4+ years
         <br/>
         Location- Dadar, Mumbai
         <br/>
         <br/>
         KRA's
         <br/>
         ·        To identify and connect with key decision makers of leading corporates using right channels.
         <br/>
         ·        Solution provider for Pre and post sales offshore, onsite, nearshore requirements.
         <br/>
         ·        Familiarity with software sales / solution sales environments.
         <br/>
         ·        Develop and execute strategies for lead generation, sales target
         <br/>
         ·        Should be very good at giving presentations
         <br/>
         <br/>

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         𝗦𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗢𝘂𝘁𝘀𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗰𝗲𝗱 𝗦𝗼𝗳𝘁𝘄𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 🔒
         <br/>
         Outsourcing software development is a prevalent strategy for businesses looking to accelerate growth, access specialized skills, or reduce costs. However, entrusting another company with your software development also comes with significant security risks that, if not properly managed, could compromise sensitive data, violate compliance requirements, and ultimately tarnish a company’s reputation.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Let's dive into this article 👉
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://lnkd.in/gETvtzv6" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/gETvtzv6
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=solazu&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7197135781906292736">
          #solazu
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7197135781906292736">
          #softwaredevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=itoutsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7197135781906292736">
          #itoutsourcing
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7197135781906292736">
          #offshore
         </a>

         One of my acquaintances is looking for a Senior Profile in Software Development and Project Management.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝐏𝐨𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: General Manager
         <br/>
         𝐄𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐨𝐲𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐓𝐲𝐩𝐞: 12-Months Contract (Extendable/Renewable) - Offshore Contractor
         <br/>
         𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Karachi / Lahore
         <br/>
         𝐐𝐮𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: University Degree in Computer Science or equivalent technical qualification(s).
         <br/>
         𝐑𝐞𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞:
         <br/>
         ● Over 6 years of experience in Software development and Project management.
         <br/>
         ● Over 3 years of experience in Operations &amp; Financial Analytics and comfort in using tools such as
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=power&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7097926700239327232">
          #Power
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=bi&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7097926700239327232">
          #BI
         </a>

          #Alteryx
         </a>
         , etc.
         <br/>
         ● 2 years in a leadership position.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This resource will be expected to hire, manage and lead a triage of overseas support functions for the company. Namely these include Tech &amp; Development, Analytics and Finance support resources to deliver strategic business requirements. He/she will also be expected to set up &amp; manage new offices and oversee the establishment of a robust back-end unit in line with company culture and values.

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         As per
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/marketsandmarkets/">
          MarketsandMarkets™
         </a>
         , the global managed services market – currently valued at $275.5 billion – will surpass $372.6 billion by 2028⏫, once again proving the increasing demand for offshore software development services. It means that regardless of the ongoing economic recession, businesses are still looking to prioritize cost mitigation and profitability; and this is where offshore software development surfaces as a viable solution.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🧑‍💻In our latest piece, Hive experts offer insights into the essence of offshore software development – its merits and drawbacks – and identify key strategies for choosing an offshore software development partner that will fit your business context.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hivedevs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7140686801752453120">
          #hivedevs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwareoutsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7140686801752453120">
          #softwareoutsourcing
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Are you a visionary startup founder or a forward-thinking company looking to turn your software ideas into reality? Look no further! We are your dedicated partners in crafting cutting-edge software solutions that propel businesses to success.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         At Techmelon, we specialize in connecting you with our top-notch software talent pool who are adept in delivering tailored software development services that align perfectly with your unique needs.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🚀 Why Choose Us?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✓ Start-up Friendly: We understand the constraints and ambitions of start-ups. Our offshore tech-partnership model makes our pricing unbeatable. We offer scalable solutions that grow with your success.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✓ Collaborative Approach: Your vision drives us. We work closely with you, valuing your insights at every step to create software that genuinely reflects your business values.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✓ Agile Delivery: With a knack for meeting deadlines without compromising quality, we use Agile practices to bring your projects to life efficiently.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Whether you're a solo entrepreneur with a ground-breaking concept or an established business seeking a digital transformation, we're here to turn your software dreams into reality. Let's build something exceptional together.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         📞 Reach out today to discuss how we can bring your software vision to life. Your success story begins here.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌐 Visit our website:
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://techmelon.uk/" target="_self">
          https://techmelon.uk/
         </a>
         <br/>
         📧 Email us:
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="mailto:info@techmelon.uk" target="_self">
          info@techmelon.uk
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         🚀 Supercharge Your Offshore Business with Suma Soft's IT Services!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌐Are you an offshore company looking to optimize operations and drive cost savings? Look no further than Suma Soft, your go-to partner for exceptional IT services!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         With over 23 years of experience, Suma Soft has established itself as a trusted industry leader. Our ISO 9001:2015 and 27001:2013 certifications underscore our unwavering commitment to quality and security.
         <br/>
         Discover how our comprehensive IT services can benefit your offshore business:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌟 Software Development: Leverage our expertise in PHP, JAVA, C, C++, SharePoint, DOT NET, C#, Ruby, Python, AngularJs, SQL, PostGreSQL, LAMP Stack, Salesforce, CRM, and more to develop robust software solutions tailored to your unique requirements.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌟 Quality Assurance Testing: Ensure flawless performance and user experience with our comprehensive range of testing services, including automation, manual testing, performance testing, mobile app testing, ERP testing, PLM testing, penetration testing, and security testing.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌟 Technical Support: Stay ahead with our reliable technical support services, encompassing IT help desk services, Level 1 &amp; 2 product support, remote monitoring services/NOC, database support services, network support services, and IT infrastructure services.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         By partnering with Suma Soft, you can unlock substantial cost savings and elevate your productivity to new heights. Join forces with our team of experts and propel your offshore business to success!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Reach out to us today to discuss your specific requirements and embark on a transformative journey together.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=itservices&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7084940080758366208">
          #ITServices
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshorebusiness&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7084940080758366208">
          #OffshoreBusiness
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=costsavings&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7084940080758366208">
          #CostSavings
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=productivityboost&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7084940080758366208">
          #ProductivityBoost
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Get in touch:
         <br/>
         📧
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="mailto:pranav.patil@sumasoft.net" target="_self">
          pranav.patil@sumasoft.net
         </a>
         <br/>
         📞 +1 302 608 0878
         <br/>
         🌐
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="http://www.sumasoft.com" target="_self">
          www.sumasoft.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Let's drive offshore excellence together! 🚀

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Dear all valued connections,
         <br/>
         Iconic's client is looking for C/C++ SOFTWARE DEVELOPER (STAFF~LEADER LEVEL) as below:
         <br/>
         Working place: District 12, HCMC
         <br/>
         Salary: $700 - $1500 Gross (Negotiable)
         <br/>
         Japanese
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148565183232172032">
          #offshore
         </a>
         software development company
         <br/>
         Vietnamese candidates only
         <br/>
         <br/>
         JOB DESCRIPTIONS:
         <br/>
         - Customize the
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=embedded&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148565183232172032">
          #Embedded
         </a>
         software specialized in
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=semiconductor&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148565183232172032">
          #semiconductor
         </a>
         response to customers' requests.
         <br/>
         - Develop two types of software for
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=wirebondingequipment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148565183232172032">
          #WireBondingEquipment
         </a>
         .
         <br/>
         ① Monitor
         <br/>
         ② The
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148565183232172032">
          #software
         </a>
         for controlling wiring operation
         <br/>
         - Other detail will be discussed via the interview.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         REQUIREMENTS:
         <br/>
         - Bachelor's degree with relevant
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=engineering&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148565183232172032">
          #engineering
         </a>
         majors.
         <br/>
         - 2 years of experience as an engineer using
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=c&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148565183232172032">
          #C
         </a>
         /
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=c&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148565183232172032">
          #C
         </a>
         ++
         <br/>
         - Solid experience with C/C++
         <br/>
         - Good command of
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=english&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148565183232172032">
          #English
         </a>
         skills.
         <br/>
         ------
         <br/>
         CONTACT FOR APPLICATION:
         <br/>
         Email:
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="mailto:tien.nt@iconic-intl.com" target="_self">
          tien.nt@iconic-intl.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         Mobile/Zalo: 0329 064 769 (Thủy Tiên)
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
