   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--2-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Are you a founder looking to scale up your software development team?
         <br/>
         Have you considered hiring an offshore team? 💡
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Outsourcing software development to an offshore team can be a game-changer for startups and scaleups. It allows you to access a pool of talented developers at a fraction of the cost of hiring locally.
         <br/>
         And what is even more important - you can benefit from the experience and expertise of professionals who have worked on a wide range of projects.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         But how do you go about finding the right offshore team? Here are a few tips:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✔ Look for a team that has experience working with startups. They will understand your unique needs and be able to adapt quickly to changes. 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✔ Check their portfolio and references. Make sure they have experience working on projects similar to yours and that their clients have been satisfied with their work. 💬
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✔ Communication is key. Make sure the team you choose is fluent in your language and understands your business processes well. We all know how hard it is to communicate because of barriers like this. 😓
         <br/>
         <br/>
         At
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/eliftech/">
          ElifTech
         </a>
         , we've had great success working with businesses from all over the world. We've helped them build their MVPs, grow their audiences, and scale their businesses. Our clients are in a variety of different industries, but they all share one thing: They're looking for someone who can help them with technology—not just any technology company 💙
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If you're interested in learning more about hiring an offshore software development team, feel free to reach out. I'd be happy to share some tips to help you get started. 😊
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7102585742106767360">
          #softwaredevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=founders&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7102585742106767360">
          #founders
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=startups&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7102585742106767360">
          #startups
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=scaleups&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7102585742106767360">
          #scaleups
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7102585742106767360">
          #outsourcing
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Going to Money20/20 and looking for affordable, English-speaking software engineers, data scientists, and other technology talent? We help you find and build your own dedicated offshore software development, data science, and technology teams in Portugal or Spain without the need for you to register a legal entity in Portugal or Spain. Let’s meet and discuss your needs. Message me to meet in Vegas or on Zoom.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Looking to supercharge your company's tech capabilities without outsourcing or the hassles of setting up a foreign legal entity or dealing with foreign HR and payroll? Look no further! Offshore Nexus is here to revolutionize your approach to offshore technology teams.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Say goodbye to outsourcing, and say hello to seamless, cost-effective expansion!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshorenexus&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7120062215075876864">
          #OffshoreNexus
         </a>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Our CEO,
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAFydakBzTIqB7rCK8eJVBABEVnqqtEkqMg">

          #offshore
         </a>
         software development needs, this is a great opportunity to meet with Siddharth in person. Don’t miss the chance to connect with a leading expert in the field and explore how
         <a data-attribute-index="3" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/iviewlabs/">
          iView Labs Pvt. Ltd. (Software Development Company)
         </a>
         can assist with your projects.
         <br/>
         <br/>

           </a>
           is a perfect destination for hosting such conferences, a kind of vibe and surrounding this city has -with the structure and geometry - it has a perfect blend of urban, modern and forest ecosystem architecture.      <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         A Mobile Application can help clients have a good experience when using services. Aside from that, investing in Mobile Application development gives a great advantage in cost reduction. So, many companies are looking for an offshore mobile app development company.
         <br/>
         Finding a reliable offshore mobile application development company is very difficult because the software market has a larger amount of providers and you have no idea about hiring them. Let’s keep reading this article it can give you a helpful suggestion.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Read more:
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://lnkd.in/g-tQYjkc" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/g-tQYjkc
         </a>

         📍 Head Office: 33 Ba Vi - Ward 4 - Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Greetings from Sparsh Communications..!!!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         About Sparsh : Sparsh Communications is an advanced and diversified IT company. Our offshore software services and solutions are designed with a focus on secure, expandable, scalable and consistent business systems. Indeed, through our low cost, high quality and reliable offshore software services, we serve our clients, providing them value for money and thus client satisfaction. For more details, please visit
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://lnkd.in/g5FdCUQk" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/g5FdCUQk
         </a>
         .
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are looking for 3 to 10 Years of Experience Candidates for DotNet Software Developers .
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Skills Required:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         · Good in
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="http://asp.net" target="_self">
          asp.net
         </a>
         C# and Wpf
         <br/>
         <br/>
         · Working experience of MVC &amp; Web API
         <br/>
         <br/>
         · Good in OOps
         <br/>
         <br/>
         · Good Analytical &amp; Logical skills
         <br/>
         <br/>
         · Should have hands on experience in working on complex business applications.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         · Deployment is into Microsoft azure
         <br/>
         <br/>
         · Jira for Agile.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         With Regards
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Pavankumar Javvadi
         <br/>
         <br/>
         HR Executive
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Sparsh Communications Pvt. Ltd.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Ph: 9603049819
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Email:
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="mailto:pavankumar.javvadi@sparshcom.net" target="_self">
          pavankumar.javvadi@sparshcom.net
         </a>
         | Web:
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://lnkd.in/g5FdCUQk" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/g5FdCUQk
         </a>
         <br/>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Business Development Manager / Specialist
         <br/>
         <br/>
         MULTIPLE REMOTE POSITIONS
         <br/>
         (Anywhere is US, preferably in Greater Boston area, MA OR DFW area, TX)
         <br/>
         Work as per EST – Full time, Work from home, with occasional meetings in Dallas/ DFW area, TX OR in the Greater Boston area.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Business Development for IT Services / Software Services including Offshore Software Development &amp; IT Staffing (Onsite &amp; Offshore)
         <br/>
         Futurism Technologies Inc. is a CMMI Level 3 company, one of the fastest growing companies with palpable presence across the globe, bringing 360-degree Digital Transformation for business enterprises of various sizes, as well as technology / solutions provider by delivering assured business efficiency through a set of new-age technologies like: Big Data, Data Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Mobility, Internet of Things (IoT), Cloud Platforms, and more.
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://lnkd.in/dNHV9Shj" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/dNHV9Shj
         </a>
         <br/>
         Looking to hire new Business Development Manager / Specialist who can contribute to exponential business growth for the years to come. As a Business Developer, you will be responsible for driving the end-to-end Software services sales process for new clients.
         <br/>
         Required relevant experience – 4 to 8 years.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         Identifying prospects using lead generation, social media, personal networking and ongoing relationships.
         <br/>
         Driving the sales process from introductory meetings to business capture, for new clients.
         <br/>
         Promoting Futurism’s services as a trusted software solutions services partner and expanding our market share.
         <br/>
         Delivering exceptional service and cultivating successful long-term client relationships.
         <br/>
         Working with executive team members to improve service delivery and expand our footprint in North America.
         <br/>
         Qualifications:
         <br/>
         ·       Prior experience in a sales or business development environment for Software services /IT Staffing (onsite / offshore) and Software solutions in AI &amp; ML / Cyber Security /Ecommerce / SaaS / Cloud / RPA / Mobility / IOT / Data Science / Data Analytics
         <br/>
         ·       Ability to understand IT market, market trends, latest software technologies including AI &amp; ML
         <br/>
         Knowledge of generating leads through job boards, LinkedIn, networking &amp; other internet-based tools and Experience in working on the leads generated by Lead Generation Team. Generate leads &amp; prospects based on prior network and contacts.
         <br/>
         ·       Responsible for Sales Demo/Presentation, creating business proposals, negotiations and closing business deals, basically will be responsible for End-to-End Sales.
         <br/>
         Ability to foster relationships and gain trust of new and existing clients.
         <br/>
         A hungry, can-do attitude, high energy, self-starter who takes initiative.
         <br/>
         Be successful in competitive and performance-oriented environment.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Interested candidates may send email to
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="mailto:SantoshS@futurismtechnologies.com" target="_self">
          SantoshS@futurismtechnologies.com
         </a>
         with CC to
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="mailto:bhagyashreew@futurismtechnologies.com" target="_self">
          bhagyashreew@futurismtechnologies.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hello,
         <br/>
         <br/>
         I have an Urgent position of .NET Senior Developer in Tulsa, OK-Fully Onsite-Only Tulsa candidate. if you are interested kindly let me know with your updated resume.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Role:-.NET Senior Developer
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Location:-Tulsa, OK-Fully Onsite-Only Tulsa candidate
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Duartion:-Long Term Contract
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job description:-
         <br/>
         Looking for a Software Developer II/III experience level.
         <br/>
         This contractor will be working on the Back Office team only and will be focused on rewriting applications as part of the PDI project.
         <br/>
         Mainly need .NET experience, as well as JavaScript and SQL.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Thanks &amp; Regards,
         <br/>
         Anuj Rathore
         <br/>
         Team Lead
         <br/>
         Amtex Systems Inc
         <br/>
         646-200-7169 Cell : 646) 200-7169 | ext 7169
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Amtex System Inc.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         28 Liberty Street
         <br/>
         6th Floor - New York, NY 10005
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="http://www.amtexsystems.com" target="_self">
          www.amtexsystems.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         Business Verticals:
         <br/>
         Talent Solutions | Infobuild India | Application Development| Offshore development | Software Testing | Healthcare Practice | Technology Infrastructure
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Office Locations: New York |New Jersey |Austin |London | India
         <br/>
         <br/>
         (English:
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://lnkd.in/dbawaF-M" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/dbawaF-M
         </a>
         ; Spanish:
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://lnkd.in/dxiFMRUg" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/dxiFMRUg
         </a>
         ).
         <br/>
         Disclaimer: This is not an unsolicited mail. Under Bill 1618 Title III passed by the 105th US Congress this mail cannot be considered Spam as long as we include contact information and a method to be removed from our mailing list. If you are not interested in receiving our e-mails then please reply with a "REMOVE" in the subject line. "Should employment follow the receipt of this Resume/Contract, whether directly, or at an end-client site, you hereby acknowledge that such employment of the Consultant's services will not cause displacement of any U.S workers similarly employed by the Company, 90 days before and continuing 90 days after the date of commencement of said services. Please forward this attestation along with this Resume/Contract."
        </span>
       </span>

        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         🚀 Unlock Your Business's Full Potential with Our Dedicated Developers! 💼
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Are you looking to scale your tech projects without breaking the bank? Look no further! At eSparkBiz Technologies, we're excited to offer you an incredible opportunity. 🌟
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌐 Imagine having access to top-notch developers who can transform your ideas into reality, all at a jaw-dropping rate of just $15 USD per hour! That's right, you heard it correctly! 💰
         <br/>
         <br/>
         👨‍💻 Our dedicated developers are skilled in a wide range of technologies and can assist with web and mobile app development, UI/UX design, software engineering, and so much more. 📲💻
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🕒 Worried about making a long-term commitment? No need! We offer a risk-free 3-day trial period so you can experience the quality of our work firsthand, no strings attached. Try before you buy! 🆓
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌟 Why choose [Your Company Name] for your development needs?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✅ Affordable rates
         <br/>
         🌐 Global talent pool
         <br/>
         🧑‍💼 Expertise in various technologies
         <br/>
         💼 Flexible hiring options
         <br/>
         📈 Proven track record of success
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Don't let your tech dreams remain dreams. It's time to turn them into reality! 💡
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Ready to explore the possibilities? Send me a message or visit our website at to
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://lnkd.in/dk6pN8Jv" target="_self">

  <h2 class="visually-hidden">
   Feed post
  </h2>
  <div id="fie-impression-container">
   <!-- -->
   <div class="relative">
    <div class="update-components-actor display-flex update-components-actor--with-control-menu">
     <!-- -->

         * Machine Learning Engineer * Front-end Developer (with WebGL)
         <br/>

         <br/>
         <br/>

         <br/>
         <br/>
         We have new projects with our EU partner and we are
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7123315506723311617">

         </a>

         <br/>

         <br/>
         <br/>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Dear all connections, ICONIC's client is looking for C / C++ SOFTWARE DEVELOPER (senior - leader level)
         <br/>
         - Japanese
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148538455155761152">
          #offshore
         </a>
         software development company in Dist 12, HCMC (
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hybridwork&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148538455155761152">
          #hybridwork
         </a>
         ).
         <br/>
         - Salary: 700 - 1500USD Gross (negotiable)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         &lt; Description &gt;
         <br/>
         - Customize the
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=embedded&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148538455155761152">
          #Embedded
         </a>
         software specialized in
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=semiconductor&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148538455155761152">
          #semiconductor
         </a>
         response to customers' requests.
         <br/>
         - Develop two types of software for
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=wirebondingequipment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148538455155761152">
          #WireBondingEquipment
         </a>
         :
         <br/>
         1. Monitor.
         <br/>
         2. The
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148538455155761152">
          #software
         </a>
         for controlling
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=wiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148538455155761152">
          #wiring
         </a>
         operation.
         <br/>
         - Other detail will be discussed via the interview.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         &lt; Requirement &gt;
         <br/>
         - Bachelor's degree with relevant engineering majors.
         <br/>
         - From 2 years experience as
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=c&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148538455155761152">
          #C
         </a>
         /
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=c&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148538455155761152">
          #C
         </a>
         ++ /
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=embedded&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7148538455155761152">
          #Embedded
         </a>
         Developer.
         <br/>
         - Strong experience with C/ C++.
         <br/>
         - Good command of English skills.
         <br/>
         -----------------------------------
         <br/>
         For further information or application, kindly inbox or send CV via:
         <a data-attribute-index="10" href="mailto:anh.do@iconic-intl.com" target="_self">
          anh.do@iconic-intl.com
         </a>
         or zalo: 0933 229 890 (Anh). Thank you 🌻🍀🌸
        </span>
       </span>

 <div>
  <div role="status">
   <!-- -->
  </div>
  <h2 class="visually-hidden">
   Feed post
  </h2>
  <div id="fie-impression-container">
   <!-- -->
   <div class="relative">
    <div class="update-components-actor display-flex update-components-actor--with-control-menu">
     <!-- -->
     <div class="update-components-actor__container display-flex flex-grow-1">
      <a aria-label="Build Online, graphic." class="app-aware-link update-components-actor__image relative" data-test-app-aware-link="" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/buildonline/posts" target="_self">
       <span class="js-update-components-actor__avatar">
        <div class="ivm-image-view-model update-components-actor__avatar">
         <div class="ivm-view-attr__img-wrapper">
          <!-- -->
          <!-- -->
          <img alt="Build Online" class="ivm-view-attr__img--centered EntityPhoto-square-3 update-components-actor__avatar-image evi-image lazy-image ember-view" height="48" id="ember2375" loading="lazy" src="https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQFKduflX-PW5A/company-logo_100_100/0/1692129178840/buildonline_logo?e=1727913600&amp;v=beta&amp;t=zNZpJV1N3LMR3Vpvkwd5_FK5AJ5GdhedH1hY7G2aMgo" width="48"/>
         </div>
        </div>
       </span>
      </a>
      <div class="update-components-actor__meta relative">
       <a aria-label="View: Build Online 1,287 followers" class="app-aware-link update-components-actor__meta-link" data-test-app-aware-link="" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/buildonline/posts" target="_self">
        <span class="update-components-actor__title">
         <span class="update-components-actor__name hoverable-link-text t-14 t-bold t-black">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         🌍 𝐍𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐯𝐬. 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐫𝐞: 𝐰𝐡𝐢𝐜𝐡 𝐢𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐛𝐞𝐬𝐭 𝐜𝐡𝐨𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐛𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         In today's world, companies across various industries are constantly seeking the best ways to optimize their operations and maximize productivity 📈
         <br/>
         One effective strategy to achieve this is the outsourcing of software development services, and many companies choose to do it. However, within this strategy, there are different options to consider. That's why it's crucial that company decision-makers understand the differences between
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7197245111993307137">
          #nearshore
         </a>
         and
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7197245111993307137">
          #offshore
         </a>
         outsourcing.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         👉🏻  In the carousel attached at the end of the post, we share some of the advantages and disadvantages of nearshore and offshore outsourcing for you to gain deeper insights into these outsourcing services...
         <br/>
         <br/>
         But we have to tell you, at
         <a data-attribute-index="2" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/buildonline/">
          Build Online
         </a>
         𝐰𝐞 𝐟𝐢𝐫𝐦𝐥𝐲 𝐛𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐞𝐯𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐯𝐚𝐥𝐮𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐧𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐬𝐡𝐨𝐫𝐞.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         As your LatAm Dev Partner, we work closely with our U.S. clients, offering cultural synergies that foster more effective collaboration and alignment with business goals, as well as other aspects.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If you are looking to outsource your software development services, connect with us to learn more and discover how we can boost your next project! 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=buildonline&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7197245111993307137">
          #BuildOnline
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7197245111993307137">
          #SoftwareDevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7197245111993307137">
          #Outsourcing
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=technology&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7197245111993307137">
          #Technology
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

         </a>

         <br/>

         <br/>

         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=vadodara&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7176074155346247680">

         </a>
         and

         </a>
         [Work from Office]
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Highlights:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - Five days of work
         <br/>
         - Friendly environment
         <br/>

         <br/>
         - Flexible Leave Policy
         <br/>
         - Referral Program
         <br/>

         <br/>

         <br/>

         <br/>
         - Monthly training sessions, monthly birthday and fun Friday celebrations, and employee engagement activities.
         <br/>

         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=seeking&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7176074155346247680">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         🤝 Choosing the Right Tech Partner: A Step-by-Step Guide 🤖
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Facing the challenge of assembling an in-house tech team?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         It's not easy whether you're a startup or a global enterprise. With the demand for software engineers soaring, businesses of all sizes are seeking flexible, cost-effective staffing solutions that don't compromise on quality.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         So, what's the solution? Outsourcing. It's flexible, cost-efficient, and taps into a vast talent pool. According to Deloitte, 70% choose outsourcing for cost-efficiency, with 40% valuing its flexibility.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         But with numerous vendors out there, how do you make the right choice?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🚀 Here are seven tips to help you find the perfect outsourcing partner for your needs and be sure you make a wise decision:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         1️⃣ Estimate Your Project’s Scope
         <br/>
         2️⃣ Verify Technical Expertise (Portfolio, Customer reviews)
         <br/>
         3️⃣ Communicate with the Candidate Team
         <br/>
         4️⃣ Outline the Deadlines and Budget
         <br/>
         5️⃣ Consider the Team's location (onshore, nearshore, offshore)
         <br/>
         6️⃣ Ensure Project Management Efficiency
         <br/>
         7️⃣ Don’t Forget About Security
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🔍 And if you are still looking, Reach out to Dewais, a full-cycle development company specializing in Javascript technology. We offer digital solutions, including AI, ML, and Big Data, plus expert consulting and outstaffing options. Your project's success starts here.
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=techpartnership&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7112822018181361666">
          #TechPartnership
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7112822018181361666">
          #Outsourcing
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=digitalsolutions&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7112822018181361666">
          #DigitalSolutions
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=dewais&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7112822018181361666">
          #Dewais
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Looking for - GUIDEWIRE DEVELOPER
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=guidewiredeveloper&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7088076152954613760">
          #guidewiredeveloper
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=guidewire&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7088076152954613760">
          #guidewire
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=guidewireconnections&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7088076152954613760">
          #guidewireconnections
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Java R&amp;D Pvt. Ltd. is a Software Development &amp; IT Consulting Company headquartered at VA, USA. We are a leading software development &amp; consulting company providing hi-tech information technology solutions and manpower staffing. Our clients range from Fortune 500 companies to State, Federal, small and medium sized businesses.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are looking for Guidewire developer for a parttime role , who can spare 2 hrs post their regular working hours on Monday to Friday basis and can start connecting as soon as possible .
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Location: Work from Home
         <br/>
         Type: Very Flexible Part Time / Freelancing
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Mandatory Requirements:
         <br/>
         •       Laptop/Desktop
         <br/>
         •       High Speed Internet
         <br/>
         •       Considerable exp in required technology
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If you have any query, feel free to contact me.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         "Your mind already knows how to meditate. All you need to do is notice
         <br/>
         and take advantage."
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>

         <br/>

         Looking for -
         <br/>

         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=lead_generation_specialist&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7188466961637396480">

         </a>
         for an offshore software development services company.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         1-3 years relevant experience (good freshers may also apply)
         <br/>
         proficient with email marketing
         <br/>
         A good command of English is a must
         <br/>
         must be very organized
         <br/>
         work from the office,
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=ahmedabad&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7188466961637396480">
          #Ahmedabad

         <a data-attribute-index="63" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=youtubeshorts&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7186591417115316224">
          #youtubeshorts

          #motivation

     <div class="artdeco-dropdown artdeco-dropdown--placement-bottom artdeco-dropdown--justification-right ember-view" id="ember2577">
      <button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Open control menu for post by Meghan C." class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember2578" tabindex="0" type="button">

   <!-- -->
   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Our well-regarded local client is hiring a Sr. Software Engineer with strong backend
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=java&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #Java
         </a>
         development skills to join their team on a full-time basis! They have some exciting upcoming initiatives, including a mapping implementation to enhance location-based marketing.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This role will be responsible for developing products and platforms for the digital marketing department. Other responsibilities will include identifying and correcting software issues, designing and developing automated unit tests, software documentation, continuous improvement, and assisting junior team members.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are looking for someone with at least 5 years of experience in Java &amp;
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=spring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #Spring
         </a>
         and a Bachelor's degree (or equivalent experience). We are specifically looking for folks who have worked in
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=webdevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #webdevelopment
         </a>
         with enterprise
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=webservices&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #webservices
         </a>
         ,
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cloud&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #cloud
         </a>
         development, and
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cicd&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #CICD
         </a>
         . While not required, experience with
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=sap&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #SAP
         </a>
         Commerce Cloud,
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=mulesoft&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #MuleSoft
         </a>
         ,
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=salesforce&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #Salesforce
         </a>
         Cloud, Native
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=mobile&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #mobile
         </a>
         apps, and/or front-end frameworks like
         <a data-attribute-index="10" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=vue&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #Vue
         </a>
         is preferred and will make you stand out! The role will be working with offshore teams, so experience with collaborating with offshore team members is crucial.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This position is
         <a data-attribute-index="11" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hybrid&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #hybrid
         </a>
         , with 3 days per week onsite. The building has impressive onsite amenities, including a cafeteria and gym! Target salary for this role is up to $130k + 20% bonus. Other benefits include a 6% 401k company match and employee stock purchase program!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Sorry, no C2C or visa sponsorship for this spot.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="12" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=javadeveloper&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #javadeveloper
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="13" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=javajobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #javajobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="14" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hybridjobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #hybridjobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="15" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=developerjobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #developerjobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="16" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=devjobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #devjobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="17" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=iowajobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #iowajobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="18" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=desmoinesjobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #desmoinesjobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="19" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=itjobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #itjobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="20" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=informationtechnology&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #informationtechnology
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="21" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nowhiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7202374564394192896">
          #nowhiring
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:377.125px" type="button">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hey Tampa peeps!  Have a client looking for a hands on CTO that can manage all aspects of their technology needs.  Will be responsible for managing a team of 8 both on shore and offshore.  Must have experience with LAMP stack and must have extensive experience working on SAAS products that utilize AWS.  You are not expected to code all the time; maybe 5% but need to have the technical experience to have technical discussions with the development team and be able to troubleshoot technical issues at a high level as ultimately you will be responsible for all technical aspects and delivery of their products and drive product features in the future.  The client is in Clearwater and are expected to be onsite most of the time.  They have an awesome company culture and have placed people there before.  Salary is between 150-170k with a bonus. If you think you have the skills reach out to me as they are looking for this person to start early Dec ideally.
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:mmoenter@hotmail.com" target="_self">
          mmoenter@hotmail.com
         </a>
         or call me 925-989-1714.
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=saas&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115462228899676161">
          #SAAS
         </a>
         ,
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=technology&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115462228899676161">
          #technology
         </a>
         executive,
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=lamp&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115462228899676161">
          #LAMP
         </a>
         ,
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115462228899676161">
          #hiring
         </a>
         ,
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=php&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115462228899676161">
          #PHP
         </a>
         ,
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115462228899676161">
          #software
         </a>
         management,
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cto&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115462228899676161">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=phpdevelopers&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7118490404886355969">
          #PHPDevelopers
         </a>
         - Junior and Mid level***
         <br/>
         an opportunity to join our team at
         <a data-attribute-index="1" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/podixood/">
          Podix
         </a>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=fullyremote&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7118490404886355969">
          #fullyremote
         </a>
         position
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Podix is a Bulgarian IT service company focused on offshore/nearshore software development services. We cover a diverse range of technologies in various industries – from creative and design to front-end and mobile development and back-end integration, testing and delivery.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Are you an experienced PHP developer looking to expand your knowledge and advance your career? We are currently searching for PHP developers to join our established project, a fully custom program built on the CS-Cart framework. If you're a hands-on developer who is passionate about PHP, eager to work on a long-term project, and enthusiastic about growing professionally by gaining new skills and knowledge that will advance your career path, we want to hear from you.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         o Collaborate with our development team to maintain and enhance the existing software product.
         <br/>
         o Write efficient, reusable, and reliable PHP code.
         <br/>
         o Develop new features and functionalities as needed.
         <br/>
         o Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.
         <br/>
         o Stay up-to-date with the latest PHP best practices and technologies.
         <br/>
         o Ensure the long-term stability and scalability of the product.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Requirements:
         <br/>
         o Hands-on experience as a PHP developer.
         <br/>
         o A strong desire to learn new skills and acquire knowledge.
         <br/>
         o Experience with the CS-Cart framework is a plus.
         <br/>
         o Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
         <br/>
         o Ability to work well in a collaborative team environment.
         <br/>
         o Commitment to maintaining high code quality and standards.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What PODIX offers to our co-workers and co-friends:
         <br/>
         o Fully remote position.
         <br/>
         o Opportunity to participate in many interesting long-term projects with different scopes and scale for European and US clients.
         <br/>
         o Exciting and challenging client-side project.
         <br/>
         o Great remuneration and social benefits.
         <br/>
         o A friendly working environment and open company culture.
         <br/>
         o The ability to manage your own workday by choosing to start anywhere between 8:00 and 10:00 a.m..
         <br/>
         o We can offer you a full-time contract tailored to your needs.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If you are ambitious and think you can meet our requirements, take a step toward your career progression and give it a try! Send us your CV!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Please, do not hesitate to contact us for additional information.
         <br/>
         All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality.
         <br/>
         ***
         <br/>
         Best Regards:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Sevdelin Dimitrov,
         <br/>
         IT Recruiter @ Podix Ltd.
         <br/>
         Mob : +359 898 303 836
         <br/>

          sevdelin.dimitrov@podix.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         Web:
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="http://www.podix.com" target="_self">
          www.podix.com
         </a>
         <br/>

         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=php&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7118490404886355969">
          #php
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=phpdeveloper&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7118490404886355969">
          #phpdeveloper
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=itjobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7118490404886355969">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hiring for Technical Salesforce Developer
         <br/>
         Offshore role (WFH), India
         <br/>
         Notice : Immediate joiner
         <br/>
         Duration : 3 months
         <br/>
         <br/>
         JD :
         <br/>
         We are looking for the candidate who has 5+ years of overall experience in development and maintenance of Salesforce applications. Our primary focus will be custom Salesforce development and integration with third-party services.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - Experience in designing and developing software components and having a very strong Service
         <br/>
         Oriented Architecture and integration background.
         <br/>
         - Experience in Salesforce (SFDC) CRM with end to end implementation experience.
         <br/>
         - Lightning web component development, Lightning design development / Flows - development
         <br/>
         experience / Mobile responsive.
         <br/>
         - Min 2 years’ Experience in LWC.
         <br/>
         -
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="http://Salesforce.com" target="_self">
          Salesforce.com
         </a>
         integration experience, including between different business systems as well as
         <br/>
         working with integration tools.
         <br/>
         - Experience with Release Management, Source Control, and Deployment concepts and technologies
         <br/>
         such as GIT, Azure Repos.
         <br/>
         - Proficiency in programming using Salesforce SFDC,
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="http://Force.com" target="_self">
          Force.com
         </a>
         , JavaScript and their use in the
         <br/>
         development of CRM solutions.
         <br/>
         - Strong experience with configuration, customization, programming with APEX APIs, APEX Triggers,
         <br/>
         Asynchronous Processes, system limits and implementing new instances of
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="http://Salesforce.com" target="_self">
          Salesforce.com
         </a>
         from
         <br/>
         scratch.
         <br/>
         - Additional
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="http://Salesforce.com" target="_self">
          Salesforce.com
         </a>
         experience includes Workflow Alerts , Actions, Approval Workflow,
         <br/>
         validation rules, Sharing rules and User management.
         <br/>
         - Experience with scratch orgs &amp; unlocked packages would be a plus point
         <br/>
         - Experience with managed packages would be a plus point.
         <br/>
         - Certification: Salesforce PD1 / PD2 / Application architect- certification would be a plus point.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Interested candidates share updated CV to
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="mailto:shaloo.r@itpeoplegulf.com" target="_self">
          shaloo.r@itpeoplegulf.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         Please go through the JD before sharing profile.
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

  <h2 class="visually-hidden">
   Feed post
  </h2>
  <div id="fie-impression-container">
   <!-- -->
   <div class="relative">
    <div class="update-components-actor display-flex update-components-actor--with-control-menu">
     <!-- -->
     <div class="update-components-actor__container display-flex flex-grow-1">
      <a aria-label="Prometheas Technologies - Software Development Company, graphic." class="app-aware-link update-components-actor__image relative" data-test-app-aware-link="" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/prometheas-technologies/posts" target="_self">
       <span class="js-update-components-actor__avatar">
        <div class="ivm-image-view-model update-components-actor__avatar">
         <div class="ivm-view-attr__img-wrapper">
          <!-- -->
          <!-- -->
          <img alt="Prometheas Technologies - Software Development Company" class="ivm-view-attr__img--centered EntityPhoto-square-3 update-components-actor__avatar-image evi-image lazy-image ember-view" height="48" id="ember2692" loading="lazy" src="https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEItgSlH1o5vQ/company-logo_100_100/0/1656434328790/prometheas_technologies_logo?e=1727913600&amp;v=beta&amp;t=cpkahWB_y69uX41zLRLxf1uXy7MVcDDF9pzVP-hD4xM" width="48"/>
         </div>
        </div>
       </span>
      </a>
      <div class="update-components-actor__meta relative">
       <a aria-label="View: Prometheas Technologies - Software Development Company 5,601 followers" class="app-aware-link update-components-actor__meta-link" data-test-app-aware-link="" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/prometheas-technologies/posts" target="_self">
        <span class="update-components-actor__title">
         <span class="update-components-actor__name hoverable-link-text t-14 t-bold t-black">

            <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">

          </div>
          <span class="update-components-article__description update-components-article__description--truncated t-12 t-normal t-black--light" dir="ltr" id="update-components-article__description-ember2691">
           As mentioned above, the extended team model is a refined and more productive version of the outsourcing model. So, if offshoring and traditional outso

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         🌐 Notetech Solutions is making waves in the realm of offshore software development! 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         As an offshore outsourcing software company, Notetech has mastered the art of understanding the unique needs of each client and tailoring teams to meet these requirements.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Their offshore software development team is a powerhouse of talent, expertise, and dedication. These professionals work tirelessly to assist customers in developing their products/projects. They are not just developers; they are problem solvers who delve deep into the heart of the issue to provide the most effective solutions.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Notetech’s offshore services are a testament to India’s growing prominence as a quintessential offshore outsourcing hub. They are helping businesses globally reach their targets through expert assistance. This is a significant contribution to the global IT industry and a reflection of the incredible talent available in India.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Working on a Corporate-to-Corporate remote basis, Notetech’s offshore team is a shining example of how technology can bridge gaps, foster collaboration, and drive success in today’s digital age. They are proving that geographical boundaries are no longer a barrier to achieving business objectives.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         In a world where businesses are increasingly looking for cost-effective, efficient, and high-quality software solutions, Notetech’s offshore team is a beacon of hope. They are demonstrating that it is possible to deliver top-notch services while maintaining a remote working model.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Let’s celebrate the power of offshore teams and the incredible value they bring to our businesses! 🎉👏
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7127241311803342848">
          #OffshoreDevelopment
         </a>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Have a client looking for a hands on CTO that can manage all aspects of their technology needs.  Will be responsible for managing a team of 8 both on shore and offshore.  Must have experience with LAMP stack and must have extensive experience working on SAAS products that utilize AWS.  You are not expected to code all the time; maybe 5% but need to have the technical experience to have technical discussions with the development team and be able to troubleshoot technical issues at a high level as ultimately you will be responsible for all technical aspects and delivery of their products and drive product features in the future.  The client is in Clearwater and are expected to be onsite most of the time.  They have an awesome company culture and have placed people there before.  Salary is between 150-170k with a bonus. If you think you have the skills reach out to me as they are looking for this person to start early Dec ideally.
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:mmoenter@hotmail.com" target="_self">
          mmoenter@hotmail.com
         </a>
         or call me 925-989-1714.
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=saas&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115461450969534464">
          #SAAS
         </a>
         ,
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=technology&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115461450969534464">
          #technology
         </a>
         executive,

   <!-- -->
   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hi one of my friend looking for sales forces technical lead/ Practice head
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Company Name- Cloudy Coders
         <br/>
         Job Location-Noida ( Uttar Pradesh)
         <br/>
         Experience required- 5+
         <br/>
         Required Qualification- B.E/
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="http://B.Tech/" target="_self">
          B.Tech/
         </a>
         MCA/BCA/MCM or Any relevant technical qualification
         <br/>
         work from office
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         1- Responsible for translating business requirements into system qualities and hence into repeatable design strategies and patterns that enable those qualities (e.g., adaptability, scalability, availability, non-repudiation, reusability, etc.)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         2- Design and Develop Software by following SOA design and development guidelines, understanding the
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="http://Force.com" target="_self">
          Force.com
         </a>
         platform, following Best Practices for Coding and Reviewing, and following the complete SW lifecycle.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         3- Determines the overall priority ranking of each of the possible system qualities (cost, reusability, robustness, etc.)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         4- Responsible for defining the application tiers, frameworks, component types, and interfaces.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         5- Effective communication with both technical and business teams; Strong design experience and technical knowledge; Analytical and 'joined-up' thinking; Conflict resolution. Need to set up a good collaboration with the Offshore development team.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         6 -Establish a technology strategy at the application level.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         7 -Team player and quick learner with a desire to learn recent technologies.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         8 -Build reusable components and Service layered frameworks for Nimble products.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         9- Making sure the team is following the process thoroughly as set by Project Manager, discussing with PM any deviations from the process, and maintaining the various artifacts and dashboards with the help of the team.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         10- Innovative thinker who is positive, proactive, and readily embraces change.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         11- Ability to work with a geographically dispersed organization and customers.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         12- We need to make sure that Architectural strategy is intact prior to feature development begins.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         13- Provide guidance to the team wherever required and should be proactive in removing technical blockers.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         PLEASE SHARE YOUR RESUME ON-
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="mailto:ayushdeepsrivastava@gmail.com" target="_self">
          ayushdeepsrivastava@gmail.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:198.8125px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Dear connections,
         <br/>
         Hope you are Doing well
         <br/>
         We are looking for Below Position :-
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=role&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7125725362684076032">
          #Role
         </a>
         : SAP ABAP with S/4 Hana and CDS and AMDP, ODATA + OO ABAP
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=work&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7125725362684076032">
          #Work
         </a>
         location : Pan India
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=notice&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7125725362684076032">
          #Notice
         </a>
         period : Immediate to 15 days
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=position&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7125725362684076032">
          #Position
         </a>
         : Permanent
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=experience&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7125725362684076032">
          #Experience
         </a>
         :6-10 Years
         <br/>
         Job Title: Senior Engineering Manager - Offshore Development and Client Relations
         <br/>
         Job Description:
         <br/>
         Position Overview: As a Senior Technical Manager, you will play a pivotal role in overseeing our offshore development center's operations and nurturing client relationships within the US healthcare industry. Your technical expertise, leadership skills, and domain knowledge will be instrumental in ensuring the successful delivery of high-quality IT solutions.
         <br/>
         Key Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         1. Offshore Development Center Management:
         <br/>
         - Lead and manage a team of software engineers, ensuring they deliver projects on time and within budget.- 2. Client Relationship Management:
         <br/>
         Act as a trusted advisor to clients in the US healthcare sector, understanding their unique requirements and challenges.- Establish and maintain strong client relationships by providing exceptional service, understanding client needs, and addressing concerns proactively.- Collaborate with clients to define project scopes, timelines, and deliverables.3. Technical Expertise:- Leverage your hands-on software engineering experience to provide technical guidance and oversight to development team- Stay up-to-date with industry trends, especially in US healthcare IT, and apply this knowledge to project strategies.• Project Management Tools: - Azure ADO, JIRA or Similar:• Development Environment: - Integrated Development Environments (IDEs): Familiarity with popular IDEs like Visual Studio Code, IntelliJ IDEA, or Eclipse, depending on the technology stack.• Containerization Tools: Docker and Kubernetes for container orchestration (if applicable)
         <br/>
         • Cloud Services: - (AWS), Microsoft Azure, or (GCP): Depending on the company's cloud infrastructure, familiarity with cloud services and deployment is often essential.• Database Management: - SQL and NoSQL Databases: Understanding of both relational and NoSQL database.• (CI/CD): - Jenkins, Travis CI, CircleCI, or GitLab CI/CD: Knowledge of CI/CD tools for automating software delivery pipelines.• Monitoring and Logging: - Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana): Tools for monitoring, alerting, and log analysis.• Code Review and Collaboration: - GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket: Platforms for code hosting, collaboration, and code review.• Agile/Scrum Tools: - Agile Project Management Software(If any)• Project Delivery:- Ensure the successful execution of projects, monitoring progress, and mitigating risks.- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align project goals with client expectations.
         <br/>
         Interested professionals please share profile or any reference if you have to
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="mailto:vasam@businessintelli.com" target="_self">
          vasam@businessintelli.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         Business Intelli solutions
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

         Role : Senior Software Engineer
         <br/>
         YOE : 4 to 9 Years
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>

         <br/>
         Location : Hyderabad (Hybrid Mode)
         <br/>
         <br/>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=qa&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7150485502545018880">
          #QA
         </a>
         Project Manager
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=torrance&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7150485502545018880">
          #Torrance
         </a>
         , CA
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hybrid&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7150485502545018880">
          #Hybrid
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=contract&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7150485502545018880">
          #Contract
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Hi Professionals,
         <br/>
         Hope you are doing well.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are looking for QA Project Manager - Torrance , CA (Hybrid) – Contract with one of our Clients. If you are available and interested then please reply me with details below the Job Description along with your updated resume in Word format.
         <br/>
         Please give me a call back at Mobile: 609-333-9000 EX: 64 or you can E-Mail me at
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="mailto:manasa@softcomsystems.com" target="_self">
          manasa@softcomsystems.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Title: QA Project Manager
         <br/>
         Location: Torrance , CA (Hybrid – weekly 3 days’ work from office)
         <br/>
         Hire Type: Contract
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Note:
         <br/>
         Experience with connected car technologies
         <br/>
         Over all 12+ years of experience and minimum 5-6 Years’ experience with Automotive Industry
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Description:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Daily Tasks Performed:
         <br/>
         Successfully manage multiple simultaneous projects for a major automotive manufacturing company’s digital services department team -focusing on improving quality of delivered products while demonstrating proficiency in utilizing data tracking tools in collaboration with cross-functional teams.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What will this person be working on:
         <br/>
         As a Quality Project Manager (PM), this person will be responsible for leading and managing end-to-end quality assurance projects within this company’s digital service division, utilize robust project management methodologies to drive efficiency and continuous improvement, collaborate with cross-functional teams to establish and maintain quality standards while ensuring compliance with industry regulations, triage critical issue investigations impacting customer experiences and application functions, and define and track KPIs for each transformation track.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Top 5 Required Skills:
         <br/>
         1.           Microsoft Office 365 – Excel, PowerPoint, Word
         <br/>
         2.           Project Management
         <br/>
         3.           Critical Thinking - Problem Solving
         <br/>
         4.           Mobile App Software Development
         <br/>
         5.           Data Science
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Position Success Criteria (Desired) - 'WANTS':
         <br/>
         •            A minimum of 5 years’ experience in the automotive industry.
         <br/>
         •            Experience working with telematics.
         <br/>
         •            Can demonstrate proficiency with data tools such as Amplitude, Power BI, and Tableau. • Strong knowledge and experience utilizing SQL queries to investigate critical issue and locate data.
         <br/>
         •            Experience in UI/UX design for digital products. • Public speaking and presenting to executive level company leadership.
         <br/>
         •            Managing development and quality efforts of both onshore and offshore offices – primarily working with resources located in India.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Thanks &amp; Regards,
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Manasa.N
         <br/>
         Technical Recruiter
         <br/>
         Softcom Systems, Inc.
         <br/>
         Desk: 609-333-9000 EX: 64
         <br/>
         Email:
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="mailto:manasa@softcomsystems.com" target="_self">
          manasa@softcomsystems.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         Website:
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="http://www.softcomsystems.com" target="_self">
          www.softcomsystems.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        Introducing: i-Bridge Systems Philippines Inc.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Are you looking to expand your software development capabilities without breaking the bank? Look no further than i-Bridge Systems Philippines Inc., a leading Japanese software research and development company based in the Philippines.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        With our team of talented Filipino engineers, we offer a unique combination of Japanese expertise and Filipino innovation. Our offshore development services are designed to provide you with high-quality, cost-effective solutions that meet your specific needs.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Why choose  i-Bridge Systems Philippines Inc.?
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Talent Pool: We have access to a vast pool of highly skilled and English-proficient Filipino engineers who are well-versed in various technology and standards.
        <br/>
        Cost-Effective: Our offshore development services offer significant cost savings compared to traditional in-house development in Japan and other countries.
        <br/>
        Flexibility: We can adapt to your project requirements, from small-scale development to large-scale projects.
        <br/>
        Japanese Expertise: Our team has extensive experience working with Japanese companies, ensuring that our solutions meet your specific requirements with the highest quality mindset and we are more than ready to bridge the world and expand our reach outside the Asia Pacific region.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        What We Can Offer
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Software Development: Customized software solutions for various industries, including mobile apps, web applications, and enterprise software.
        <br/>
        Consulting Services: Expert advice on software development methodologies, project management, and technology selection.
        <br/>
        Testing and Quality Assurance: Comprehensive testing and QA services to ensure the quality of our solutions.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Join the i-Bridge Systems Philippines Inc. family today!
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Let us help you take your business to the next level with our cutting-edge software development solutions. Contact us today to learn more about how we can support your business needs.
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
