   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         We are looking for a Project Manager for our US based clients to join our team.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         A Project Manager of project management experience that can help us achieving the following for our US based clients :
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Responsible for ensuring consistent reporting, risk mitigation, time line, and cost control.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         To help ensure that the software development process works as it is intended.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         To work closely with the Functional Managers in order to facilitate, encourage, and prioritize the process.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Plan, execute, monitor, control, and close projects based on Project Management best practices.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Setup required communications and meetings with offshore clients to collect requirements, prepare scope.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Produce project deliverables on time, within budget and within scope and maintain an updated Project Schedule at all times.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Professional development and training for team members.
         <br/>
         Responsible for preparing and reporting status reports to higher management.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Make sure that the process goes forward and use a variety of processes, meetings, and documents (artifacts) to ensure continued forward progress and to identify problems as soon as possible.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Make sure everybody follow guidelines and processes define by the company and monitor them.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Make certain that the development team keeps versions and configurations in proper version control.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Must make sure that lessons learned are shared with the required personnel.
         <br/>
         Responsible of the on-time delivery of the solution.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Must abide by all company policies and procedures.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Education:
         <br/>
         Bachelor's (Required)
         <br/>
         Experience:
         <br/>
         Project Manager: 3 years (Required)
         <br/>
         Job Type: Full-time
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Apply at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:hr@lntechnologies.com" target="_self">
          hr@lntechnologies.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:429.984375px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--2-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Happy Wednesday Connections! We are currently hiring for Offshore Business Development Manager - Recruitment Services (Canadian Market).
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are seeking a highly motivated Offshore Business Development Manager to join our team. As an Offshore Business Development Manager, your primary focus will be on identifying and targeting Canadian-based companies that require recruitment services. We are specifically looking for candidates who have a background in recruitment sales to leverage their expertise in engaging with potential clients. Your ability to build strong relationships, understand client needs, and effectively communicate the value of our recruitment services will be essential in driving business growth.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Requirements:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         · Recruitment Sales Experience: Proven track record in sales within the recruitment industry, preferably with experience in business development and client acquisition.
         <br/>
         · Familiarity with recruitment processes, talent acquisition, and staffing services is essential.
         <br/>
         · Knowledge of Canadian Market: In-depth understanding of the Canadian job market, recruitment trends, industry sectors, and regulatory landscape related to recruitment services. Previous experience targeting Canadian-based companies is highly desirable.
         <br/>
         · Relationship Management Skills: Strong interpersonal and relationship-building skills to establish trust and credibility with clients. Ability to effectively navigate decision-making processes and build lasting partnerships.
         <br/>
         · Consultative Selling Approach: Demonstrated ability to understand client needs, ask probing questions, and offer tailored solutions based on their requirements. A consultative selling mindset is essential to effectively position our recruitment services.
         <br/>
         · Excellent Communication: Exceptional verbal and written communication skills to articulate complex concepts, deliver persuasive presentations, and negotiate contracts.
         <br/>
         · Bilingual proficiency in English and French is an advantage.
         <br/>
         · Target Orientation: Self-motivated with a proven ability to work independently and meet or exceed sales targets. Strong business acumen and results-driven mindset are crucial.
         <br/>
         · Negotiation and Contract Management: Proficient in negotiation techniques, contract management, and closing deals. Ability to balance client expectations with the company's profitability.
         <br/>
         · CRM and Sales Tools: Experience working with Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software, sales automation tools, and productivity applications to manage sales activities and maintain accurate client records.
         <br/>
         · Travel Flexibility: Willingness to travel as required for client meetings, industry events, and business development opportunities within Canada.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Please send your resume to
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:dustine.roxas@nezdaglobal.com" target="_self">
          dustine.roxas@nezdaglobal.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

<div class="feed-shared-update-v2 feed-shared-update-v2--minimal-padding full-height relative feed-shared-update-v2--wrapped" data-urn="urn:li:activity:7095760857866924032" id="ember3093" role="region">

  <h2 class="visually-hidden">
   Feed post
  </h2>
  <div id="fie-impression-container">
   <!-- -->
   <div class="relative">
    <div class="update-components-actor display-flex update-components-actor--with-control-menu">

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Need a new web or mobile app? Let The Nine Hertz team of software developers help you make your idea a reality. We offer affordable and high-quality software development services to help you get the right solution for your needs.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Software development by qualified professionals with years of experience in the field has never been so easy and affordable. Save up to 50% in comparison to other companies by contacting us today.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The professionals at our company have developed countless web and mobile apps over the years, so we know what customers are looking for when it comes to a successful product. We have the skillset and expertise to help you find the best solution for your needs — all at any budget.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Ritika Raheja
         <br/>
         Connect with me on +91-9799565063
         <br/>
         Or Email –
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:ritika@theninehertz.com" target="_self">
          ritika@theninehertz.com
         </a>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Company: Periscope Labs Ltd.
         <br/>
         Website:
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://periscopelabs.io/" target="_self">
          https://periscopelabs.io/
         </a>
         <br/>
         Position: Technical Business Analyst
         <br/>
         Summary: We are looking for a Technical Business Analyst to join our team. This person will own the requirements process and serve as an internal expert with regards to technical systems and third party API’s. This individual will work very closely with US/Europe based clients.
         <br/>
         Experience: 3-5 years of experience as a business analyst, technical analyst, or in a similar role.
         <br/>
         Job Type: Full-time
         <br/>
         Salary: 80K – 120K (Based on Experience)
         <br/>
         Vacancy: 01
         <br/>
         <br/>
         TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:
         <br/>
         · Scope, document and validate business requirements for technical projects. Translate business requirements (stories, etc) into technically relevant specifications
         <br/>
         · Analyze and document enterprise system integration requirements which results in high-quality integrations to meet the requirements of stakeholders and external integration partners
         <br/>
         · Partner with Product Managers, other Business Analysts, and stakeholders to discover and document functional and non-functional requirements, user acceptance testing scenarios
         <br/>
         · Ability to document detailed integration requirements &amp; mapping specifications
         <br/>
         · Develop and execute test plans and test scripts
         <br/>
         · Knowledge of software development life cycle (SDLC) methodologies such as Agile, Waterfall, etc.
         <br/>
         · Experience in requirement gathering &amp; analysis, translation into understandable &amp; detailed functional requirements/non-functional requirements/user stories needed to build interfaces between systems.
         <br/>
         · Strong attention to detail and ability to prioritize tasks to meet project timelines.
         <br/>
         · Familiarity with SQL, API, database design, and data analysis.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ADDITIONAL SKILLS AND REQUIREMENTS:
         <br/>
         · Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to gather and analyze data to make informed decisions.
         <br/>
         · Experience with working with offshore customers (North America, Europe, etc.) in a senior developer or analyst role.
         <br/>
         · Excellent English communication Skills - both verbal and written.
         <br/>
         · Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
         <br/>
         · Experience in Agile Development, Scrum &amp; Kanban methodologies
         <br/>
         · Familiarity with project management tools and techniques, such as JIRA, Trello, Asana, etc.
         <br/>
         · Quick learner, and able to work in a dynamic, fast paced and often changing environment.
         <br/>
         · Adapt and be effective working with local, remote, global team members in global time-zones.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND:
         <br/>
         Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science/Engineering, CIS, or a related field.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         WORKING HOURS AND COMPENSATION
         <br/>
         · Working Hours: 8 Hours ( Flexible, Hybrid (onsite and remote) )
         <br/>
         · Weekend: 2 days a week
         <br/>
         · 2 Festival bonuses
         <br/>
         Email your CV at:
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="mailto:sharifahmed@periscopelabs.io" target="_self">
          sharifahmed@periscopelabs.io
         </a>
         ,
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="mailto:shahariar@periscopelabs.io" target="_self">
          shahariar@periscopelabs.io
         </a>
         ,
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="mailto:emamhossain@periscopelabs.io" target="_self">
          emamhossain@periscopelabs.io
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Elevate Your Software Development: Outsource with Confidence to
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/weblineindia/">
          WeblineIndia
         </a>
         ! 🚀💻
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Hello LinkedIn community! 👋 Are you on the lookout for a reliable partner to bring your custom software development projects to life? Look no further! 🌐✨
         <a data-attribute-index="2" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/weblineindia/">
          WeblineIndia
         </a>
         is your go-to offshore software development company, and here's why you should consider outsourcing your projects to them. 🌍💼
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌐 Global Expertise, Local Understanding:
         <br/>
         WeblineIndia boasts a diverse team of seasoned professionals with global expertise in software development. Their deep understanding of local and international markets ensures that your software solutions are not just technically sound but also cater to the unique needs of your target audience.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🔧 Custom Solutions Tailored to Perfection:
         <br/>
         No two projects are the same, and WeblineIndia understands that. They specialize in crafting custom software solutions tailored to meet your specific business requirements. From concept to execution, they work closely with you to ensure every aspect of your vision is brought to life.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         💡 Innovation at its Core:
         <br/>
         Staying ahead in the ever-evolving tech landscape requires innovation. WeblineIndia prides itself on being at the forefront of technological advancements. By choosing them as your development partner, you gain access to cutting-edge solutions that keep your business ahead of the curve.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌐 Seamless Communication and Collaboration:
         <br/>
         Communication is key to successful outsourcing. WeblineIndia values transparent and effective communication. With robust project management systems in place, you'll be kept in the loop at every stage of development, fostering a collaborative environment that ensures project success.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         💻 Cost-Effective Solutions without Compromise:
         <br/>
         Outsourcing with WeblineIndia allows you to leverage cost advantages without compromising on quality. Their efficient development processes and competitive pricing make them an ideal choice for businesses looking to optimize their development budgets.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         📈 Proven Track Record of Success:
         <br/>
         WeblineIndia has a stellar track record of successfully delivering projects across various industries. Client satisfaction is at the heart of their business, and their portfolio speaks volumes about the quality and reliability of their services.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Ready to take your software development projects to new heights? Consider outsourcing to WeblineIndia and experience the difference! 🚀💻
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://lnkd.in/dZNBWG2c" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/dZNBWG2c
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Have questions or want to share your experiences with outsourcing? Let's start a conversation in the comments below! 👇
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7143102749423968258">
          #SoftwareDevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7143102749423968258">
          #Outsourcing
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=techinnovation&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7143102749423968258">
          #TechInnovation
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=weblineindia&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7143102749423968258">
          #WeblineIndia
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=businesssolutions&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7143102749423968258">
          #BusinessSolutions
         </a>

<div class="feed-shared-update-v2 feed-shared-update-v2--minimal-padding full-height relative feed-shared-update-v2--e2e feed-shared-update-v2--wrapped" data-urn="urn:li:activity:7086603034910171137" id="ember3182" role="region">
 <div>
  <div role="status">
   <!-- -->
  </div>
  <h2 class="visually-hidden">
   Feed post
  </h2>
  <div id="fie-impression-container">
   <!-- -->
   <div class="relative">
    <div class="update-components-actor display-flex update-components-actor--with-control-menu">
     <!-- -->
     <div class="update-components-actor__container display-flex flex-grow-1">
      <a aria-label="nearshorefriends GmbH , graphic." class="app-aware-link update-components-actor__image relative" data-test-app-aware-link="" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/nearshorefriends/posts" target="_self">
       <span class="js-update-components-actor__avatar">

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         🌍 Unlock Cost-effective Talent with Offshore Development Centers (ODCs) 💼💻
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Looking to scale your offshore software development capabilities? Offshore development centers (ODCs) are the answer! An ODC is a dedicated facility in a different country where you can establish your extended development team. This remote team becomes an integral part of your company, aligning with your structure, ethics, culture, and schedule. But how do you set up an offshore development center?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Today, we'll provide a step-by-step guide on establishing an ODC, covering essential considerations and best practices. Stay tuned for valuable insights!
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://lnkd.in/eyEKQChn" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/eyEKQChn
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoredevelopmentcenter&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7086603034910171137">
          #OffshoreDevelopmentCenter
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=odc&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7086603034910171137">
          #ODC
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7086603034910171137">
          #SoftwareDevelopment
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

        </span>
       </a>
      </div>

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         📢 Exciting News for Professionals and Businesses! 🚀
         <br/>
         I am thrilled to share with all of you an incredible opportunity for companies looking to leverage the power of offshore development centers. 🌍✨
         <br/>
         🔗 LINK:
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://lnkd.in/dWeGGmwb" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/dWeGGmwb
         </a>
         <br/>
         🌐 Binary Informatics Offshore Development Center 🌐
         <br/>
         Binary Informatics, a leading global software development company, is proud to present its Offshore Development Center (ODC) services! This comprehensive offering is designed to empower businesses of all sizes to maximize their potential and achieve unprecedented growth. 📈
         <br/>
         With Binary Informatics' Offshore Development Center, you gain access to an expert team of highly skilled professionals, state-of-the-art infrastructure, and cutting-edge technology. By establishing a dedicated ODC, you can seamlessly extend your existing team, scale up your operations, and achieve remarkable cost savings. 💼💰
         <br/>
         ✨ Key Benefits of Binary Informatics' Offshore Development Center: ✨
         <br/>
         1️⃣ Cost Efficiency: Optimize your budget and reduce operational costs significantly, without compromising on quality or productivity.
         <br/>
         2️⃣ Access to Top Talent: Tap into a vast pool of skilled developers, engineers, and IT professionals to augment your team and tackle complex projects.
         <br/>
         3️⃣ Scalability: Seamlessly scale your operations up or down based on your business requirements, allowing you to adapt to changing market dynamics.
         <br/>
         4️⃣ Enhanced Productivity: Leverage Binary Informatics' proven methodologies, efficient project management, and streamlined processes to ensure optimal productivity and faster time-to-market.
         <br/>
         5️⃣ Focus on Core Competencies: By entrusting your software development and IT needs to Binary Informatics, you can redirect your internal resources towards core business functions and strategic initiatives.
         <br/>
         💼💻 Take your Business to New Heights with Binary Informatics! 💼💻
         <br/>
         Whether you're a startup aiming to disrupt the market or an established enterprise looking to stay ahead of the competition, Binary Informatics' Offshore Development Center is the perfect solution to fuel your success. 🚀
         <br/>
         Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to elevate your business to new heights. Visit the link below to learn more about Binary Informatics' Offshore Development Center and unlock the potential of offshore collaboration.
         <br/>
         🔗 LINK:
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://lnkd.in/dWeGGmwb" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/dWeGGmwb
         </a>
         <br/>
         ✨ Join the conversation! ✨ 👇 Comment below and let us know how an Offshore Development Center can benefit your organization. 👇
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoredevelopmentcenter&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7079093502105591808">

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Greetings from Inceptial!!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This is with regard to an excellent opportunity with us and if you have that unique and unlimited passion for building world-class enterprise software products that turn into actionable intelligence, then we have the right opportunity for you and your career.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This is an opportunity with Inceptial Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What are we looking for
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Role: Sr. PHP Developer
         <br/>
         Experience: 2+ Years (relevant)
         <br/>
         Location: Kolkata
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This is what we should specifically look for
         <br/>
         <br/>
         PHP Development
         <br/>
         Hands-on WordPress ecosystem
         <br/>
         Extensive development experience on WooCommerce.
         <br/>
         Experienced in WordPress Plugin development, Plugin Submission to Market Place.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Wishing you all the very best!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         In case you might want to get in touch with us for better assistance, please feel free to email us at
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="mailto:soumyajit@inceptialtech.com" target="_self">
          soumyajit@inceptialtech.com
         </a>
         and we would be more than glad to help you.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         About Company:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are a global business solutions, product development, and IT services firm.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are a niche Cloud Consulting Firm specializing in Oracle and Salesforce Cloud Applications. We are headquartered in the USA with operations in the UK and several locations in India. We have invested in Cloud solutions and services for the past 10 years. Our Offshore Delivery Centre handles cutting-edge technology projects for International and national clients.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Over a period of time, Inceptial has broadened its horizon across Application Development &amp;amp; Modernization, Analytics, and Infrastructure Solutions. At Inceptial we help drive Customer Success by leveraging our expertise in IT Solutions and Business Process improvements. Our approach of “Client First” focuses on providing a dedicated and committed team to help our customers achieve their goals. With our “Trusted Partner” services philosophy, we have developed several frameworks and accelerators in various technologies. We have evolved to be thought leaders and we play a critical role in formulating our client’s business strategy. We consider ourselves a pioneer in creating industry-specific business solutions. Our team is adept at creating new-age digital practices that enable extensive business growth through value addition.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Inceptial has been recognized as the only implementation partner by Oracle for its various projects in Eastern India.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Thanks &amp; Regards,
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Soumyajit Debnath
         <br/>
         Talent Acquisition- IT
         <br/>
         <br/>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hello Connections!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Urgent hiring for Account Manager role with excellent communication skills (USA- Software Sales). Interested candidate can DM resume.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Experience- 1-9 years (preference US/UK Sales / US collections)
         <br/>
         Salary- Best in industry
         <br/>
         Location- Noida
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Are you a Sales Superstar? Looking to really advance your sales and marketing career working on a highly visible and strategic project? Wanting to be recognized for your sales capabilities? Thrive on cutting-edge technology? And, get paid well in the process? If you are ready to take your career to the next level, read on.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Highlands is marketing the next generation in software for a large US-based client. Since 2004, Highlands continues to develop and market state-of-the-art software for global markets. For additional information about Highlands, visit
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="http://www.highlands.in" target="_self">
          www.highlands.in
         </a>
         <br/>
         Job Description
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are currently looking to hire several Account Managers to work in a Business Development Department for a USA-based software company.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The right candidate is an excellent communicator, with understanding of complex technologies benefits for clients and has proven ability to sell. The right person also has a keen eye for new opportunities and skills for presenting them effectively to our clients. The responsibilities will be to generate, develop, and close sales opportunities.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         A successful candidate will be responsible for handling the business development activities. The key role will be new business development and client retention. Lead generation, client communication, relationship building, and consistently closing business on a monthly basis in order to meet or exceed targets are important job responsibilities.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Candidate must be willing to work USA-based hours.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Requirements
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The job requirements for this position include:
         <br/>
         ·         Minimum of 1+ Year in business development, preferably in software sales.
         <br/>
         ·         Excellent knowledge of the IT services and experience of international marketing is an added advantage.
         <br/>
         ·         Great team player.
         <br/>
         ·         Should possess excellent skills for account handling and client relationship building.
         <br/>
         ·         Strong communication and organizational skills.
         <br/>
         ·         The ability to multi-task is critical.
         <br/>
         ·         Exceptional listening, problem solving, and follow through skills.
         <br/>
         ·         Experience through the entire sales cycle, including: building a pipeline, creating a proposal, presenting and discussing solutions with         critical decision-makers, and contract negotiation is required.
         <br/>
         ·         Managing a complex, solution sale with a 1 to 6 month purchasing cycle is preferred.
         <br/>
         ·         Lead generation, client retention, and achieving targets.
         <br/>
         ·         Fluent written and spoken English.
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:443.34375px" type="button">

    <div class="update-components-article--with-small-image update-components-article--with-small-image-fs">
     <div class="update-components-article__link-container">
      <a aria-label="Open article: Software Outsourcing, Offshore Software Development Company | Highlands by highlands.in" class="app-aware-link tap-target" data-test-app-aware-link="" href="http://www.highlands.in" target="_blank">
       <div class="ivm-image-view-model">
        <div class="ivm-view-attr__img-wrapper">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--2-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Excited to share my latest research resulted with 3 critical CVEs affecting almost every Apple device in the world.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The research was focused on the popular dependency manager CocoaPods.  CocoaPods is the de facto dependency manager for iOS, macOS and the rest of the Apple ecosystem, with about 100,000 libraries used in over 3 million mobile applications.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         It was a pleasure collaborating with
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAA4ECi0BEI4jcT5dnBvAE1lixxZfo5VIluk">
          Eran Vaknin
         </a>
         on this highly impactful research!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Have a nice read 😀
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:249.171875px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more
      </span>
     </button>
     <!-- -->
    </div>

   </div>

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7182999249066856449">
          #Hiring
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hellolinkies&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7182999249066856449">
          #hellolinkies
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=opportunity&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7182999249066856449">
          #opportunity
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=wfh&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7182999249066856449">
          #WFH
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=netdevloper&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7182999249066856449">
          #netdevloper
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=apply&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7182999249066856449">
          #apply
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=greatplacetowork&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7182999249066856449">
          #greatplacetowork
         </a>
         <br/>
         AllianceTek Inc. is a leading software development company in Pennsylvania, US. Our experienced IT team provides customized software &amp; web solutions using technologies like .NET, SharePoint, PHP, Salesforce, React JS, Node JS etc. &amp; mobile platforms like iOS, Android &amp; Windows. We provides an onshore client service &amp; project management team along with overseas developers &amp; designers to deliver the maximum benefit to our clients.
         <br/>
         Since a decade, we have provided innovative, technologically advanced solutions across industries including mobile solutions, ERP, EMR, E-learning, Enterprise Content Management, Cloud, Collaboration, Business Intelligence, Business Process Management, Customer Relationship Management, Integration solutions, among others.
         <br/>
         AllianceTek having its existence globally possess its offshore development centers and existence in India at Rajkot and Ahmedabad location at the name of Denali Software Solutions.
         <br/>
         As a part of expansion of our team in India, AllianceTek is looking for talented people who aspires to grab great opportunities available with the organization and Our talented and experienced team would like to welcome the young professionals who have keen interest to explore their knowledge and skills for career goal.
         <br/>
         Why to join AllianceTek:
         <br/>
         5 working days
         <br/>
         Flexible working culture
         <br/>
         Job Security
         <br/>
         Exposure to work on latest technologies with international clients
         <br/>
         Employee friendly policies
         <br/>
         Best career and monetary growth
         <br/>
         Mediclaim Benefit
         <br/>
         WFH Opportunity
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Description:
         <br/>
         We are looking for .NET MVC developers(On-site requirement) who possess below mentioned skills :
         <br/>
         Must be proficient in .Net MVC.
         <br/>
         Minimum 1.5 years of experience.
         <br/>
         Must have Familiarity with MVC architecture.
         <br/>
         Upgrading, configuring and debugging existing systems.
         <br/>
         Providing technical support for web, desktop or mobile applications.
         <br/>
         Participate in requirements analysis.
         <br/>
         Collaborate with internal teams to produce software design and architecture.
         <br/>
         Write clean, scalable code using .NET programming languages.
         <br/>
         Test and deploy applications and systems.
         <br/>
         Revise, update, refactor and debug code.
         <br/>
         Improve existing software.
         <br/>
         Develop documentation throughout the software development life cycle (SDLC).
         <br/>
         Full Stack combination will added advantage.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Skills Required:-
         <br/>
         Proven experience Net application developer specially in web technology like
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="http://ASP.Net" target="_self">
          ASP.Net
         </a>
         MVC.
         <br/>
         Familiarity with
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="http://ASP.Net" target="_self">
          ASP.Net
         </a>
         MVC REST API.
         <br/>
         You should be well versed with Programming skills like
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="http://ASP.net" target="_self">
          ASP.net
         </a>
         MVC,Entity Framework,jQuery,SQL Server.
         <br/>
         To develop the guidelines and conventions not only for
         <a data-attribute-index="10" href="http://ASP.NET" target="_self">
          ASP.NET
         </a>
         MVC but also for SQL Server, CSS, HTML, JavaScript and C# .Net. , Knowledge of .NET Core would be preferable.
         <br/>
         AGILE Fundamental and working methodology.
         <br/>
         Should have familiarities code repositories like GitHub, SVN etc...
         <br/>
         Working in code Must be TEAM MAN and open for Advance level Programming Challenges.
         <br/>
         Interested candidate can DM me.
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

   <!-- -->
   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--2-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Why choose
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="http://CusDev.me" target="_self">
          CusDev.me
         </a>
         as a Global Partnership Network when I can find contractor for my project by myself?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         -
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="http://CusDev.me" target="_self">
          CusDev.me
         </a>
         offers a unified development unit focused on providing a holistic approach to software development, offering a wide range of services beyond just outsourcing providing the access to a streamlined collaboration, and over 15,000 IT professionals worldwide.
         <br/>
         when
         <br/>
         - Usual Outsourcing Company provides only specific project-based service due to their experience and have issues with resource scalability.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Brief comparison:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Outsourcing to
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="http://CusDev.me" target="_self">
          CusDev.me
         </a>
         :
         <br/>
         - No need to waste time searching through the internet: you get access to a global network of IT professionals.
         <br/>
         - Easy and fast way to pick a relevant team for your exact needs..
         <br/>
         - Tailored solutions for unique project requirements.
         <br/>
         - Comprehensive experience across various industries.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Outsourcing to company found on Google search
         <br/>
         - Cost-effective solution for specific project needs.
         <br/>
         - Limited scalability of resources based on project requirements.
         <br/>
         - May not address your long-term strategic needs.
         <br/>
         - Potential communication and cultural differences when working with offshore teams.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Both options are significant for if you are looking to augment your software development capabilities or access specific expertise without the need for in-house resources.
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="http://CusDev.me" target="_self">
          CusDev.me
         </a>
         operates as a global partnership network, offering access to a diverse range of top-tier IT companies worldwide.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The choice between the two depends on the specific needs and goals of the organization, with
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="http://CusDev.me" target="_self">
          CusDev.me
         </a>
         providing a more comprehensive and integrated approach, while traditional outsourcing offers a more project-specific solution.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Contact us now @
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="http://CusDev.me" target="_self">
          CusDev.me
         </a>
         or via LinkedIn message to start a discussion and we’ll help you with any kind of your IT Needs.
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:223.40625px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more
      </span>
     </button>

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=copied&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7186703308714033153">
          #copied
         </a>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=scrum&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7186703308714033153">
          #Scrum
         </a>
         Masters with
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=usd&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7186703308714033153">
          #USD
         </a>
         salaries !
         <br/>
         <br/>
         A call for Scrum Masters !
         <br/>
         <br/>
         SBS is looking for an experienced "Scrum Masters" to join one of our clients "SAMI - AEC", one of the market Leads companies in Saudi Arabia outsourced from SBS and Offshoring from Egypt.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         SBS "Specialized Business Solutions" is a Saudi Software provider and Outsourcing company for STC, STCs, Alrajhi Bank, Alinma Bank, Albilad Bank, and others.
         <br/>
         SBS website:
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.sbs-sa.net/" target="_self">
          https://www.sbs-sa.net/
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job type: Full-time
         <br/>
         Work mode: Onsite
         <br/>
         Location: 6th October, Giza.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What we offer:
         <br/>
         •A Healthy &amp; flexible work environment.
         <br/>
         •very attractive Salaries (in USD).
         <br/>
         •Transportation allowance.
         <br/>
         •Social &amp; Medical insurance.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         job descriptions:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         • Bachelors Degree in computer science, software engineering or equivalent
         <br/>
         • 3+ Years of professional experience as scrum master.
         <br/>
         • Certified Scrum Master.
         <br/>
         • Proven experience as a Scrum Master in Agile software development environments.
         <br/>
         • Strong understanding of Scrum principles, Agile methodologies, and Lean practices.
         <br/>
         • Ability to adapt and thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If you are interested in this opportunity, please send your updated CV through mail on "
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="mailto:sameh.saleh@sbs-sa.net" target="_self">
          sameh.saleh@sbs-sa.net
         </a>
         " and mention the Job title in the Subject.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=scrummaster&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7186703308714033153">
          #scrummaster
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agile&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7186703308714033153">

         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agilesoftwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7186703308714033153">
          #agilesoftwaredevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7186703308714033153">
          #softwaredevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7186703308714033153">

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hello, LinkedIn network!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         It's true to say love what you do and the work will return with much positivity.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         As Partnership Manager at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/graffersid/">
          GraffersID
         </a>
         , I am passionate about helping businesses of all sizes to achieve their IT goals. I know that IT can be a complex and challenging landscape, but it doesn't have to be. That's where GraffersID comes in.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are a leading IT staff augmentation and offshore development company that provides our clients with the expertise and resources they need to succeed. We have a team of highly skilled and experienced professionals who can help you with all of your IT needs, from project management to software development to quality assurance.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We understand that every business is different, so we tailor our services to meet your specific needs and budget. We offer a variety of flexible engagement models, so you can choose the one that works best for you.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Whether you need to augment your existing team or outsource an entire project,
         <a data-attribute-index="2" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/graffersid/">
          GraffersID
         </a>
         can help. We have a proven track record of success in delivering high-quality IT solutions to clients of all sizes.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Here are just a few of the benefits of working with GraffersID:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✅Access to a pool of highly skilled and experienced IT professionals
         <br/>
         ✅Tailored services to meet your specific needs and budget
         <br/>
         ✅Flexible engagement models
         <br/>
         ✅Proven track record of success
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If you are looking for a reliable and experienced IT partner, contact
         <a data-attribute-index="4" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/graffersid/">
          GraffersID
         </a>
         today.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We would be happy to discuss your needs and how we can help you achieve your IT goals.
         <br/>
         <br/>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         At
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/progression-technologies/">
          Progression Technologies
         </a>
         , we're thrilled to bridge worlds with our specialized Offshore Development Center (ODC) in India, leveraging the incredible talent of Indian technologists to support global product development needs.
         <br/>
         Why Progression? Here’s why:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✅ Global Reach, Local Expertise: We provide the best of both worlds - international quality with local Indian expertise. Our team, based in India, consists of highly skilled software developers who are experts in their respective fields. They bring to the table innovative solutions and a commitment to quality that helps your products stand out in the competitive global market.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✅ Seamless Integration: Our offshore development center is not just a service; it's a partnership. We integrate with your teams, align with your business goals, and work as an extension of your company. This seamless integration ensures that we are on the same page, working towards the same objectives, and achieving the best results.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✅ Cost-Effective Solutions Without Compromising Quality: One of the biggest advantages of partnering with Progression is the cost efficiency we offer without ever compromising on quality. We understand the importance of budgeting in product development, and our models are designed to provide the best ROI.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✅ Adaptable and Scalable: Whether you’re a startup looking to develop your first product or an established company seeking to expand your product line, we offer adaptable and scalable solutions to meet your unique needs. Our flexible engagement models ensure that we can ramp up or scale down resources according to your project requirements.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌍 Join the League of Forward-Thinking Companies: Partner with Progression and take advantage of our Offshore Development Center in India. Let’s make your product development journey less of a challenge and more of a strategic success.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         💡 Ready to explore how Progression can transform your product development strategy? Connect with us today! Let’s innovate, develop, and progress together.
         <br/>
         <br/>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Dear Myanmar Connections.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are actively looking for experienced candidates for 𝗦𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗙𝗿𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗿 for our Partner's Foreign based Offshore IT Software Solutions Company that based in North Dagon Township, Yangon.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗦𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗙𝗿𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗿
         <br/>
         (𝗠𝗮𝗹𝗲/ 𝗙𝗲𝗺𝗮𝗹𝗲 - 4𝗣𝗼𝘀𝘁s)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗝𝗼𝗯 𝗥𝗲𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 :
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - Any Bachelor's Degree Holder or must be free from School Issues
         <br/>
         - Proven experience as a Front-End Developer, with a strong portfolio showcasing your expertise in building visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces
         <br/>
         - Proficiency in HTML5, CSS, and
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=javascript&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7154325273709035520">
          #JavaScript
         </a>
         , along with familiarity with popular frameworks such as
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=react&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7154325273709035520">
          #React
         </a>
         ,
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=vue&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7154325273709035520">
          #Vue
         </a>
         .js or Angular
         <br/>
         - Experience with version control systems (e.g., GitHub, GitLab, Maven) and the ability to collaborate effectively within a team.
         <br/>
         - Good reading and speaking in English
         <br/>
         - Software development
         <br/>
         - Testing/Debugging/Web Performance
         <br/>
         - Software and Web Development Server, Working with APIs and Development languages
         <br/>
         - Ensure user's experience with responsive applications
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗦𝗮𝗹𝗮𝗿𝘆 &amp; 𝗕𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗳𝗶𝘁𝘀 :
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - up to 2,000,000 MMK (Negotiable Salary on Candidate's Experiences and Skills)
         <br/>
         - Other Attractive Benefits
         <br/>
         - Ferry provided (nearly pick-up point
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗜𝗻𝗱𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘆:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - Foreign based Offshore Gaming IT Software Solutions Company (based in Thailand, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Dubai &amp; Qatar)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗛𝗼𝘂𝗿𝘀 :
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM (Monday to Friday)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗢𝗳𝗳 𝗗𝗮𝘆𝘀 :
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - Saturdays, Sundays &amp; Gazette Holidays
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗟𝗼𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 :
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - North Dagon Township, Yangon.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗥𝗲𝗺𝗮𝗿𝗸:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✓ Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further steps in the hiring process.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✓ Each and every applicant does not have to pay any service fees for the whole recruiting process.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝗮𝗽𝗽𝗹𝘆:
         <br/>

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Excited to share our cooperation experience with
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/gt-itcompany/">
          GT
         </a>
         | Software Development 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         GT is an offshore product development company founded in 2019 by people with backgrounds in startups, Apple, Nest &amp; Google. Some of their clients are companies like McLaren, Jaguar Land Rover, Universal Studios, E-ON, and Lumin Fitness.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Here's what we achieved together:
         <br/>
         📎 Developed a comprehensive marketing strategy tailored to GT's unique needs
         <br/>
         📎 Designed and implemented targeted advertising campaigns on social media platforms (Instagram)
         <br/>
         📎 Created engaging content to increase brand awareness and attract new clients and employees
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Looking forward to continuing our partnership and achieving even greater success together in the future!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Ready to take your business to the next level? Let's chat! Contact us today to see how we can help you achieve your marketing goals ✉️
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=socialmediamarketing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7195788500267401216">
          #socialmediamarketing
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=smmagency&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7195788500267401216">

       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        # INVITATION:
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Hi, If you're interested in partnering with an AI startup, we'd love to connect.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We are Generation AI, a small AI services / education company based in Kolkata, India. We offer a wide range of AI-related services, including Python training, data science, full-stack web development, and AI solutions.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We welcome individuals and companies looking to collaborate on AI projects. We can provide AI consultation, model generation, software development, cost-effective offshore employees, and AI training services. You can partner with us or hire offshore employees - Kolkata is a vibrant city with a rich cultural scene and a great mix of artistic, creative, and scientific talent.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        If you're interested in partnering with us, send me a message. I'd be happy to set up a short Zoom call to discuss how we can work together.
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         A Practical, Cost-Effective and Efficient Way to Grow Your Tech Company-
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Nearshoring!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         It's the outsourcing of IT services to a country that is close to your own.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This can offer a number of advantages over traditional offshoring, including:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         👉 Lower labor costs: Nearshore countries often have lower labor costs than developed countries, which can save you a significant amount of money on your IT budget.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         👉 Cultural alignment: Nearshore countries often share your cultural values and business practices, which can make it easier to communicate and collaborate with your offshore team.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         👉 Time zone alignment: Nearshore countries are often in the same or similar time zones as your home country, which can help to reduce communication delays and improve productivity.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         👉 Access to a skilled workforce: Nearshore countries often have a highly skilled workforce in IT, which can give you access to the talent you need to grow your business.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         At
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/city-tech-consultants/">
          City Tech Consultants
         </a>
         , we have years of experience in nearshoring IT services.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We have a team of experienced IT professionals who are experts in a variety of technologies, and we can work with you to develop a nearshoring solution that meets your specific needs.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We can help you with everything from software development and testing to IT infrastructure management and support.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We can also provide you with managed services, so you can focus on your core business while we take care of your IT needs.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If you're looking for a cost-effective and efficient way to grow your tech company, then nearshoring IT services is a great option.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Contact
         <a data-attribute-index="2" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/city-tech-consultants/">
          City Tech Consultants
         </a>
         today to learn more about how we can help you.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ♻ Repost: If you want more such content!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshoring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7102950891615363072">
          #nearshoring
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7102950891615363072">
          #outsourcing
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7102950891615363072">
          #offshoring
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:82.171875px" type="button">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         We are looking for a Project Manager for our US based clients to join our team.
         <br/>
         A Project Manager of project management experience that can help us achieving the following for our US based clients :
         <br/>
         Responsible for ensuring consistent reporting, risk mitigation, time line, and cost control.
         <br/>
         To help ensure that the software development process works as it is intended.
         <br/>
         To work closely with the Functional Managers in order to facilitate, encourage, and prioritize the process.
         <br/>
         Plan, execute, monitor, control, and close projects based on Project Management best practices.
         <br/>
         Setup required communications and meetings with offshore clients to collect requirements, prepare scope.
         <br/>
         Produce project deliverables on time, within budget and within scope and maintain an updated Project Schedule at all times.
         <br/>
         Professional development and training for team members.
         <br/>
         Responsible for preparing and reporting status reports to higher management.
         <br/>
         Make sure that the process goes forward and use a variety of processes, meetings, and documents (artifacts) to ensure continued forward progress and to identify problems as soon as possible.
         <br/>
         Make sure everybody follow guidelines and processes define by the company and monitor them.
         <br/>
         Make certain that the development team keeps versions and configurations in proper version control.
         <br/>
         Must make sure that lessons learned are shared with the required personnel.
         <br/>
         Responsible of the on-time delivery of the solution.
         <br/>
         Must abide by all company policies and procedures.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Education:
         <br/>
         Bachelor's (Required)
         <br/>
         Experience:
         <br/>
         Project Manager: 3 years (Required)
         <br/>
         Job Type: Full-time
         <br/>
         Salary: Market Competitive Package will be offered.
         <br/>
         Only Karachi, Pakistan
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Apply at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:hr@lntechnologies.com" target="_self">
          hr@lntechnologies.com
         </a>
         .
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Please don't sent DM's apply on email.
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         VAM Systems is a Business Consulting, IT Solutions and Services company.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         VAM Systems is currently looking for Dynamics 365 CRM Developer (offshore-WFH) for our UAE operations with the following skill set &amp; terms and conditions:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Qualifications and Skills:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ·        Bachelor degree in computer science or related field
         <br/>
         ·        Possess up-to-date knowledge of technological developments in the industry
         <br/>
         ·        Good knowledge of Microsoft TFS and related software methodology practices
         <br/>
         ·        Strong problem solving and decision making skills
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Roles &amp; Responsibility:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ·        Strong experience in Dynamics 365 the CRM Microsoft product (online and offline)
         <br/>
         ·        At least 3 to 5  years of experience in CRM.
         <br/>
         ·        working hours on Lebanon Time zone
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge in experience in Software Development
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge in customization on Dynamics
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge in FDD, FRD, SDD, Microsoft TFS
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge in Plug-in
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge in Scrum methodology
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge in APIs
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge with module
         <br/>
         ·        Very good level of English required C1/C2 (Arabic speaking is a plus but not mandatory)
         <br/>
         ·        Excellent written and oral communication skills
         <br/>
         ·        Excellent team work skills
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Primary Objective
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The main role of an Intermediate Software Developer is to develop software solutions by
         <br/>
         studying information needs, studying systems flow, data usage, and work processes following
         <br/>
         the software development lifecycle
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Main Duties and Responsibly
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ·        Analyses business and technical requirements
         <br/>
         ·        Reviews and provides feedback on the FRD
         <br/>
         ·        Responsible of the creation of the functional design document (FDD) after reviewing the (FRD) Develop high-quality software solutions by studying information needs, systems flow, data
         <br/>
         ·        usage and work processes, following the software development lifecycle
         <br/>
         ·        Provide support and follow up with developers to solve software development issues.
         <br/>
         ·        Recommend and assist with developing improvements around processes, tools and Standards
         <br/>
         ·        Design the technical architecture of software solutions in a product oriented approach
         <br/>
         ·        Translate Functional Requirements Documents into System Design Documents (FDDs/SDDs)
         <br/>
         ·        Assist the Customer Service team with resolving day-to-day second and third line production
         <br/>
         ·        support Calls and recommend and develop fixes and alternative solutions where practicable
         <br/>
         ·        Apply DevOps methodologies in deployment on test UAT and production
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Terms and conditions
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Joining time frame: (15 - 30 days)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The selected candidates shall join VAM Systems - UAE and shall be deputed to one of the Organizations in UAE.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Should you be interested in this opportunity, please send your latest resume in MS Word format at the earliest at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:sujitha.saju@vamsystems.com" target="_self">
          sujitha.saju@vamsystems.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

         Hope you are Doing well
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/business-intelli-solutions/">
          Business Intelli solutions
         </a>
         <br/>
         We are looking for Below Position :-
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=role&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115954128031289345">
          #Role
         </a>
         : Senior Engineering Manager -Offshore Development and Client Relations
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=work&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115954128031289345">
          #Work
         </a>
         location : Pan India
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=notice&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115954128031289345">
          #Notice
         </a>
         period : Immediate to 30 days
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=position&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115954128031289345">
          #Position
         </a>
         : Permanent
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=experience&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115954128031289345">
          #Experience
         </a>
         : 15+ Years
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=job&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7115954128031289345">
          #Job
         </a>
         Description:-
         <br/>
         Key Responsibilities: Offshore Development Center Management:
         <br/>
         Lead and manage a team of software engineers, ensuring they deliver projects on time and within budget, Define and implement development methodologies, best practices, and processes to optimize efficiency.
         <br/>
         Foster a culture of continuous improvement and innovation within the development center.
         <br/>
         2. Client Relationship Management:
         <br/>
         - Act as a trusted advisor to clients in the US healthcare sector, understanding their unique requirements and challenges.
         <br/>
         - Establish and maintain strong client relationships by providing exceptional service, understanding client needs, and addressing concerns proactively.
         <br/>
         - Collaborate with clients to define project scopes, timelines, and deliverables.
         <br/>
         3. Technical Expertise:Leverage your hands-on software engineering experience to provide technical guidance and oversight to development teams,Stay up-to-date with industry trends, especially in US healthcare IT, and apply this knowledge to project strategies, Exposure to the following Technologies/Tool stack is important.
         <br/>
         • Project Management Tools: - Azure ADO, JIRA or Similar:
         <br/>
         • Development Environment: - Integrated Development Environments (IDEs): Familiarity with popular IDEs like Visual Studio Code, IntelliJ IDEA, or Eclipse, depending on the technology stack.
         <br/>
         • Cloud Services: - Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, or Google Cloud Platform (GCP): Depending on the company's cloud infrastructure, familiarity with cloud services and deployment is often essential.
         <br/>
         • Database Management: - SQL and NoSQL Databases: Understanding of both relational and NoSQL databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or Cassandra.
         <br/>
         • Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): - Jenkins, Travis CI, CircleCI, or GitLab CI/CD: Knowledge of CI/CD tools for automating software delivery pipelines.
         <br/>
         • Monitoring and Logging: - Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana): Tools for monitoring, alerting, and log analysis.
         <br/>
         • Agile/Scrum Tools: - Agile Project Management Software(If any)
         <br/>
         • DevOps and Infrastructure as Code (IaC): - Terraform, Ansible, or Chef: For automating infrastructure provisioning and configuration management.
         <br/>
         4. Team Development:Mentor and develop team members, fostering their growth and career progression.
         <br/>
         5. Project Delivery: Ensure the successful execution of projects, monitoring progress, and mitigating risks,Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align project goals with client expectations,Strong exposure to the US healthcare domain.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Interested professionals please share profile or any reference if you have to
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="mailto:vasam@businessintelli.com" target="_self">
          vasam@businessintelli.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

         🌐 Exploring New IT Partnerships 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Hello LinkedIn Community,
         <br/>
         <br/>
         I trust this post finds you in good health and high spirits! 👋
         <br/>
         <br/>
         I'm Shubham Bansod, the Chief Business Officer at BestPeers—a leading Software Development and Outsourcing company. 🚀 With our development center in Indore, India, we are strategically positioned to serve clients worldwide.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌟 Why Consider BestPeers for Your Development Needs:
         <br/>
         ✔️ CMMI Level 3 &amp; ISO 9001:2015 certified offshore software development company.
         <br/>
         ✔️ 5-star rating on Clutch from our valued clients.
         <br/>
         ✔️ Proud member of the AWS Partner Network.
         <br/>
         ✔️ Recognized by the Ministry of State for Skill Development and Entrepreneurship, India.
         <br/>
         ✔️ Esteemed Member of Parliament award for the "Pride of MP Award" (IT/ITes).
         <br/>
         ✔️ Global expertise with a diverse team of 300+ experienced in-house developers.
         <br/>
         ✔️ Specialization in web application development, legacy system re-engineering, application integration, ongoing support, and maintenance.
         <br/>
         ✔️ Proven track record of delivering top-quality, industry-specific software solutions.
         <br/>
         ✔️ Customer information security as our top priority.
         <br/>
         ✔️ Cost-efficient solutions for every need.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         💼 Services We Offer:
         <br/>
         ✔️ Skilled professionals for Full-stack, Frontend, and Backend engineering.
         <br/>
         ✔️ Expertise in Data Science, Ruby/Rails, Python/Django/Flask, and React/Node/JavaScript.
         <br/>
         ✔️ Custom solutions tailored to your project's unique requirements.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🚀 Ready to Collaborate? Let's Discuss:
         <br/>
         If you are looking for a reliable IT partner, let's explore potential avenues together!
         <br/>
         Schedule a meeting with me to discuss how BestPeers can cater to your unique development needs:
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://lnkd.in/dNK98tu5" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/dNK98tu5
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         📅 Availability:
         <br/>
