      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        Looking for Director HR - Inbox Resume
        <br/>
        <br/>
        About The Company
        <br/>
        A software development company providing IT services in various sectors along with the latest
technologies.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Job Type: Full time/ Permanent
        <br/>
        Work Location: Lahore, Pakistan
        <br/>
        Working Days/
Time: Mon - Fri (Flexible working Hours)
        <br/>
        Remuneration: Market Competitive Salary along with
attractive benefits
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Key Purpose:
        <br/>
        We are looking on behalf of our client for the position of Director - HR who will be responsible for
        <br/>
        overseeing and performing all Human Resource functions at the Offshore office, in close coordination
        <br/>
        with management. These include recruiting, onboarding, orientation, employee engagement and other
        <br/>
        support activities related to Human Resources.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Key Accountabilities:
        <br/>
        The Responsibilities of Director Human Resources (Offshore) include but are not limited to:
        <br/>
        Collaborate with senior leadership to understand the organization goals and strategy related to
        <br/>
        recruitment, employee engagement, and retention with specific focus on Offshore.
        <br/>
        Establish departmental SMART goals in line with the organizational strategy.
        <br/>
        Provide counselling and guidance to middle and front-line managers.
        <br/>
        Plan and participate in university job fairs for company branding and recruitment.
        <br/>
        Coordinate and work closely with various department leaders to foster an environment of trust,
        <br/>
        respect, open communication, innovation, excellence, and entrepreneurship.
        <br/>
        Plan, develop, and implement policies, processes, trainings, initiatives, and surveys to support the
        <br/>
        organization’s strategic goals pertaining to human resource.
        <br/>
        Oversee and implement performance management processes in collaboration with senior leaders.
        <br/>
        Facilitate and monitor the implementation of standardized human resource processes.
        <br/>
        Partner with various teams on workforce planning, employer branding and Corporate Social
        <br/>
        Responsibility (CSR) initiatives.
        <br/>
        Work with technical leadership teams on Mentoring programs for the new hires.
        <br/>
        Facilitate documentation and follow-up of US H1-B and Visit-visa process.
        <br/>
        Plan and facilitate execution of employee training and professional development programs.
        <br/>
        Conduct employee exit interviews, share trends and action plans with the Management to
        <br/>
        proactively prevent voluntary attrition.
        <br/>
        Prepare and propose budget for various HR initiatives and get management approval.
        <br/>
        Work with various teams on planning and execution of the approved HR initiatives.
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         We are looking for a Project Manager for our US based clients to join our team.
         <br/>
         A Project Manager of project management experience that can help us achieving the following for our US based clients :
         <br/>
         Responsible for ensuring consistent reporting, risk mitigation, time line, and cost control.
         <br/>
         To help ensure that the software development process works as it is intended.
         <br/>
         To work closely with the Functional Managers in order to facilitate, encourage, and prioritize the process.
         <br/>
         Plan, execute, monitor, control, and close projects based on Project Management best practices.
         <br/>
         Setup required communications and meetings with offshore clients to collect requirements, prepare scope.
         <br/>
         Produce project deliverables on time, within budget and within scope and maintain an updated Project Schedule at all times.
         <br/>
         Professional development and training for team members.
         <br/>
         Responsible for preparing and reporting status reports to higher management.
         <br/>
         Make sure that the process goes forward and use a variety of processes, meetings, and documents (artifacts) to ensure continued forward progress and to identify problems as soon as possible.
         <br/>
         Make sure everybody follow guidelines and processes define by the company and monitor them.
         <br/>
         Make certain that the development team keeps versions and configurations in proper version control.
         <br/>
         Must make sure that lessons learned are shared with the required personnel.
         <br/>
         Responsible of the on-time delivery of the solution.
         <br/>
         Must abide by all company policies and procedures.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Qualifications and Education Requirements
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Plan, execute, monitor, control and close projects based on Project Management principles and best practices.
         <br/>
         Bachelor Degree in Science or Business
         <br/>
         We work on these technologies:
         <br/>
         Augmented Reality
         <br/>
         Virtual Reality
         <br/>
         IOT
         <br/>
         Blockchain etc.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         COMPANY BENEFITS:
         <br/>
         Paid leaves as per the policy.
         <br/>
         Career Growth/Learning Opportunities
         <br/>
         Sustainable Career
         <br/>
         Our Managers spends time on employees learning.
         <br/>
         Working with US based clients
         <br/>
         European &amp; U.A.E also
         <br/>
         Working on highly technical project
         <br/>
         Management support for the career growth
         <br/>
         Healthy work environment
         <br/>
         Family Medical insurance as per the policy
         <br/>
         5 working days in a week
         <br/>
         Official Lunch and Dinners
         <br/>
         Employees’ Birthday Celebration
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Experience : Project Manager: 3 years (Required)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Location: Tariq road Karachi
         <br/>
         Interested Candidates share Resumes at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:hr@lntecnologies.com" target="_self">
          hr@lntecnologies.com
         </a>
         and
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="mailto:afifa@appmaisters.com" target="_self">
          afifa@appmaisters.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

   <div class="update-v2-social-activity" id="ember3772">
    <div class="social-details-social-counts">
     <div class="display-flex flex-grow-1">
      <div class="relative full-width">
       <ul class="display-flex">

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hi ,
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Greetings from Mindmap Technologies!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We have an Excellent Opportunity looking for Technical Delivery Manager for one of our prestigious clients Abeam
         <br/>
         Kindly find the below details for your reference
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Role: Technical Delivery Manager
         <br/>
         Permanent with Mindmap
         <br/>
         Client: Abeam
         <br/>
         Experience: 10-16 Years
         <br/>
         Job Location: Singapore
         <br/>
         Notice Period:Immediate - 30 Days Max
         <br/>
         Job Description:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ·         TDM with Informatica skills-set (must-have).
         <br/>
         ·         TDM is expected to deliver multiple projects concurrently.
         <br/>
         ·         For the TDM minimally will need to have major delivery experience (preferably inclusive of infra/application components),
         <br/>
         ·         AML knowledge will be beneficial within the transaction monitoring area
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Requirement
         <br/>
         Keywords
         <br/>
         Years of Rel Exp
         <br/>
         No of Positions
         <br/>
         Billing Client
         <br/>
         End Client
         <br/>
         Interviewer
         <br/>
         Location of Project
         <br/>
         Employment Type
         <br/>
         Cost of the candidate Per Month
         <br/>
         (all incl CPF, Levy, Bonus+)
         <br/>
         Note
         <br/>
         Technical Delivery Manager(TDM)
         <br/>
         TDM
         <br/>
         10-16 Years
         <br/>
         1
         <br/>
         Abeam
         <br/>
         SG Bank
         <br/>
         Iris/Jean
         <br/>
         Singapore
         <br/>
         Perm with MMT
         <br/>
         SGD 8000-SGD 10000 Per month
         <br/>
         TDM with Informatica skills-set (must-have). TDM is expected to deliver multiple projects concurrently. For the TDM minimally will need to have major delivery experience (preferably inclusive of infra/application components), AML knowledge will be beneficial within the transaction monitoring area
         <br/>
         <br/>
         About Company
         <br/>
         MINDMAP TECHNOLOGIES PTE. LTD. (the "Company") is an Exempt Private Company Limited by Shares. We are a Singapore based company with offices in 6 countries. This Company's principal activity is information technology consultancy with development of software and applications Multinational helps Mindmap technologies support clients with multi nationals. We help organizations operate more productively. We improve profitability, Top line-growth, Customer service &amp; Cost management by providing:
         <br/>
         •            Staff Augmentation
         <br/>
         •            Offshore Staff Augmentation
         <br/>
         •            Consulting(Project Delivery,SOW)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Mindmap Technologies provide the resources and funds for continuing education and employing skill sets to match the needs of a changing workplace.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Note:As discussed, Please share your Updated resume with DOB and proper Education Details along
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Feel free to contact for any Queries
         <br/>
         Looking forward to hearing from you
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Thanks &amp; Regards
         <br/>
         Pavani G| Recruitment Consultant
         <br/>
         +91 8688610946
         <br/>
         Mindmap Technologies Pte. Ltd. |

          https://lnkd.in/g6hjE47N
         </a>

         9 Tampines Grande, #02-00 Asia Green, Singapore (528735)

          https://lnkd.in/gpzCY5yd

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Dear Connections,
         <br/>
         We are looking for Sr.Devops Engineer-Contract- Full Remote.Looking for early joiners. This is for Offshore(India)
         <br/>
         Exp Req:6+yrs
         <br/>
         JD:
         <br/>
         Looking for devops resources that has experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Helm and github or gitlab pipelines
         <br/>
         The role of DevOps Engineer interfaces with key stakeholders and applies technical proficiency to help automated different stages of the Software Development Life Cycle for bespoke and vendor software development teams. This role is important in creating new Enterprise DevOps standards for the entire company. This role works with Technical Leads from various agile development teams to build Quality into the SDLC and provide auditable data to support the Change Management process.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Required Experience, Skills, and Qualifications:
         <br/>
         Preferred:
         <br/>
         • At least 5 years of previous experience in .NET/SQL/JAVA software design and development (Web Application and/or Web Services) with DevOps and Agile Methodology
         <br/>
         • At least 4 years of experience with DevOps and automation frameworks, including Bamboo, Jenkins or equivalent.
         <br/>
         o Experience configuring Pull Request in Git/BitBucket
         <br/>
         o Experience configuring automated polling for CI build process
         <br/>
         o Expertise with Web Application and Web Services Development, Unit-Testing and Automation Testing (Selenium or Kotalon) integration with CI tools.
         <br/>
         o Expertise with Maven or Gradle.
         <br/>
         o Expertise with database release automation o Experience with SonarQube (for code quality scan).
         <br/>
         • Expertise with Git-based source repositories such as Bitbucket or Github, and understanding of branching strategies in Git.
         <br/>
         • Experience with managing artifact repositories such as Nexus or Artifactory.
         <br/>
         • Experience with setting up a CI/CD pipeline from ground up.
         <br/>
         • Experience with one or more scripting languages, e.g.: shell, Perl, Python, Ruby, or Groovy.
         <br/>
         • Experience administering software on Linux and Windows operating systems.
         <br/>
         • Experience with JIRA and Confluence
         <br/>
         • Good understanding of agile development methodology
         <br/>
         • Excellent stakeholder management skills
         <br/>
         • Experience and desire to work in a Global delivery environment Desired
         <br/>
         • Experience with HP PPM Deployment Module for Oracle EBS
         <br/>
         • CI integration with Veracode Security code scan
         <br/>
         • Experience with JFrog XRay.
         <br/>
         • Experience with Kubernetes / GCP.
         <br/>
         • Experience with Docker image creation and deployment.
         <br/>
         • JIRA integrations with other tools like ServiceNow and/or TestRails.
         <br/>
         • CI integrations with Slack for communications.
         <br/>
         • Elastic Search.
         <br/>
         • CI integrations with SOAPUI for web API testing.
         <br/>
         • CI integrations with JMeter or other performance testing tool.
         <br/>
         • Experience administering the Atlassian suite and JFrog tools.
         <br/>
         • Experience with legacy SCM tools like CVS and SVN.
         <br/>
         Added Advantage: knowledge in a regulated industry requiring compliance standards (SOX, SSAE-18, FERPA, HIPPA, ISO-27001)
         <br/>
         Interested candidates can share their resumes to
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:rrudrarapu2@spearheadtech.io" target="_self">
          rrudrarapu2@spearheadtech.io
         </a>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=devopsengineer&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7108032160044916736">
          #devopsengineer
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=devopsjobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7108032160044916736">
          #devopsjobs
         </a>
         #devops
         <a data-attribute-index="3" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAmlmKEB_B8465qY4jzEjYpw-EnQAgoTAmI">
          RAKESH MIDDE
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=freelancerjobsgermany&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7204557779192205312">
          #freelancerjobsgermany
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="10" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=freelanceworkgermany&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7204557779192205312">
          #freelanceworkgermany
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="11" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=remoteworkgermany&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7204557779192205312">
          #remoteworkgermany
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="12" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=freelancedevelopergermany&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7204557779192205312">
          #freelancedevelopergermany
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         *Apply*:
         <a data-attribute-index="13" href="https://lnkd.in/gFSQays2" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/gFSQays2
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Welcome to Rotorworks GmbH!  Rotorworks is an independent service provider for wind turbines based in Berlin-Adlershof. We are a medium-sized company that offers high-quality repair and maintenance services for wind turbines worldwide - both onshore and offshore. Our customers are manufacturers and large operating companies of wind turbines.   We are characterized by the fact that our teams can be deployed quickly and flexibly. We work in international teams that are specially trained to meet the requirements of the respective assignments. In addition to service quality, camaraderie, teamwork and a strong sense of responsibility and safety are important pillars of our corporate culture.   In order to strengthen our IT infrastructure and support for our employees, we are looking for a motivated IT specialist for our location in Berlin-Adlershof.  IT support employee / IT system administrator (m/f/d) Your tasks in detail:   Support and supervision of users in 1st and 2nd level support   Installation, configuration and maintenance of IT systems and applications; including servers, laptops, tablets, smartphones and printers   Participation in IT projects and the development of ideas to improve IT processes   Coordination, coordination and communication with external service providers and internal departments   Management of user accounts, access rights and security guidelines   Training employees on IT best practices and security protocols.   Identifying IT problems and developing efficient solutions.   Escalation of complex problems to higher support levels as required   Updating and maintaining IT documentation, including instructions and process documentation.   Our requirements:   Completed training or studies in the field of computer science, information technology or comparable qualification.   Practical experience in IT support, preferably in a corporate environment.     Sound knowledge of hardware and software troubleshooting.   Knowledge in the application and support of IT/telecommunications infrastructure environments and Windows operating systems incl. M365   Strong communication skills and the ability to explain complex technical concepts simply   Ability to work in a team and customer orientation.   Independent and solution-oriented way of working.   Good knowledge of German and English (written and spoken) - additional language skills are welcome   This is what we offer:   Varied and challenging projects in a growing, sustainable market   Independent work   Freedom to develop and implement your own ideas   Dynamic, international worki
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         To my friends and clients in the DACH region, Saigon Technology now expands its business to Switzerland and DACH market under the brand name STS Software GmbH, based in Olten, Switzerland.
         <br/>
         The company is focused on software consulting and development as well as building offshore development center for the DACH market.
         <br/>
         We are looking forward to working with reliable partners and clients in the region.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Visit us here:
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://stssoftware.ch" target="_self">
          https://stssoftware.ch
         </a>
         (German version is under development).
         <br/>
         Or drop us an email at
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="mailto:inquiry@stssoftware.ch" target="_self">
          inquiry@stssoftware.ch
         </a>
         .
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hiring Alert!!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Gophers Lab is a Digital Engineering company that builds disruptive digital products and transforms businesses, leveraging product mindset, cutting-edge engineering, and cloud. We provide offshore development services to businesses, including Fortune 500 companies and startups, across the world.
         <br/>
         We’re expanding our team and now looking for someone that is ready for new exciting challenges and willing to be part of our family as a “Data Research Analyst (Inside Sales)".
         <br/>
         <br/>
         You would be a great fit for this role if you:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         1-3 yr of experience in data research
         <br/>
         Must have data research capabilities to increase the list of potential clients
         <br/>
         Conduct thorough market research to identify potential clients and generate leads in the IT industry.
         <br/>
         Utilize various tools and platforms such as Sales Navigator, Zoom Info, and other relevant sources to identify and qualify potential leads.
         <br/>
         Development of Prospect Pipeline through identification and focused research
         <br/>
         Performing research on accounts to help increase interest in the organization
         <br/>
         Making sure to understand the individual and unique needs of each customer
         <br/>
         Offering demonstrations for products and services to potential buyers
         <br/>
         Experience with CRM software is a plus
         <br/>
         Experience with tools like HubSpot, Sales Navigator, ZoomInfo, etc.
         <br/>
         Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
         <br/>
         Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Benefits that you deserve to get along with the Best CTC:
         <br/>
         Health insurance and wellness plans.
         <br/>
         Hybrid Work Culture
         <br/>
         5 days working with flexible timings.
         <br/>
         The location is Prime (Heart of Noida)
         <br/>
         “Learning &amp; Development” Programs
         <br/>
         28 Annual Paid leaves &amp; 15 Public holidays
         <br/>
         Monthly/Quarterly/Annually Parties &amp; Events
         <br/>
         Huge Growth opportunities
         <br/>
         Several employee benefit policies ~ Internal Loan, fitness reimbursement, etc.
         <br/>
         Company website-
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="http://www.gopherslab.com" target="_self">
          www.gopherslab.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         We are looking for a Project Manager for our US based clients to join our team.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         A Project Manager of project management experience that can help us achieving the following for our US based clients :
         <br/>
         Responsible for ensuring consistent reporting, risk mitigation, time line, and cost control.
         <br/>
         To help ensure that the software development process works as it is intended.
         <br/>
         To work closely with the Functional Managers in order to facilitate, encourage, and prioritize the process.
         <br/>
         Plan, execute, monitor, control, and close projects based on Project Management best practices.
         <br/>
         Setup required communications and meetings with offshore clients to collect requirements, prepare scope.
         <br/>
         Produce project deliverables on time, within budget and within scope and maintain an updated Project Schedule at all times.
         <br/>
         Professional development and training for team members.
         <br/>
         Responsible for preparing and reporting status reports to higher management.
         <br/>
         Make sure that the process goes forward and use a variety of processes, meetings, and documents (artifacts) to ensure continued forward progress and to identify problems as soon as possible.
         <br/>
         Make sure everybody follow guidelines and processes define by the company and monitor them.
         <br/>
         Make certain that the development team keeps versions and configurations in proper version control.
         <br/>
         Must make sure that lessons learned are shared with the required personnel.
         <br/>
         Responsible of the on-time delivery of the solution.
         <br/>
         Must abide by all company policies and procedures.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Qualifications and Education Requirements
         <br/>
         Plan, execute, monitor, control and close projects based on Project Management principles and best practices.
         <br/>
         We work on these technologies:
         <br/>
         Augmented Reality
         <br/>
         Virtual Reality
         <br/>
         IOT
         <br/>
         Blockchain etc.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ONLY KARACHI OFFICE
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Type: Full-time
         <br/>
         Education:
         <br/>
         Bachelor's (Required)
         <br/>
         Experience:
         <br/>
         Project Manager: 2 plus years (Required)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Apply at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:hr@lntechnologies.com" target="_self">
          hr@lntechnologies.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

        Company Description
        <br/>
        True Code Masters is a software outsourcing company based in Ahmedabad, India, specializing in custom software development, Open Source, Web Application Development, Mobile development company &amp; offshore IT outsourcing services. We have expertise in designing and developing robust web and mobile applications. True Code Masters is dedicated to providing professional-level customized solutions for a wide range of businesses and individuals.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Role Description
        <br/>
        This is a full-time on-site role for a Business Development Executive. The Business Development Executive will be responsible for new business development, lead generation, business communication, and account management. They will also be involved in maintaining relationships with existing clients and identifying opportunities for business growth.
        <br/>
        We are looking to hire the BDE who have good experience in IT industry to generate the lead from different sources
        <br/>
        Cold calling
        <br/>
        Email Marketing
        <br/>
        Writing the proposal.
        <br/>
        Upwork/Freelancer/PPH and other portal to generate the lead.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Qualifications
        <br/>
        Bachelor Or Masters in IT.
        <br/>
        New Business Development and Lead Generation skills
        <br/>
        Strong business acumen
        <br/>
        Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
        <br/>
        Ability to work independently and as part of a team
        <br/>
        Knowledge of software development and IT industry
        <br/>
        Experience in sales or business development role

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Looking for "General Manager Pakistan" for our UAE based multinational Technical / IT client. The position is based in Lahore and Reports to Chief Operating Officer located in UAE.
         <br/>
         Its 12 months - renewable Employment Status
         <br/>
         Offshore Contractor
         <br/>
         Job Purpose:
         <br/>
         The General Manager Pakistan is a key senior position for the company, who will be expected to hire, manage and lead a triage of overseas support functions for the company. Namely these include Tech &amp; Development, Analytics and Finance support resources to deliver strategic business requirements. He/she will also be expected to set up &amp; manage new offices and oversee the establishment of a robust back-end unit for company. in line with company culture and values.
         <br/>
         Duties and Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         ● Translate broader strategy into a compelling team vision and goals; align the team and set priorities to achieve objectives.
         <br/>
         ● Define project goals, scope, approach, and overall plan including providing clarity on critical path tasks to delivery on key organizational goals.
         <br/>
         ● Define, document, and implement project management and engineering best practices and process improvements to constantly improve workflow and delivery on tech &amp; dev and analytics projects.
         <br/>
         ● Use Agile/SCRUM or standard software development processes to deliver on tech &amp; dev projects.
         <br/>
         ● Use robust qualitative and quantitative analysis to deliver insights on analytics projects and drive strategic decisions.
         <br/>
         ● Ensure project tasks are completed on time and within scope.
         <br/>
         Key Competencies/Skills: ● University Degree in Computer Science or equivalent technical qualification(s). ● Over 6 years of experience in Software development and Project management. ● Over 3 years of experience in Operations &amp; Financial Analytics and comfort in using tools such as Power BI, Tableau, Alteryx, etc. ● 2 years in a leadership position. ● Deep knowledge and understanding of Android and iOS app development; database design, deployment and management; and server-client interface. ● Strong technical background, excellent client and Project Management skills, proven ability to do hands-on technical &amp; analytical work when needed, and ability to lead technical projects and technical &amp; analytical teams.
         <br/>
         ● Strong influencing skills and ability to interact with senior management. ● Ability to communicate clearly and effectively to both Technical and Business audiences.
         <br/>
         if you are interested, Please share your updated resume at:
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:Imran@rhc.com.pk" target="_self">
          Imran@rhc.com.pk
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

         Top 10+ IT Companies in Sri Lanka (2023)
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://lnkd.in/gE9TFHaf" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/gE9TFHaf
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Outsourcing to Sri Lanka
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Outsource Sri Lanka is recognized as one of the leading Outsourcing, Remote Staffing, BPO, EOR, PEO, GEO, RPO, and Offshore service company in South Asia, delivering 100% in-country services from Colombo, Sri Lanka.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         In 2020, Forbes named Sri Lanka as one of the top countries for outsourcing software development services, highlighting the country's highly skilled workforce, cost-effectiveness, and favorable business environment.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The industry can accelerate multi-sector growth, both directly and indirectly, to increase the nation's innovation capability and competitiveness. As of 2019, the IT-BPM industry in Sri Lanka employed over 113,000 persons and generated US$ 1.5 Bn in revenue.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         At present Sri Lankas IT industry stands at revenue of little over USD 1.5 billion, which accounts for nearly 2% of our GDP.
         <br/>
         <br/>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--2-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         🚀 Exciting Opportunity! Join the World's Second Largest Provider of Crayons and Art Materials! 🎨
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We're expanding our team and looking for a passionate Senior Python Developer to join our Pricing and Data Intelligence Team. If you thrive in a dynamic environment and are ready to contribute to building cutting-edge pricing applications, we want to hear from you!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌐 About Us:
         <br/>
         Our client, the world’s second-largest provider of crayons and art materials, operates Offshore Development Centers (ODCs) in Hyderabad, Canada, and Mexico. The Hyderabad ODC, managed by our offshore partner, Frodoe LLC, is a professional IT solutions company with operations in Milpitas, CA, Princeton, NJ, and Hyderabad, India. Learn more about Frodoe LLC at [
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="http://www.frodoe.com" target="_self">
          www.frodoe.com
         </a>
         ].
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌟 Key Qualifications:
         <br/>
         - Good intuition for business needs
         <br/>
         - Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, or related field
         <br/>
         - Minimum 7 years of experience in Python development
         <br/>
         - Strong experience with Django and Flask frameworks
         <br/>
         - Proficiency in PostgreSQL or similar relational databases
         <br/>
         - Experience with AWS and cloud-based solutions
         <br/>
         - Familiarity with DevOps principles and technologies
         <br/>
         - Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
         <br/>
         - Strong communication skills for effective collaboration with stakeholders and team members
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌟 Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         - Design, develop, deploy, and maintain software solutions using Python, Django, Flask, Ansible, and Jenkins
         <br/>
         - Implement unit and integration tests for code changes
         <br/>
         - Optimize existing production systems for scalability and performance
         <br/>
         - Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather and document requirements
         <br/>
         - Stay updated with software development trends and explore new technologies
         <br/>
         - Participate in code reviews and maintain a clean code base
         <br/>
         - Provide off-hours support for critical issues when needed
         <br/>
         <br/>
         💰 CTC : 20-22 LPA
         <br/>
         🌐 Location: Hybrid
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If you're ready to make an impact and grow with a leading organization in the art materials industry, apply now! Send your resume to [
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="mailto:surya.k@frodoe.com" target="_self">
          surya.k@frodoe.com
         </a>
         ].
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=seniorpythondeveloper&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7132210097300127744">
          #SeniorPythonDeveloper
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=seniordeveloper&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7132210097300127744">
          #SeniorDeveloper
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=techjobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7132210097300127744">
          #TechJobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hybridwork&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7132210097300127744">
          #HybridWork
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=artmaterials&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7132210097300127744">
          #ArtMaterials
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=jobopportunity&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7132210097300127744">
          #JobOpportunity
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=joinourteam&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7132210097300127744">
          #JoinOurTeam
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nowhiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7132210097300127744">
          #NowHiring
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="10" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=techtalent&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7132210097300127744">
          #TechTalent
         </a>
         🚀🎨
        </span>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         I’m
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7099667785244409856">
          #hiring
         </a>
         . Know anyone who might be interested?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This is a leadership level role with UST. We are looking at SAP OTC (Order to Cash) leaders with strong background in SAP SD skill. Please refer the JD below and apply for the same if your profile matches the JD. Feel free to share among your connections too if you know anyone of similar skill:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Years of Experience : 15+ years
         <br/>
         Job Location: Any UST India Offices
         <br/>
         Mode of work : Hybrid ( 3 days WFO and 2 days WFH)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         15+ years of SAP e2e Order to Cash experience specifically with SD/MM and techno functional experience. Knowledge of SD integrations with various modules, internal and external systems like APO GATP, GTS etc., needed.
         <br/>
         Ability to trouble shoot and suggest improvements on complex S/4HANA implementations. Knowledge of SD enhancements across documents, items, pricing, logistics essential.
         <br/>
         Ability to perform sizing of new requirements and assist in proposal preparations needed.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Qualifications:
         <br/>
         · A bachelor's degree in business administration, Engineering, Computer Science, or related discipline is required
         <br/>
         · Strong knowledge of supply chain management processes and standard methodologies is required
         <br/>
         · Expertise in the configuration and implementation of SAP ECC-SD, S4/HANA is required
         <br/>
         · Having good mix of sales and distribution knowledge, functional knowledge of SAP SD/OTC modules, and technical knowledge of underlying SAP tables and processes
         <br/>
         · In depth knowledge of Transportation Management System, Inbound/Outbound Deliveries and Shipments
         <br/>
         · Extended multi-project experience with Sales Orders, Outbound Deliveries, Service and Repairs, Pricing and Customer returns. Solid experience with Portal and EDI communication as it relates to processing
         <br/>
         · Demonstrated experience in standard methodologies and processes involved in the implementation for acquisition and divestitures/spin-off
         <br/>
         · Candidate will lead projects of various sizes with limited supervision through the software development lifecycle
         <br/>
         · Candidate should be able to craft functional specifications in support of new functionality and improvements
         <br/>
         · Be actively involved in the preparation, exploration, realization and Go Live of customer implementation projects
         <br/>
         · Demonstrate the ability to plan, run, and manage blueprint workshops / meetings with internal and external clients
         <br/>
         · Providing a creative source of ideas/solutions to address problems
         <br/>
         · Lead the team that are assigned to, in functional capacity, adding value to the project and to the final deliverables
         <br/>
         · Excellent communication and general Office tools skills with the ability to effectively interact at all levels within company is required
         <br/>
         · Ability to work with and communicate effectively with offshore and onsite team members
         <br/>
         · Confident written, verbal, and inter-personal communication skills
         <br/>
         · Should be able to articulate business requirements and propose solutions
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         TechTonic Solutions is hiring a Senior .NET Developer for its reputed client
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Our client is a diversified global software development and IT consulting company that provides offshore and onshore technological solutions to business enterprises. Our mission is to enable superior returns on clients’ technology investments through best-in-class industry solutions, domain expertise, and global scale.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Are you looking for a new challenge in the world of software development? TechTonic Solutions warmly invites you to be a key player as a Senior .NET Developer, where your expertise will shape exceptional software solutions.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Take the lead in designing, developing, and maintaining robust .NET applications
         <br/>
         Utilize your mastery of .NET Core, .NET MVC, and
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="http://ASP.NET" target="_self">
          ASP.NET
         </a>
         to create high-quality software that sets new standards
         <br/>
         Lead testing and debugging efforts to ensure our software runs flawlessly Identify and fix defects, guaranteeing top-notch performance and reliability
         <br/>
         Design responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery
         <br/>
         Develop and fine-tune RESTful APIs, enabling smooth data exchange and seamless system integrations
         <br/>
         Oversee operations on MS SQL Server, optimizing performance through effective querying and data manipulation techniques
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Requirements:
         <br/>
         3+ years of solid experience as a .NET Developer, showcasing your success through a string of impactful projects.
         <br/>
         Expertise in .NET Core, .NET MVC,
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="http://ASP.NET" target="_self">
          ASP.NET
         </a>
         , and proficiency in C# programming.
         <br/>
         Extensive hands-on experience with web development technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery.
         <br/>
         Proven proficiency in developing and consuming REST/RESTful APIs.
         <br/>
         Proficiency in MS SQL Server with a deep understanding of database design principles.
         <br/>
         A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a relevant field is required.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Interested candidates can apply at
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="mailto:Techtonicsolutions@outlook.com" target="_self">
          Techtonicsolutions@outlook.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=dotnetdevelopers&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7133111805857439744">
          #dotnetdevelopers
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=technicalhiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7133111805857439744">
          #technicalhiring
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=urgentrequirement&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7133111805857439744">
          #urgentrequirement
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=applynow&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7133111805857439744">
          #applynow
         </a>
        </span>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/objectsol-technologies-private-limited/">

         </a>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=brandrecall&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7196109988505784320">
          #BrandRecall
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ObjectSol Technologies is a full-cycle custom software &amp; app development company with excellent consulting and development services.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are 15+ years experienced IT Firm having expertise in developing a wide range of solutions for different domains like IT, Healthcare, Fintech, OTT, Hospitality and Transportation to name a few.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Our competitive hourly rates start from US$15.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ObjectSol Technologies have experienced team of Data Scientists, Web, Software &amp; App developers, capable of offering tailored resources to meet your specific requirements at competitive hourly rates ranging starting from US$15, all under one-roof specialized in:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         • Big Data and Data Analytics - Big Data, Hadoop, Map reduce, Cassandra, Hive, Kafka, SK Learn, Tensorflow, Python &amp; relevant frameworks
         <br/>
         <br/>
         • Data Visualization - Interactive &amp; informative dashboards using Tableau, PowerBI, Looker Studios
         <br/>
         <br/>
         • Mobile App Development - using respective native SDK like Xcode, Swift for iOS, Java/Kotlin for Android &amp; cross platform tools like React Native, Flutter
         <br/>
         <br/>
         • Software/ Website Development - Expertizing in PHP and different PHP CMS/framework, Node JS, Angular, React, Vue.js etc
         <br/>
         <br/>

         Career Saudi is looking for candidates for the position of  RTS Engineers. Location: Dubai. Salary: AED: 20K
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Position Title: Product Engineer (Tradenet)
         <br/>
         Location: Onsite (Dubai) and Offshore
         <br/>
         Salary: AED 20K
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Essential Requirements (by Career Saudi):
         <br/>
         Function/Years of experience:
         <br/>
         --  Minimum about 4 to 5 years of experience in software development using Java (Core Java, preferably microservices domain)
         <br/>
         -- Exposure to kafka backend with events processing experience
         <br/>
         --  Core Java with experience in microservices development with Kafka as backend and knowledge in any streaming frameworks (Spark/Beam/Flink etc.)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Note:
         <br/>
         -- Kindly share your updated resume at
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="mailto:arisha.ghaffar@gmail.com" target="_self">
          arisha.ghaffar@gmail.com
         </a>
         <br/>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7126142079537147905">
          #hiring
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7126142079537147905">
          #offshore
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=iam&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7126142079537147905">
          #IAM
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=oneidentity&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7126142079537147905">
          #OneIdentity
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=development&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7126142079537147905">
          #development
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are currently looking for several offshore candidates. Please keep the short deadline in mind.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Duration: 01.01.2024 – 30.06.2024 +
         <br/>
         Capacity: 100%
         <br/>
         Count: 7 Positions
         <br/>
         Location: 100% Remote – Offshore preffered
         <br/>
         Deadline: 06.11.2024 eob
         <br/>
         Language: English
         <br/>
         Industry: Insurance
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We can only present candidates which are employed in a company or have their own company with at least 3 employees.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         6x One Identity Developer
         <br/>
         - IAM &amp; One Identity development experience
         <br/>
         - Design of application components
         <br/>
         - Application development
         <br/>
         - Monitor that Application Developers build software complying with quality standards specified by Customer IT Architects
         <br/>
         - Monitor that Application Developers build automated tests to standards specified by Customer IT Architects
         <br/>
         - Monitor that Application Developers have appropriate processes and tools in place to effectively isolate application issues in development, test and production environments
         <br/>
         - Monitor that Application Developers have a consistent and standard logging approach in place, as specified by Customer IT Architects
         <br/>
         - optional Angular
         <br/>
         <br/>
         1x IAM	Test Manager
         <br/>
         - IAM &amp; One Identity experience
         <br/>
         - Definition and organization of testing activities, writing test case scenarios and scripts for automating testing
         <br/>
         - Execution of automated testing
         <br/>
         - Testing components and the User Interface (UI)
         <br/>
         - Preparation regression testing and end to end testing among third party applications
         <br/>
         - Provisioning of test methodology and guidance
         <br/>
         - Preparation of status reports of testing activities
         <br/>
         - Harmonization of test tools
         <br/>
         - Synchronization of test plans across systems and phases
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

         <button aria-label="2 comments on Jonathan Warnecke’s post" class="t-black--light social-details-social-counts__count-value social-details-social-counts__count-value-hover t-12 hoverable-link-text social-details-social-counts__link" type="button">
          <span aria-hidden="true">

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hello Everyone,
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Let's chat 😍 if you are looking to hire remote resources full-time , We can assist you to map your business via utilize our developers to deliver a bespoke solutions for web/mobile platform with qualitative and responsive designs
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We have been running with the agency- Yuvasoft Solution Pvt Ltd for the last eleven years and served more than 200+ clients including domestic and overseas. We are also operating from our office in India and Canada.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Services:-
         <br/>
         <br/>
         1. We provide remote working developers on a monthly and hourly basis (Staff Augmentation)
         <br/>
         2. To develop the product as per the requirement(Customised Software development)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Staff Augmentation:-
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We specialize in the following tech stack for Staff Augmentation:
         <br/>
         1.     Ruby On Rails
         <br/>
         2.     Angular, MEAN
         <br/>
         3.     ReactJS, MERN
         <br/>
         4.     NodeJS, Python
         <br/>
         5.     WordPress
         <br/>
         6.     React Native Application Development
         <br/>
         7.     Native Android and IOS development
         <br/>
         8.     E-Commerce Product development
         <br/>
         9.     PHP/Laravel Web Application Development
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Benefits of Outsourcing with Us:
         <br/>
         - Cost-effective solutions tailored to your budget.
         <br/>
         - Access to a talented pool of developers without the hassle of recruitment.
         <br/>
         - Fast project ramp-up and flexible scaling options.
         <br/>
         - Focus on your core business while we handle the development work.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We have capabilities to build ERP/CRM and Software/Web applications/Mobile applications for HRM, Sales &amp; Marketing School Management, Fintech, Event Management, Payment apps, Manufacturing Operation management, Hospital management, Pharmacy Management, Hospital Management, Travel and Tourism etc. from scratch to deployment.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Please take a look at the company's portfolio:-
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://lnkd.in/g6zbHHx8" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/g6zbHHx8
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         For more information visit us at:
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://yuvasoftech.ca/" target="_self">
          https://yuvasoftech.ca/
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Let me know if this is interesting for you, I would be happy to know more about your requirements.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         I am eagerly waiting for your positive response to build a business relationship as a Resource/Tech partner to meet your needs.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Connect with me on
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="mailto:himikas@yuvasoftech.com" target="_self">
          himikas@yuvasoftech.com
         </a>
         / +91 9713467789 or drop a message to explore the possibilities!

     <div class="artdeco-dropdown artdeco-dropdown--placement-bottom artdeco-dropdown--justification-right ember-view" id="ember4413">
      <button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Open control menu for post by Naresh Kolimela" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember4414" tabindex="0" type="button">

   <!-- -->
   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Position : Sr. Golang Developer
         <br/>
         Location: Cincinnati/Blue Ash, OH ,
         <br/>
         Job Type: C2C (12 Month Contract + (Possible extension)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         RESPONSIBILITIES
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Client –Kroger
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Must have a Linkedin profile.
         <br/>
         Visa Status : OPEN
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Skills/Experience:
         <br/>
         Microservices (MUST-HAVE!!!!)
         <br/>
         Experience working with high-volume applications.
         <br/>
         Both GO and Java experience (Experience with both is not a requirement but this would be a differentiator)
         <br/>
         Note: Candidates must be able to collaborate with offshore teams.
         <br/>
         Project: Backend development on a customer platform/profile. Will also provide production support.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Description
         <br/>
         The Developer is responsible for leading the design, development, testing, debugging, maintaining and documenting software components to which they are assigned. The Developer will be involved in the technical design process and completes estimates and work plans for design, development, implementation, and rollout tasks. The Developer also communicates with the appropriate teams to ensure that assignments are delivered with the highest of quality and in accordance to standards. The Developer strives to continuously improve the software delivery processes and practices.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Specific skillsets we are looking for (in addition to the developer requirements we expect):
         <br/>
         * Senior Backend services developer
         <br/>
         * Experience with high throughput, distributed multi-region applications and databases
         <br/>
         * Backend REST micro services development experience
         <br/>
         * Deploying and maintaining micro services to Kubernetes
         <br/>
         * Expertise in Go language and/or Java (preferably Go)
         <br/>
         * Cloud expertise (preferably Azure)
         <br/>
         * Experience with distributed SQL and NOSQL databases
         <br/>
         * Expertise with CI/CD workflows (preferably Github)
         <br/>
         * Ability to work with remote offshore teams
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Key Responsibilities
         <br/>
         • Lead and participate in the design and implementation of large and/or architecturally significant applications.
         <br/>
         • Champion company standards and best practices. Work to continuously improve software delivery processes and practices.
         <br/>
         • Build partnerships across the application, business and infrastructure teams.
         <br/>
         • Develop programming specifications. Design, code and unit test application code using Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) best practices.
         <br/>
         • Complete estimates and work plans independently as appropriate for design, development, implementation and rollout tasks.
         <br/>
         • Create technical system documentation and ensure that this documentation remains current throughout all phases of the SDLC.
         <br/>
         • Participate in all phases of system testing.
         <br/>
         • Communicate with the appropriate teams to ensure that assignments are managed appropriately and that completed assignments are of the highest quality
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Email :
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:naresh@equitasitinc.com" target="_self">
          naresh@equitasitinc.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Is your company looking to expand its exposure and generate more business?! For the past several years, I have been doing remote business development for a number of software companies (Geophysics, AI, Security, Web &amp; App development, etc.), domestic and offshore, selling ‘services’ as well as products, working on an hourly or ‘project’ basis. This has involved jobs requiring expertise in Java, Ruby, React, and Node, to name a few. I provide the service of bringing all my decades of experience and thousands of current, C-level contacts (including verified emails and often phone numbers procured over years of paying for services like Crunchbase, ZoomInfo, Apollo, Cognism, etc.) to the promotion of your company’s business and services, here in N. America and globally. There are no guarantees that people will want to use you, only the guarantee that they perhaps would not have even known of your existence were it not for my efforts. I liken it to the ‘perfect grape’ in the vineyard. If no one knows it’s there, it’s more than likely to wind up being a raisin in the dirt rather than part of a beautiful wine! That’s my job…to ensure that you don’t wind up being a raisin. I would be happy to discuss and elaborate in an online meeting if you’re interested.
         <br/>
         Tom Wood, MS, MBA
         <br/>
         Business Development/Marketing Professional
         <br/>
         Email &amp; Skype:
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:woodsanantonio@gmail.com" target="_self">
          woodsanantonio@gmail.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7130614144860389376">
          #softwaredevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=businessdevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7130614144860389376">
          #businessdevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=internationalbusiness&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7130614144860389376">
          #internationalbusiness
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Senior Software Engineer NodeJs) - Immediate Joiners
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are seeking talented and experienced NodeJS Developers to join our dynamic team. We are a leading IT company in the industry and have a proven track record of delivering successful projects for our clients. If you are passionate about coding and have a strong background in backend development, this is the perfect opportunity for you.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This position is based in Chennai, India (onsite) with our client, the largest bank in UAE. We are currently establishing an offshore development center (ODC) and creating new squads to meet client projects. We are looking for immediate joiners who are enthusiastic and motivated to contribute to our team's success.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         ·  Utilize your minimum 7 years of development and design experience in NodeJS (Backend frameworks like express, Loopback, Koa, etc.) and Databases to develop scalable and highly available Restful APIs.
         <br/>
         ·  Employ hands-on experience in profiling tools like AppDynamics/Dynatrace, performance tuning, debugging, and monitoring to ensure optimal performance of applications.
         <br/>
         ·  Apply your expertise in microservices design patterns, such as Observer, SAGA, Circuit Breaker, API Gateway, and Service Discovery, to build efficient and robust systems.
         <br/>
         ·  Demonstrate proficiency in TypeScript/JavaScript, with at least 2 years of hands-on experience.
         <br/>
         ·  Implement performance tuning, debugging, and monitoring techniques to proactively address any issues that may arise.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Technical Skills:
         <br/>
         · Excel in developing scalable and highly-available Restful APIs using NodeJS technologies.
         <br/>
         · Possess extensive coding experience with SOLID principles, Event-Driven Architecture (Kafka), MongoDB, Redis, and a strong passion for coding.
         <br/>
         · Familiarity with CI/CD principles and actively involved in solving and troubleshooting issues in a distributed services ecosystem.
         <br/>
         · Proficiency in quality gate tools like Sonarqube, Checkmarx/fortify.
         <br/>
         · Knowledge of distributed services resiliency and monitoring in a production environment.
         <br/>
         · Understanding of containerization and experience with Docker and Kubernetes.
         <br/>
         · Exposure to API gateway integrations like 3Scale.
         <br/>
         · Understanding of Single-Sign-on or token-based authentication (Rest, JWT, oAuth).
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Functional Skills:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ·  Adhere to best coding, security, unit testing, and documentation standards and practices.
         <br/>
         ·  Previous experience in the banking, financial, or fintech sector within an enterprise environment is preferred.
         <br/>
         ·  Familiarity with Agile methodology.
         <br/>
         ·  Conduct effective research and benchmarking of technology against other best-in-class technologies.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Join us and be a part of a challenging and rewarding work environment where you can showcase your skills, grow professionally, and make a significant impact on exciting projects.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         To apply, please send your updated resume to
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="mailto:recruitment@d4insight.com" target="_self">
          recruitment@d4insight.com
         </a>
         .
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/d4insight/">
          D4 Insight
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Urgent Requirements!
         <br/>
         🚀 One of the Leading US based IT company is seeking for a Skilled 𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐨𝐫 Full Stack Developer
         <br/>
         Position: 𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐨𝐫 𝐅𝐮𝐥𝐥 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐜𝐤 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐫
         <br/>
         Location: Chakupat, Lalitpur
         <br/>
         Working Culture: Remote
         <br/>
         Salary: negotiable
         <br/>
         Experience: 5+ years
         <br/>
         What We're Looking For:
         <br/>
         • Minimum Education B.S. in Computer Science, IT or related field.
         <br/>
         • Ten+ years’ experience with product development and architecture of software, applications, and services.
         <br/>
         • ASP .NET Core &amp; Framework, C#, SQL Server, JavaScript with designing and implementing mission critical systems that manage large scale data sets.
         <br/>
         • Excellent complex SQL coding and SQL tuning skills.
         <br/>
         • In-depth experience creating API/Service interfaces.
         <br/>
         • Thorough understanding of SDLC, Agile/SCRUM Methodology, CI/CD, DevOps.
         <br/>
         • Proficiency with source control methodologies, branching, patching, etc.
         <br/>
         • Prior experience in onshore-offshore development projects.
         <br/>
         • Excellent organizational and communication skills, both oral and written.
         <br/>
         • Ability to facilitate, influence and manage change to deliver solutions.
         <br/>
         𝐓𝐨 𝐀𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐲:
         <br/>
         Send your CV to
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:alisha.necojobs@gmail.com" target="_self">
          alisha.necojobs@gmail.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=fullstackdevelopers&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7158048809984352257">
          #fullstackdevelopers
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=necojobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7158048809984352257">
          #Necojobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=applynow&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7158048809984352257">
          #ApplyNow
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=dotnet&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7158048809984352257">
          #dotnet
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         🚀 Exciting Opportunity Alert! 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌟 A friend of mine is working on a new software development company. They’ve got a brilliant offshore support team in India and are now looking to expand their footprint in the US market. 🌍
         <br/>
         <br/>
         👩‍💻 On the hunt for a US-based Sales Superstar 🌟 with a passion for agile software development and an eye for the future. If Web3, Mobile, Blockchain, and AI get you excited, they want to talk to you!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What’s in It for You?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - A chance to lead and grow the US sales division with your innovative strategies.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - Work with a diverse and talented team dedicated to making a significant impact.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - Competitive compensation package and incentives.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Ideal Candidate:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - Proven experience in sales within the tech industry, especially in software development.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - A strong understanding of Web3, Mobile, Blockchain, and AI.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - Exceptional communication and negotiation skills.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - Agile and adaptive, ready to move with the fast-paced tech world.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - Looking to make a difference and grow with a company.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🔍 If you or someone you know fits this profile and is looking for an exciting new challenge, let’s connect! 🤝
         <br/>
         <br/>
         💼 Feel free to DM me for more details or send your resume to
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:lance@idtechv.com" target="_self">
          lance@idtechv.com
         </a>
         .
         <br/>
         <br/>
         👉
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=web3&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178088153415569409">
          #Web3
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178088153415569409">
          #SoftwareDevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=techjobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178088153415569409">
          #TechJobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178088153415569409">
          #Hiring
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=salesjobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178088153415569409">
          #SalesJobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=blockchain&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178088153415569409">

         Hi Connections,
         <br/>
         We are looking for Sr Business Development Manager -for International Market willbe based out of Kolkata for Shyam Future Tech Pvt. Ltd ( Formerly Known as
         <br/>
         Shyam Future Tech LLP) is an IT arm of renowned Indian conglomerate Shyam Steelwhich has an industry experience of 60+ years in Steel, Mining, Infrastructure,Real Estate, Agro etc. Core services of the company include Web &amp; MobileApp Development, Customized ERP solutions, bespoke software development,Internet of Things and all kind new age IT solutions. Shyam Future Tech alwaysbelieves to provide best solution by the team of industry experts of different
         <br/>
         spheres.
         <br/>
         Key Skills required for this role is given below:
         <br/>
         1. Graduate in any discipline a must.
         <br/>
         2. 8-10 years’ experience in IT Service Sales (Preferably Software)
         <br/>
         3. Should have good understanding of Offshore markets
         <br/>
         4. Excellent written skills and ability to communicate well with clients from various geographies
         <br/>
         5. Should be willing to sell Software solutions (Software, Cloud Etc.)
         <br/>
         CTC: Upto 18LPA .
         <br/>
         If
         <br/>
         you are  interested, kindly share your
         <br/>
         profile to
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:Krishnendu.das@shyamsteel.com" target="_self">
          Krishnendu.das@shyamsteel.com
         </a>

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        Recent mass layoffs of business analysts at a particular company. Others showing agile coaches the door, wholesale. Imagine being the developers left with their barn door wide open.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        And yet, 'developer productivity' remains the boardroom topic for the big 4, whilst keeping cheap offshore development labour the dirty secret.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        What a state the industry is in.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        But where there's chaos, there is well-paid opportunity. And I'm looking forward to fixing my share of broken software projects in 2024. 👏
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
