     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Greetings,
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Hiring Software Engineers for Chennai location at reputed organization.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Title: Software Engineer(GUI)
         <br/>
         Department/Group: UA Team
         <br/>
         Location: Chennai Travel Required:
         <br/>
         Job type: Permanent
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Profile Summary:
         <br/>
         Education: Graduate/Post Graduate in Electronics/Electrical/Computer Science Engineering. Mandatory:
         <br/>
         • "Must have 3-4 years of GUI development experience using WPF framework and MVVM architectural pattern." I worked before with people with WinForms UI experience, trying to figure out the WPF and changing the way they think/develop a UI is very hard and we are looking for senior level developers.... Same with MVVM it's contra intuitive if they don't have experience then the learning curve is longer...
         <br/>
         • "Experience with revision control and automated build systems is required (DevOps, gitHub, TFS)."
         <br/>
         • I would like to make "Experience with SQL Server" (the express part is optional) a must for this position as there are going to be big changes related to that in VNMS and I'm expecting other applications will require some database programming knowlage.
         <br/>
         • I would like to add to the "Experience with any of the following a plus:":
         <br/>
         • ReSharper
         <br/>
         • Prism
         <br/>
         • Crystal reports
         <br/>
         • PL/SQL
         <br/>
         Desirable:
         <br/>
         • Knowledge on Embedded Systems.
         <br/>
         • Worked on Product development company earlier.
         <br/>
         • Worked on any of the following technologies, • Experience with any of the following a plus: • Bluetooth • Wi-Fi • JSON • HTML5/CSS3 • SQLITE • SSH/Telnet Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         • Design software architecture for GUI designs for various Utility Automation products
         <br/>
         • Design, code, and develop software using Windows .NET development tools “C#” and WPF.
         <br/>
         • Port or implement limited proprietary communications protocols for Hubbell designed equipment.
         <br/>
         • Participate in developing design specifications with Sales &amp; Marketing, other cross-functional teams.
         <br/>
         • Co-ordinate work, as necessary, with external consulting firms/design vendors, internal offshore team to complete project tasks. This work includes, but not limited to, creating SOW, writing design specifications, creating test plans/procedures
         <br/>
         JOB DESCRIPTION
         <br/>
         2
         <br/>
         etc. for the work to be done via external vendor.
         <br/>
         • Act as part of the development team to design the software to meet the required feature set. Assist with the design verification and validation to ensure that the completed design meets the requirements.
         <br/>
         • Inform engineering and project management on accomplishments, problems, and plans within the assigned area of responsibility.
         <br/>
         • Participate in regular project review meetings with development personnel to review technical issues.
         <br/>
         • Support Production, Service, Test, and Sales in all phases of product development including post-engineering support.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If interested, please share your resume to
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:sangeeta@technomechenergy.com" target="_self">
          sangeeta@technomechenergy.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         VAM Systems is a Business Consulting, IT Solutions and Services company.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         VAM Systems is currently looking for Dynamics 365 CRM Developer (offshore-WFH) for our UAE operations with the following skill set &amp; terms and conditions:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Qualifications and Skills:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ·        Bachelor degree in computer science or related field
         <br/>
         ·        Possess up-to-date knowledge of technological developments in the industry
         <br/>
         ·        Good knowledge of Microsoft TFS and related software methodology practices
         <br/>
         ·        Strong problem solving and decision making skills
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Roles &amp; Responsibility:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ·        Strong experience in Dynamics 365 the CRM Microsoft product (online and offline)
         <br/>
         ·        At least 3 to 5  years of experience in CRM.
         <br/>
         ·        working hours on Lebanon Time zone
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge in experience in Software Development
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge in customization on Dynamics
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge in FDD, FRD, SDD, Microsoft TFS
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge in Plug-in
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge in Scrum methodology
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge in APIs
         <br/>
         ·        Very good knowledge with module
         <br/>
         ·        Very good level of English required C1/C2 (Arabic speaking is a plus but not mandatory)
         <br/>
         ·        Excellent written and oral communication skills
         <br/>
         ·        Excellent team work skills
         <br/>
         Skills
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ·        Decision-making skills.
         <br/>
         ·        Sense of ownership.
         <br/>
         ·        Strong Oral, written and presentation skills.
         <br/>
         ·        Critical thinker and problem-solving skills.
         <br/>
         ·        Good time-management skills.
         <br/>
         ·        Good knowledge of Microsoft TFS and related software methodology practices
         <br/>
         ·        Bachelor degree in computer science or related field
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Terms and conditions
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Joining time frame: (15 - 30 days)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The selected candidates shall join VAM Systems - UAE and shall be deputed to one of the Organizations in UAE.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Should you be interested in this opportunity, please send your latest resume in MS Word format at the earliest at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:talent.acquisition@vamsystems.com" target="_self">
          talent.acquisition@vamsystems.com
         </a>
        </span>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         🚀 Exciting Update from SQA²! 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Today, every company is a technology company! Are you asking yourself these questions?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         1. Do you struggle to ramp your QA team up and down as software development continues?
         <br/>
         2. Are you looking to elevate your QA organization's expertise beyond the limitations often found with offshore resourcing?
         <br/>
         3. As a user, don’t you want more quality software faster to meet demands?
         <br/>
         4. Why do we still have bug filled software?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         SQA²’s answers these questions with our high quality fractional QA, offering a bespoke solution to tackle these hurdles head-on.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🔹 Why Fractional QA?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Flexible Resourcing: Tap into our pool of onshore, local QA experts available for exactly the duration your project demands. Achieve the perfect balance of expertise and timing without the implication of offshoring.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Versatile Expertise: Our Fractional QA model grants access to a broad spectrum of talent, from seasoned QA Architects to diligent Jr QA Analysts, all based locally. Tailor your team composition to match the precise needs of your project, ensuring the right mix of expertise and experience at every step.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Speed &amp; Quality: Accelerate your development cycle without compromising on quality, ensuring your software shines brighter and launches faster.
         <br/>
         Quality Enhancement: With our focus on quality assurance, witness tangible improvements in your software's performance and user satisfaction.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         White-Glove Service: At SQA², we aim to provide high-quality service that goes beyond expectations. Our White-Glove Service ensures personalized, end-to-end support tailored to your project's unique requirements. From the initial consultation to final delivery, expect nothing less than meticulous care, transparent communication, and a commitment to excellence that elevates your QA experience.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🔹 Tailored for Success
         <br/>
         Whether you're a startup aiming for rapid growth or an enterprise looking to fine-tune your software delivery, our Fractional, On-Demand QA is the strategic advantage you've been seeking.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🔹 Our Commitment
         <br/>
         We don’t just offer services; we provide partnership. Experience the SQA² difference with a 2-week free trial and see how we integrate seamlessly with your projects for extraordinary results.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         📍 Rooted in Southern California, SQA² is primed to empower projects across the globe.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If these challenges resonate and you’re curious about a tailored QA strategy, let’s connect! Drop a message or comment below. 👇
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=qa&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7175872640820150274">
          #QA
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=qualityassurance&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7175872640820150274">
          #QualityAssurance
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=techinnovation&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7175872640820150274">
          #TechInnovation
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=fractionalqa&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7175872640820150274">
          #FractionalQA
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=ondemandqa&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7175872640820150274">
          #OnDemandQA
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwarequality&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7175872640820150274">
          #SoftwareQuality
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=techcommunity&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7175872640820150274">
          #TechCommunity
         </a>
        </span>

         Good afternoon! I’m working on an exciting (100% remote) Chief Technology Officer position with a startup in the Insurance &amp; Data industry.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         They’re a 10 person company looking for someone with an entrepreneurial spirit to join them. We’re open to current CTO’s and Director+ level individuals looking to take the next step in their career. Experience with the following required.

         1.       Managing an offshore development team and the SDLC process
         <br/>
         2.       Owning an AWS environment
         <br/>
         3.       Managing security
         <br/>

         <br/>

         <br/>

          taylor.fulton@techcxo.com
         </a>
         ) or message me on LinkedIn if you’d like to learn more.  Have a great day!

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hi,
         <br/>
         This is Aniket Singh Rana from
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/vantagerms/">
          VantageRMS
         </a>
         , We do have openings for the role below with one of our esteemed Clients. Please Go through the below JD and if you are looking for new projects, please share your updated resume to
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="mailto:aniket.rana@vantagerms.com" target="_self">
          aniket.rana@vantagerms.com
         </a>
         or (202)454-7678 and I will reach out to you.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Title: Senior Engineer (Supply Chain)
         <br/>
         Location: Bay Lake, FL
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Basic Qualifications –
         <br/>
         Skills, Knowledge, Experience, Education, Licensure and Certifications
         <br/>
         SUPPLY CHAIN MGMT EXPERIENCE INCLUDING LOGISTICS INVENTORY MGMT, PURCHASING, ETC
         <br/>
         • Bachelor’s degree in computer science or similar field or related work experience.
         <br/>
         • Seven years of progressively related experience in design, development, and implementation of highly scalable, high-volume software systems and components, client-facing web applications, and interfaces between Supply Chain ERP systems.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Significant knowledge/experience in relevant technologies, such as:
         <br/>
         • Java/Spring Batch
         <br/>
         • PL/SQL development (Oracle DB)
         <br/>
         • Development Tools (Eclipse, Git, CI/CD, Maven, Jenkins)
         <br/>
         • JSON Messaging
         <br/>
         • Web Services (SOAP &amp; REST)
         <br/>
         • Cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)
         <br/>
         • Software Performance Optimization (memory, CPU, scaling, etc...)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Soft Skills &amp; Other Requirements:
         <br/>
         • Excellent written &amp; verbal communication skills.
         <br/>
         • Detail-oriented, self-organized, delivers quality and capable of tracking multiple pieces of work simultaneously.
         <br/>
         • Mentoring and guidance skills
         <br/>
         • Ability to handle virtual teams and work with resources in multiple sites (onsite, offshore, near shore)
         <br/>
         • Excellent time management skills
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Preferred Qualifications –
         <br/>
         • Oracle DB
         <br/>
         • Mongo DB
         <br/>
         • Experience with Supply Chain Suites (e.g., Oracle Retail, SRAI GOLD) or other large ERP such as SAP, etc.
         <br/>
         • Experience developing UI screens with Oracle’s APEX Technology
         <br/>
         • Experience developing with AngularJS/NodeJS
         <br/>
         • Experience with Flutter
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Required Education - Bachelor's or Equivalent
         <br/>
         **Must have Experience
         <br/>
         1. Overall experience -
         <br/>
         2. Experience in supply chain domain (Please provide the company name) - 3. Experience in the following: • Java/Spring Batch • PL/SQL development (Oracle DB) • Development Tools (Eclipse, Git, CI/CD, Maven, Jenkins) • JSON Messaging • Web Services (SOAP &amp; REST) • Cloud platforms (AWS, GCP) • Software Performance Optimization (memory, CPU, scaling, etc...)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=aws&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7159189071569838080">

         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=gcp&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7159189071569838080">

         </a>

          #oracledba
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=rest&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7159189071569838080">

         </a>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         We are
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7208538412297908224">
          #hiring
         </a>
         . Clairvoyant - an EXL Company is looking for a Data Engineer (Fulltime only) in New York, USA.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🚀 Job Description: 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Qualifications:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         - At least 4 years of Information Technology experience
         <br/>
         -Hands on experience in architecting Cloud data solutions using Azure Synapse, Databricks, Python, PySpark, SQL
         <br/>
         -Significant experience with Cloud Data lake technologies and complex data architecture and models
         <br/>
         -Experience building and managing cloud data platforms.
         <br/>
         -Strong experience in building data ingestion, data catalog and data analytics framework.End to end Cloud Data Lake architecture design &amp; implementation including data ingestion, data modeling and data distribution.
         <br/>
         -Build data integrations between on-prem/cloud-based systems.
         <br/>
         -Good experience in end-to-end implementation of data warehouse and data marts
         <br/>
         -Experience and detailed knowledge with ETL, Data Quality, metadata management, Data Engineering, streaming data loads
         <br/>
         -Experience designing and implementing complex solutions for distributed systemsExperience in leading and mentoring teams in onshore-offshore model.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Preferred Qualifications:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         -Good understanding of data warehousing concepts, data integration, data quality and data architecture
         <br/>
         -Good to have experience in Snowflake
         <br/>
         -Experience in Relational Modeling, Dimensional Modeling and Modeling of Unstructured Data
         <br/>
         -Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL, Unix shell scripting
         <br/>
         -Good understanding of Agile software development frameworks
         <br/>
         -Strong communication and Analytical skills
         <br/>

         <br/>
         -Experience and desire to work in a global delivery environment

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Swedium Global is the growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&amp;D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Location: Sweden
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Expected Start date: February 2024
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Name: FPGA Designer
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are looking for FPGA Design Engineer for our Sweden based project
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Description:
         <br/>
         • FPGA implementation for future-, existing- and legacy systems.
         <br/>
         • Verification in various test environments/setups.
         <br/>
         • Proven work experience as a FPGA developer, with skills in the VHDL language.
         <br/>
         • Experience in development tools like AMD/Xilinx ISE, AMD/Xilinx Vivado and Lattice Diamond.
         <br/>
         • Skills in hardware testing and debugging. You are expected to troubleshoot and test your own solutions.
         <br/>
         • Work in our agile teams to provide our delivery organization with new features and applications.
         <br/>
         • Minimum 5 years of work experience within the relevant field and a bachelor or master’s degree.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Applicants residing in Sweden will be preffered more
         <br/>
         <br/>
         You can reach out to us at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:pratik.pandey@swediumglobal.com" target="_self">
          pratik.pandey@swediumglobal.com
         </a>
         or
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="mailto:hr@swediumglobal.com" target="_self">
          hr@swediumglobal.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=fpga&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7165300428081934336">
          #FPGA
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=jobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7165300428081934336">
          #Jobs
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:427.3125px" type="button">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Senior/Mid-level
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=javadevelopers&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7154142243807805441">
          #JavaDevelopers
         </a>
         <br/>
         a new career opportunity with
         <a data-attribute-index="1" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/podixood/">
          Podix
         </a>
         <br/>
         a
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=fullyremote&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7154142243807805441">
          #fullyremote
         </a>
         position
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Podix is a Bulgarian IT service company focused on offshore/nearshore software development services.
         <br/>
         We are looking for skilled Senior Java Developers who want to solve complex technical challenges and add new technologies into their stack while working on Microservices-based Architecture.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Main Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         •	Design and development of custom Java solutions in an Agile environment
         <br/>
         •	Entirely focused on Microservice architecture
         <br/>
         •	Analyze, design, code, debug, test, document your work
         <br/>
         •	Work closely with the business and IT departments of the client to develop customized solutions
         <br/>
         •	Adapt to the client's needs, always keeping focus on quality
         <br/>
         •	Contribute to development and organizational best practices
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Tech stack:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         •	Solid experience with latest versions of Java and OOP
         <br/>
         •	Very good commercial experience with Spring Boot
         <br/>
         •	Proven experience working with a Microservices style of architecture &amp; containerization
         <br/>
         •	Previous frontend experience with HTML, CSS and JavaScript will be considered a strong asset
         <br/>
         •	Commercial experience with React.js will be considered a strong asset
         <br/>
         •	Deep knowledge of relational database - such as MySQL
         <br/>
         •	Experience with messagе brokers such as Kafka or RabbitMQ
         <br/>
         •	DevOps experience - Kubernetes, Docker
         <br/>
         •	Experience with cloud platforms such as GCP or AWS
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Please, do not hesitate to contact us for additional information.
         <br/>
         All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ***
         <br/>
         Best Regards:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Sevdelin Dimitrov,
         <br/>
         IT Recruiter @ Podix Ltd.
         <br/>

        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         We're looking for skilled and experienced candidates.
         <br/>
         Primine Software Pvt. Ltd. is leading web &amp; mobile Development and Offshore software development company based in Nagpur.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Roles:
         <br/>
         *  Java Developer : ( 1- 2 year )
         <br/>
         *  React JS Developer : ( 1-3 year )
         <br/>
         *  SQL Developer : ( 1-3 year )
         <br/>
         *  Project Manager : ( 3 year )
         <br/>
         *  PHP Developer : ( 0.6-2 year )
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Required Skills:
         <br/>
         * Good Communication and Interpersonal skills (Verbal &amp; Written)
         <br/>
         * UG/PG (BCA / B. Tech / MCA / MBA, etc.)
         <br/>
         * Project Management, Teamwork, Supervision.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Industry Type: IT Services
         <br/>
         Employment Type: Full time
         <br/>
         Location: Nagpur.
         <br/>
         share your resume at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:hr@priminesoftware.com" target="_self">
          hr@priminesoftware.com
         </a>

      </button>
     </span>

     <div class="artdeco-dropdown artdeco-dropdown--placement-bottom artdeco-dropdown--justification-right ember-view" id="ember4931">
      <button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Open control menu for post by Alexander Reynolds" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember4932" tabindex="0" type="button">
       <svg aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" data-supported-dps="16x16" data-test-icon="overflow-web-ios-small" height="16" role="none" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

      <div aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Control Menu Options" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember4933" tabindex="-1">

   <!-- -->
   <!-- -->
   <!-- -->
   <!-- -->
   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        How do I find software developers for my startup?
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Some startups might have a few obstacles that may inhibit them from finding adequate help for their software development needs.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Here are some options to try to get around this obstacle.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        1. Interns: Some students are looking for projects for their portfolio to gain experience before they go into the workforce. If the startup begins to grow there might be opportunities for them to become permanent employees of the company later on.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        A potential drawback to this is that interns can be less experienced and they are usually looking for opportunities to learn from leadership. While this can be an inexpensive option, it can run the risk of not adhering to your ideal timeline if there is too much trial and error in the software development life cycle depending on how complicated and nuanced your technology is.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        2. Offshore Remote Teams: Another option can be to work with offshore remote teams or offshore agencies that can work collaboratively with you to meet your development needs.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        A potential drawback to this can be communication issues, differences in time zones, ensuring the ownership of your intellectual property, and the inability to ensure quality.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        3. Independent Contractors: Hiring a freelancer or independent contractor can help with specific projects or tasks as needed. Independent contractors can have potentially higher fees and usually have more agency and autonomy over how they execute their projects. There is also less control over their timeline and schedule. Since they are not an internal component of your startup, they can work their own hours and potentially take priority on other projects if they need to.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        In certain cases, some independent contractors might hand the work off to someone else (or sub-contract) in the hopes of getting the requirements completed before a deadline. In doing so, there can be a risk of quality being ensured.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        4. Talent Acquisition Partnerships: Sometimes called headhunters or recruiters and can sometimes operate on an independent basis or work in conjunction with an agency. Recruitment services can be a good way to find talent based on a specific technical profile. Talent Acquisition Partners do the heavy lifting when it comes to sourcing, screening, and making sure they move along in the interview process smoothly while making sure the candidates are in alignment with the startup’s needs.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        A potential drawback can be the cost of their services. Usually, headhunters operate on a retained fee or take a percentage of the annual salary as compensation for services completed. Another potential risk is making sure the vendor you are using is experienced in sourcing and can provide candidates that align with your needs.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        In summary, there are pros, cons, and potential risks to every choice and you have to assess what might be the best option for you at the time.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Hope this helps.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        What would you add to this list?
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Share to help someone grow. 🌱
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:440.296875px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Are you a US business looking to optimize operations and boost profitability?
         <br/>
         Consider the powerful strategies of outsourcing and offshoring. Let’s dive into the benefits:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Reduced Labor Costs: Outsourcing allows you to tap into skilled talent globally, often at a fraction of the cost. You can save significantly for software development, customer support, or data entry.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Access to Quality Talent: Offshoring opens doors to a diverse pool of experts. Imagine having a dedicated team in another country, working round-the-clock to enhance your business.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Increased Productivity: By delegating non-core tasks, you free up valuable time and resources. Focus on what truly matters—your core competencies and business growth.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Ready to explore these game-changing strategies? Let’s connect and discuss how Infonovation Solutions can be your strategic partner. Together, we’ll innovate and drive success! 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>

  <div role="status">
   <!-- -->
  </div>
  <h2 class="visually-hidden">
   Feed post
  </h2>
  <div id="fie-impression-container">
   <!-- -->
   <div class="relative">
    <div class="update-components-actor display-flex update-components-actor--with-control-menu">
     <!-- -->
     <div class="update-components-actor__container display-flex flex-grow-1">
      <a aria-label="Soumyajit Debnath, graphic." class="app-aware-link update-components-actor__image relative" data-test-app-aware-link="" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/soumyajit-inceptial?miniProfileUrn=urn%3Ali%3Afs_miniProfile%3AACoAADuhQXUB0C7K11wLVaxScCGfW6oFV16TgVE" target="_self">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Greetings from Inceptial!!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This is with regard to an excellent opportunity with us and if you have that unique and unlimited passion for building world-class enterprise software products that turn into actionable intelligence, then we have the right opportunity for you and your career.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This is an opportunity with Inceptial Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What are we looking for
         <br/>
         Job Role: Magento Developer
         <br/>
         Relevant Experience: 4+ Years
         <br/>
         Location: Kolkata
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Description:
         <br/>
         Experience in web development
         <br/>
         Minimum 4+ years of proficient development experience in Magento 2.x and Zend Framework
         <br/>
         In-depth understanding of the overall B2B business model, Extension architecture, Theme hierarchy &amp; Fallback components,
         <br/>
         Extensive knowledge about writing custom Magento extension &amp; API integration, Custom Payment Extension, Knowledge of multiple website and store
         <br/>
         Excellent understanding of MVC architecture, OOPS concept, RDBMS concept, REST
         <br/>
         Comfortable with LINUX working environment
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Wishing you all the very best!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         In case you might want to get in touch with us for better assistance, please feel free to email us at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:soumyajit@inceptialtech.com" target="_self">
          soumyajit@inceptialtech.com
         </a>
         and we would be more than glad to help you.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         About Company:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are a global business solutions, product development, and IT services firm.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are a niche Cloud Consulting Firm specializing in Oracle and Salesforce Cloud Applications. We are headquartered in the USA with operations in the UK and several locations in India. We have invested in Cloud solutions and services for the past 10 years. Our Offshore Delivery Centre handles cutting-edge technology projects for International and national clients.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Over a period of time, Inceptial has broadened its horizon across Application Development &amp;amp; Modernization, Analytics, and Infrastructure Solutions. At Inceptial we help drive Customer Success by leveraging our expertise in IT Solutions and Business Process improvements. Our approach of “Client First” focuses on providing a dedicated and committed team to help our customers achieve their goals. With our “Trusted Partner” services philosophy, we have developed several frameworks and accelerators in various technologies. We have evolved to be thought leaders and we play a critical role in formulating our client’s business strategy. We consider ourselves a pioneer in creating industry-specific business solutions. Our team is adept at creating new-age digital practices that enable extensive business growth through value addition.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Inceptial has been recognized as the only implementation partner by Oracle for its various projects in Eastern India.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Thanks &amp; Regards,
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Soumyajit Debnath
         <br/>
         Talent Acquisition- IT
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=magentodeveloper&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7099277775731126274">
          #magentodeveloper
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=webdevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7099277775731126274">
          #webdevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=kolkata&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7099277775731126274">

         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=php&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7099277775731126274">

             <svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="16x16" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

     <div class="artdeco-dropdown artdeco-dropdown--placement-bottom artdeco-dropdown--justification-right ember-view" id="ember5019">
      <button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Open control menu for post by Ethan Kazi" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember5020" tabindex="0" type="button">
       <svg aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" data-supported-dps="16x16" data-test-icon="overflow-web-ios-small" height="16" role="none" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

      <div aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Control Menu Options" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember5021" tabindex="-1">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         JOB SEEKERS BEWARE!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         LinkedIn scammers are aggressively targeting job seekers just in time for the holidays (they need to buy presents too you know). If you're actively looking for a job and using LinkedIn to search:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         1) Be sure to verify that the job posting you are applying to is from a real and legitimate company. The scammers go to great lengths to post legitimate looking job postings that go to fake websites that look similar to real companies that are actively hiring.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         2) Verify the job opening on the organization's real website and submit your information through links and information provided directly on the organization's website.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         3) When in doubt, contact the company's recruiting or human resources department to verify the information is accurate and legitimate. The scammers on LinkedIn (really everywhere these days) are becoming more pervasive and their tactics are continuously evolving so it is important to stay vigilant.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         4) As soon as you see fraudulent behavior report it (in this case to LinkedIn). The faster and more frequently the fraudulent activity is identified and reported the better it can be prevented in the future.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Please share this information with those in your network that are actively seeking new employment and could fall victim to these attacks.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If you are applying to any jobs at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-canton-group/">
          The Canton Group
         </a>
         , verify the job openings directly on our website (
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="http://www.cantongroup.com" target="_self">
          www.cantongroup.com
         </a>
         ). Only submit information to us via our website or directly to a Canton Group staff member using a company email with (@
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="http://cantongroup.com" target="_self">
          cantongroup.com
         </a>
         ). All of The Canton Group team is based in the United States and all of our recruiting and human resources staff speak English extremely well (broken English and strange/improper use of English words would be very out of the ordinary for our team and is likely an offshore call center being used for nefarious purposes). Last but not least, The Canton Group has a pretty rigorous and thorough recruiting and interview process. It's unlikely that there would be any doubt that you are speaking to members of The Canton Group team when you interview with us. We'd certainly love for you to consider working with us. To do so without fear of being scammed, go directly to our Canton Group website via the link below.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cantongroup&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7130317229262299136">
          #CantonGroup
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7130317229262299136">
          #hiring
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=linkedinscams&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7130317229262299136">
          #LinkedInScams
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cybersecurity&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7130317229262299136">
          #cybersecurity
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=jobseekers&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7130317229262299136">
          #jobseekers
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:437.140625px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more
      </span>

     <a class="tap-target update-components-mini-update-v2__link-to-details-page text-body-medium ember-view" href="/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7204860401748955139/" id="ember5053" tabindex="-1">
      <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
       <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
        <!-- -->
        <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
         <!-- -->
         <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
          Confused about nearshore vs. onshore outsourcing? We can help!
          <br/>
          <br/>
          Nearshore outsourcing uses a team in a nearby country. It offers proximity, cultural understanding, and cost-effectiveness.
          <br/>
          <br/>
          An onshore team is in the same country as the company. It is typically more costly, but it can offer a deeper cultural understanding and accessibility.
          <br/>
          <br/>
          Which one is right for your business?
          <br/>
          <br/>
          Reach out today to learn how we can help you find the perfect fit!
         </span>
        </span>
       </div>

        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         💼🛠️ Software Development Services: Efficient Solutions for Your Business Operations! 💻🚀 Looking for reliable software solutions to streamline your business operations? Our software development services offer efficient and tailored solutions to meet your specific needs. Whether you need a custom web application, mobile app, or enterprise software, our experienced developers are here to help.
         <br/>
         🔧 Key Services:
         <br/>
         ✅ Custom Web Application Development
         <br/>
         ✅ Mobile App Development (iOS &amp; Android)
         <br/>
         ✅ Enterprise Software Solutions
         <br/>
         ✅ CRM &amp; ERP Development
         <br/>
         ✅ E-commerce Solutions
         <br/>
         Let us empower your business with innovative software solutions tailored to your unique requirements!
         <br/>

        </use>
       </svg>
       <!-- -->
      </button>
      <div aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Control Menu Options" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember5142" tabindex="-1">
       <!-- -->
      </div>
     </div>
     <!-- -->
     <!-- -->
     <!-- -->
     <!-- -->
     <!-- -->
     <!-- -->
     <!-- -->
    </div>
   </div>
   <!-- -->
   <!-- -->
   <!-- -->
   <!-- -->
   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7090632136377954304">
          #nearshore
         </a>
         and
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7090632136377954304">
          #offshore
         </a>
         development are both forms of outsourcing software development to external companies or teams located in different geographic regions. They are popular strategies for businesses looking to leverage talent and reduce development costs. The main difference between the two lies in the location of the outsourcing team in relation to the client's home country:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ⏲ 🖥 Nearshore Development:
         <br/>
         Nearshore development refers to outsourcing software development to a neighboring or nearby country, usually within the same time zone or a similar time zone. For example, if a company in the United States outsources its development work to a company in Mexico or Canada, it would be considered a nearshore development arrangement. Some advantages of nearshore development include:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🕰 Proximity: The geographic proximity often means that there are fewer cultural and communication barriers, making collaboration easier.
         <br/>
         Similar Time Zones: Teams in nearshore locations can often work in the same or overlapping time zones, leading to better real-time communication and responsiveness.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🛬 Lower Travel Costs: Visiting the development team for meetings or on-site collaboration is more cost-effective compared to offshore locations.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         💻 ⏱ Offshore Development:
         <br/>
         Offshore development, on the other hand, involves outsourcing software development to a company located in a different region of the world, often in a country with significantly different time zones. For example, if a company in the United States outsources its development work to a company in India or Ukraine, it would be considered offshore development. Some advantages of offshore development include:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         💲 💸 Cost Savings: Offshore development can often lead to lower development costs due to differences in labor costs and other economic factors between countries.
         <br/>
         Access to Skilled Talent: Offshore locations may have a large pool of skilled developers, providing access to specialized expertise that may be challenging to find locally.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🕝 Round-the-Clock Development: Time zone differences can be advantageous for businesses that want development work to continue 24/7, with teams handing off tasks at the end of their workday to teams in other time zones.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Choosing between
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshoresoftwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7090632136377954304">
          #nearshoresoftwaredevelopment
         </a>
         and
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7090632136377954304">
          #offshoredevelopment
         </a>
         development depends on various factors, including budget, project complexity, required expertise, cultural compatibility, and the level of control and
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=communication&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7090632136377954304">
          #communication
         </a>
         desired.
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=staffingsolutions&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7090632136377954304">
          #staffingsolutions
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=itstaffaugmentation&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7090632136377954304">
          #itstaffaugmentation
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoreservices&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7090632136377954304">
          #offshoreservices
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshorestaffaugmentation&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7090632136377954304">
          #nearshorestaffaugmentation
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=india&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7090632136377954304">
          #india
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:438.9375px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more
      </span>
     </button>

      <button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Open control menu for post by Naing Kyaw Aung" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember5171" tabindex="0" type="button">

   <!-- -->
   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--2-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         We are looking for a Chinese speaking Project Manager to work with offshore developers on IT software development and maintenance.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Position-Chinese Project Manager
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         - Assist the company in project coordination and communication (Chinese)
         <br/>
         - Participate in various meetings during project delivery or maintenance and record the meeting content (Take MOM)
         <br/>
         - Assist project managers and R&amp;D personnel to communicate, troubleshoot and solve problems
         <br/>
         - Prepare and report on regular project reports
         <br/>
         - Provide translation work for overseas employees and Chinese teams
         <br/>
         - Participate in any work within the company that requires Chinese coordination
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job requirements:
         <br/>
         - Fluent in Chinese and English (required)
         <br/>
         - Strong communication skills and sense of responsibility
         <br/>
         -Able to work under certain pressure
         <br/>
         - Preferably have working experience in the software industry
         <br/>
         - IT education background is preferred
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Salary - Negotiable
         <br/>
         Location - Flexible
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Applicants interested in applying for the above positions, please send your resume to
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:naingkyawaung@lnkits.com" target="_self">
          naingkyawaung@lnkits.com
         </a>
         ,

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        We're hiring for a Sr. Java Developer
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Job Description
        <br/>
        As a skilled Java Developer, you will be working together with project team to design and implement quality solutions as per customers’ requirements.
        <br/>
        Company Profile:
        <br/>
        Our client is a Singapore-based technology provider of award-winning Loan Origination and Risk Management platforms and expert-level consulting services.
        <br/>
        Our client is currently expanding their local presence in the Philippines and they are seeking for a Mid - Senior Java Developer who is organized, methodical, motivated, detail-oriented, and can envisage building a long-term career within the company.
        <br/>
        This is the perfect career move for someone who is looking for career growth and opportunity to participate in the transformation and expansion of the company as they continuously grow in the market.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Duties and Responsibilities:
        <br/>
        Work together with project team to design and implement quality solutions as per customers’ requirements
        <br/>
        Debugging and resolving technical problems that arise
        <br/>
        Participate in solutioning meetings with project team and customers
        <br/>
        Responsible to deliver high quality codes for implementations
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Must-have Skills / Qualification:
        <br/>
        Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or similar field
        <br/>
        Strong hands-on experience with Java and Spring stack
        <br/>
        Working knowledge of Web API, REST, XML, JSON
        <br/>
        Hands-on experience in UI/UX development using JSP, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
        <br/>
        Able to define solution and prepare technical specifications according to Functional Specifications
        <br/>
        Excellent written and verbal reasoning and communication skills in English
        <br/>
        Excellent problem-solving skills with high level of initiative
        <br/>
        Meticulous, detailed and able to work with minimal supervision
        <br/>
        Ability to work under pressure and meeting tight deadlines
        <br/>
        Ability to lead technical solutions end to end
        <br/>
        Advantageous skills or nice-to-haves:
        <br/>
        Experience in Banking Solution development
        <br/>
        Experience in UNIX environments, systems setup and application deployment
        <br/>
        Experience working in a cross-cultural team with multi geographical locations (onsite-offshore)
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Job Type: Permanent
        <br/>
        Emp Type: Full-time
        <br/>
        Location: Onsite, Makati
        <br/>
        Industry: Information Technology (Software)
        <br/>
        Expertise: Software Development
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:99.96875px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more
      </span>
     </button>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Greetings from Inceptial!!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This is with regard to an excellent opportunity with us and if you have that unique and unlimited passion for building world-class enterprise software products that turn into actionable intelligence, then we have the right opportunity for you and your career.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         This is an opportunity with Inceptial Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What are we looking for
         <br/>
         Job Role: Java Tech Lead
         <br/>
         Relevant Experience: 6+ Years
         <br/>
         Location: Kolkata (Hybrid)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Description:
         <br/>
         6+ years of professional Java development experience.
         <br/>
         Strong expertise in Spring Boot and Hibernate.
         <br/>
         Proven experience in leading and mentoring development teams.
         <br/>
         Proficiency in software design principles, design patterns, and architectural best practices.
         <br/>
         Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
         <br/>
         Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
         <br/>
         Experience with Agile development methodologies is a plus.
         <br/>
         Knowledge of microservices architecture is a plus.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Wishing you all the very best!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         In case you might want to get in touch with us for better assistance, please feel free to email us at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:soumyajit@inceptialtech.com" target="_self">
          soumyajit@inceptialtech.com
         </a>
         and we would be more than glad to help you.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         About Company:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are a global business solutions, product development, and IT services firm.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are a niche Cloud Consulting Firm specializing in Oracle and Salesforce Cloud Applications. We are headquartered in the USA with operations in the UK and several locations in India. We have invested in Cloud solutions and services for the past 10 years. Our Offshore Delivery Centre handles cutting-edge technology projects for International and national clients.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Over a period of time, Inceptial has broadened its horizon across Application Development &amp;amp; Modernization, Analytics, and Infrastructure Solutions. At Inceptial we help drive Customer Success by leveraging our expertise in IT Solutions and Business Process improvements. Our approach of “Client First” focuses on providing a dedicated and committed team to help our customers achieve their goals. With our “Trusted Partner” services philosophy, we have developed several frameworks and accelerators in various technologies. We have evolved to be thought leaders and we play a critical role in formulating our client’s business strategy. We consider ourselves a pioneer in creating industry-specific business solutions. Our team is adept at creating new-age digital practices that enable extensive business growth through value addition.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Inceptial has been recognized as the only implementation partner by Oracle for its various projects in Eastern India.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Thanks &amp; Regards,
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Soumyajit Debnath
         <br/>
         Talent Acquisition- IT
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=java&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7112366405466955777">
          #java
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hibernate&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7112366405466955777">
          #hibernate
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=springboot&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7112366405466955777">
          #springboot
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=lead&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7112366405466955777">
          #lead
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=kolkata&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7112366405466955777">
          #kolkata
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=opentowork&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7112366405466955777">
          #opentowork
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=urgenthiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7112366405466955777">
          #urgenthiring
         </a>
        </span>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        Walk-In Drive at IonIdea for the position of a Consultant/Sr Consultant
        <br/>
        IonIdea is an IT Solutions company (ISO 9001, SEI CMMi Level 3) headquartered in Virginia, U.S.A having offshore Development Centre in Bangalore. The services IonIdea offers include Software Product Design and Development, System and Application Integration, QA and Testing, and Application Maintenance and Production Support.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        We are currently looking for Performance Engineers with APM tools who will be involved in more of Implementation role than a Development role.
        <br/>
        Please find the details below:
        <br/>
        Performance Engineers with APM Tools
        <br/>
        Candidates should be ready to travel.
        <br/>
        Experience          : 3-5 years
        <br/>
        Education           : BE/BTECH/MCA/ MTECH from Computer Science
        <br/>
        Location             : Bangalore/ Hyderabad/Chennai/ Delhi
        <br/>
        Required Technical Skills:
        <br/>
        <br/>
        · Performance Engineering with APM tools
        <br/>
        · Proficient in Java, J2ee/ Python
        <br/>
        · Knowledge in Tomcat, Jboss etc.
        <br/>
        · Knowledge in any Web Servers (e.g., Apache, Nginx).
        <br/>
        · Good to have Configuration Management tools (e.g., Ansible, Puppet, Chef).
        <br/>
        · Sound experience or knowledge in understanding network protocols including TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, and VPN.
        <br/>
        · Hands on experience in Linux.
        <br/>
        · Good to have exposure on cloud platform such as AWS/ Azure/GCP.
        <br/>
        Soft skills:
        <br/>
        · Should have good interpersonal skills with excellent communication.
        <br/>
        · Urge to learn and self-starters
        <br/>
        · Flexible to travel and relocate if required.
        <br/>
        Walk-In for a direct interview on the below dates:
        <br/>
        Wednesday, 21st Feb 2024 and Friday, 23rd Feb 2024 between 9-5pm
        <br/>
        Venue Details:
        <br/>
        IonIdea Pvt Ltd
        <br/>
        38-40, Epip Zone, Whitefield, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560066 ·
        <br/>
        Lankmark: Next to KTPO
        <br/>
        Thanks
        <br/>
        IonIdea
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Dear Connections,
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/swedium-global-services-ab/">
          Swedium Global Services
         </a>
         is hiring for Infra DevOps Engineer for Gothenburg, Sweden.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/swedium-global-services-ab/">
          Swedium Global Services
         </a>
         is a growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&amp;D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are looking for someone who is already residing in Gothenburg or Someone residing in sweden.
         <br/>
         Mandatory Skills : Jira, Confluence, AWS Cloud Infrastructure, Agile
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Interested can share the CV to
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="mailto:shama.nayak@swediumglobal.com" target="_self">
          shama.nayak@swediumglobal.com
         </a>

         We are looking for a Chinese speaking Project Manager to work with offshore developers on IT software development and maintenance.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Position-Chinese Project Manager
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         - Assist the company in project coordination and communication (Chinese)
         <br/>
         - Participate in various meetings during project delivery or maintenance and record the meeting content (Take MOM)
         <br/>
         - Assist project managers and R&amp;D personnel to communicate, troubleshoot and solve problems
         <br/>
         - Prepare and report on regular project reports
         <br/>
         - Provide translation work for overseas employees and Chinese teams
         <br/>
         - Participate in any work within the company that requires Chinese coordination
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job requirements:
         <br/>
         - Fluent in Chinese and English (required)
         <br/>
         - Strong communication skills and sense of responsibility
         <br/>
         -Able to work under certain pressure
         <br/>
         - Preferably have working experience in the software industry
         <br/>
         - IT education background is preferred
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Salary - Negotiable
         <br/>
         Location - Flexible
         <br/>

    <div class="feed-shared-control-menu display-flex feed-shared-update-v2__control-menu absolute text-align-right">
     <!-- -->
     <div class="artdeco-dropdown artdeco-dropdown--placement-bottom artdeco-dropdown--justification-right ember-view" id="ember5381">
      <button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Open control menu for post by Edisiene Correia" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember5382" tabindex="0" type="button">
       <svg aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" data-supported-dps="16x16" data-test-icon="overflow-web-ios-small" height="16" role="none" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
        <!-- -->

        </use>
       </svg>
       <!-- -->
      </button>
      <div aria-hidden="true" aria-label="Control Menu Options" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember5383" tabindex="-1">
       <!-- -->
      </div>
     </div>
     <!-- -->
     <!-- -->
     <!-- -->
     <!-- -->
     <!-- -->
     <!-- -->
     <!-- -->
    </div>
   </div>
   <!-- -->
   <!-- -->
   <!-- -->
   <!-- -->
   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        Seismic data reprocessing service supports offshore wind feasibility studies
        <br/>
        Ocean Geophysics is offering to reprocess freely available seismic data to help developers looking to bid for wind farm projects.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Ocean Geophysics is offering to reprocess freely available seismic data to help developers looking to bid for wind farm projects.
        <br/>
        According to the company, legacy seismic data from the offshore oil and gas and offshore renewable energy industries is available via national energy authorities in the UK, Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, Norway, and Australia.
        <br/>
        It is also possible to acquire historical seismic data from the archives of oil companies that previously operated in these regions.
        <br/>
        Ocean Geophysics applies modern software and processing techniques to the datasets to provide new insights into the subsurface's shallower lying parts.
        <br/>
        This, it claims, can help its clients reduce the costs and risks of potential offshore wind developments through avoiding reconnaissance surveys offshore.
        <br/>
        Chris Weller, director of seismic, said, “We are essentially exemplifying the transformative power of advanced data processing techniques in enhancing vintage sub-bottom profiler/pinger data and S-UHRS from previous seismic surveys.”
        <br/>
        Initially, raw sub-bottom profiler data undergo rigorous preprocessing to mitigate noise and artifacts, ensuring the integrity of data analyses. This is followed by the application of algorithms and signal-processing techniques.
        <br/>
        Integrating shallow and deeper data layers has historically been problematic due to discrepancies in resolution and clarity. However, the company says it can merge these disparate layers, leading to a clearer interpretation of subsurface structures and sedimentary formations.
        <br/>
        “This breakthrough has unveiled previously obscured details, notably exposing a delicate layer of sediment that had until now remained invisible to conventional analysis methods,” Weller said. “This thus gives insights into geology that was previously obscured by both the processing at the time and the acquisition method.”
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
     <button aria-label="see more, visually reveals content which is already detected by screen readers" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__dynamic-more-text" role="button" style="left:309.265625px" type="button">
      <span>
       …more
      </span>
     </button>
     <!-- -->
    </div>
