   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Job openings at IonIdea for the position of a
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=consultant&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Consultant
         </a>
         role
         <br/>
         <br/>
         IonIdea is an IT Solutions company (ISO 9001, SEI CMMi Level 3) headquartered in Virginia, U.S.A having offshore Development Centre in Bangalore. The services IonIdea offers include Software Product Design and Development, System and Application Integration, QA and Testing, and Application Maintenance and Production Support.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are currently looking for
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=performance&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Performance
         </a>
         Engineers with
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=apm&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #APM
         </a>
         tools who will be involved in Implementation role.
         <br/>
         Please find the details below:
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=performance&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Performance
         </a>
         Engineering with
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=apm&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #APM
         </a>
         Tools
         <br/>
         Candidates should be ready to travel.
         <br/>
         Experience : 3-5 years
         <br/>
         Education : BE/BTECH/MCA/ MTECH from Computer Science
         <br/>
         Location :
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=bangalore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Bangalore
         </a>
         /
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hyderabad&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Hyderabad
         </a>
         /
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=chennai&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Chennai
         </a>
         /
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=delhi&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Delhi
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Required Technical Skills:
         <br/>
         ·
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=performance&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Performance
         </a>
         Engineering with
         <a data-attribute-index="10" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=apm&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #APM
         </a>
         tools
         <br/>
         · Proficient in
         <a data-attribute-index="11" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=java&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Java
         </a>
         , J2ee/ Python
         <br/>
         · Knowledge in
         <a data-attribute-index="12" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=tomcat&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Tomcat
         </a>
         ,
         <a data-attribute-index="13" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=jboss&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Jboss
         </a>
         etc.
         <br/>
         · Knowledge in any
         <a data-attribute-index="14" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=web&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Web
         </a>
         Servers (e.g., Apache, Nginx).
         <br/>
         · Good to have
         <a data-attribute-index="15" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=configuration&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Configuration
         </a>
         Management tools (e.g., Ansible, Puppet, Chef).
         <br/>
         · Sound experience or knowledge in understanding
         <a data-attribute-index="16" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=network&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Network
         </a>
         protocols including TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, and VPN.
         <br/>
         · Hands on experience in
         <a data-attribute-index="17" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=linux&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #Linux
         </a>
         .
         <br/>
         · Good to have exposure on
         <a data-attribute-index="18" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cloud&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7171463591747940352">
          #cloud
         </a>
         platform such as AWS/ Azure/GCP.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Soft skills:
         <br/>
         · Should have good interpersonal skills with excellent communication.
         <br/>
         · Urge to learn and self-starters
         <br/>
         · Flexible to travel and relocate if required.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Kindly share the resumes @
         <a data-attribute-index="19" href="mailto:suchitra.s@ionidea.com" target="_self">
          suchitra.s@ionidea.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Thanks
         <br/>
         IonIdea
        </span>

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         MEET OUR NEW GOLD BUSINESS PARTNERS!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We're excited to welcome aboard our new Gold Business Partners at NordCham Philippines! Their commitment and trust in our mission are invaluable, and we're eagerly looking forward to diving into this journey of collaboration and growth together.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Copenhagen Infrastructure Partners
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/copenhagenoffshorepartners/">
          Copenhagen Offshore Partners
         </a>
         leads offshore wind project origination, development and construction in new and established markets around the world. Founded in 2015, we are an exclusive global offshore wind development partner to Copenhagen Infrastructure Partners.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/infiniteservices/">
          InfiniteDATA
         </a>
         <br/>
         InfiniteDATA is a software company based in Warsaw, operating from Warsaw, Vienna, Helsinki, Singapore, and Manila. Producer of the globally recognized enterprise automation platform AutomateNOW!. AutomateNOW is the leading next-generation Enterprise Automation and Orchestration solution, which successfully revolutionizes the mature Workload Automation (WLA) market. Modern architecture, scalability, automation capabilities, and ease of use help customers democratize automation in their organizations.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Be a part of an extensive network which includes C-level decision makers in the Nordic countries and the Philippines.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Learn more:
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://lnkd.in/gMzbYQMX" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/gMzbYQMX
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nordchamphilippines&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7180519282760466432">
          #NordChamPhilippines
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=yourpartnerforbusinessgrowth&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7180519282760466432">
          #YourPartnerForBusinessGrowth
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         I am very glad to share few noteworthy client wins we had recently at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/buzzybrains-software/">
          BuzzyBrains Software
         </a>
         .
         <br/>
         We had an opportunity to meet founders of a Nasdaq listed $700 M valued cloud infrastructure company based in Bay area, who started their new venture which is a revolutionary product in the field of AI powered development acceleration. They had been looking for an offshore development partner to collaborate on this product development.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Our other recent client based out of Seattle, happens to be an accomplished technologist, Ex-Microsoft C Level, who started a new venture with a product in the field of AI powered online reputation management for brands. We engaged with him over several technical discussions as he was looking for a development partner in India to collaborate.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         In both the cases, we had up to 1-2 months long technical discussions with these clients before the final closure, that also involved the evaluation process where we had an opportunity to prove our capabilities by implementing a few proof of concepts that were very much appreciated by the clients. It’s been some time now we are working together and we regularly seek feedback about our work. They very openly admire our team and our capability to deliver solution to complex problems.
         <br/>
         In both the cases we are working on leveraging generative AI models from OpenAI GPT-4 Turbo, Google Gemini, PaLM 2, Google SGE, Llama 2 (Meta), Claude (Anthropic).
         <br/>
         <br/>
         While every client is equally important for us but getting associated and working together with such highly successful people in the industry is an immense motivation booster for us! Kudos to the team at
         <a data-attribute-index="2" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/buzzybrains-software/">
          BuzzyBrains Software
         </a>
         !
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAHeEvAB--bMkazfIQElJ_0sys1MTWBKkWM">
          Ajay Chawda
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAhFmVIBD9MuaxAgAJXtVHs5L-p3X7UCnhc">
          akshay gupta
         </a>
         Arindam Biswas
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=clientwins&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7160918200472199169">
          #clientwins
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=genai&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7160918200472199169">
          #genai
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="10" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshoredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7160918200472199169">
          #offshoredevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="11" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=customsoftwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7160918200472199169">
          #customsoftwaredevelopment
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="12" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=generativeai&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7160918200472199169">
          #generativeai
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="13" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=buzzybrains&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7160918200472199169">
          #buzzybrains
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

  <div id="fie-impression-container">

       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Php Team Leader
         <br/>
         Experience : Up to 8 years Or more.
         <br/>
         Salary: 30 to 50K
         <br/>
         Job Location: Egypt - Mansoura
         <br/>
         Work from the company's headquarters only
         <br/>
         Job Description
         <br/>
         - Opportunity to build and lead a technical team that will transform the customer experience
         <br/>
         - We are not only looking for technical qualifications, but also the ability to lead and mentor internal team and offshore team those partnered with us
         <br/>
         - 5 to 6 years years in software development, with at least 2+ years in building open and closed architecture solutions
         <br/>
         - Ability to coordinate the team and ensure on time project delivery and quality outcome
         <br/>
         - Hands on technologies like - MVC, PHP, MYSQL, Mongo DB, React JS, Node JS, Angular, Hybrid Mobile Application Development, Web Application Development, Realstate, travel
         <br/>
         system, booking system, E-commerce
         <br/>
         Very important.
         <br/>
         To be supervised or involved in the work of large projects in the field of operating systems
         <br/>
         Example:
         <br/>
         (System ( booking, e-commerce, Realstate
         <br/>
         Development and project management tools like Trello, JIRA, DevOps
         <br/>
         - Sound understanding of the customer, user interface &amp; experience
         <br/>
         - Dedication to systemic thinking and a demonstrable history of continuous process improvement
         <br/>
         - Ability to scope, budget and efficiently and effectively utilize available resources
         <br/>
         - Ability to hire, develop and nurture a core product engineering team
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=teamlead&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7174492376323809280">

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         📢 👀
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=attention&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #Attention
         </a>
         all
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=innovators&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #innovators
         </a>
         !
         <a data-attribute-index="2" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/offshorewindinnovationhub/">
          Offshore Wind Innovation Hub
         </a>
         's Accelerator program EXTENDED the application
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=deadline&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #deadline
         </a>
         to April 1st! 📝 📅
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🌬 ⚡ The
         <a data-attribute-index="5" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/offshorewindinnovationhub/">
          Offshore Wind Innovation Hub
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=accelerator&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #Accelerator
         </a>
         is a six-month intensive
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=program&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #program
         </a>
         in New York that provides unparalleled
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=support&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #support
         </a>
         for
         <a data-attribute-index="10" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=global&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #global
         </a>
         innovators looking to develop novel
         <a data-attribute-index="11" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #offshore
         </a>
         wind technologies and advance
         <a data-attribute-index="12" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=commercialization&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #commercialization
         </a>
         . 🗽 🏙 🌎
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✅ Program benefits: Bespoke scale-up support, individualized
         <a data-attribute-index="13" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=mentorship&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #mentorship
         </a>
         from
         <a data-attribute-index="14" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/equinor/">
          Equinor
         </a>
         , curated
         <a data-attribute-index="16" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=programming&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #programming
         </a>
         , business development
         <a data-attribute-index="17" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=coaching&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #coaching
         </a>
         , product validation and piloting assistance,
         <a data-attribute-index="18" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=network&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #network
         </a>
         access, and free tenantship at our
         <a data-attribute-index="19" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=office&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #office
         </a>
         in
         <a data-attribute-index="20" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=brooklyn&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #Brooklyn
         </a>
         .
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ✅ Technology in scope:
         <a data-attribute-index="21" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hardware&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #Hardware
         </a>
         and/or
         <a data-attribute-index="22" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #software
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="23" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=solutions&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #solutions
         </a>
         that improve project economics for offshore
         <a data-attribute-index="24" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=wind&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #wind
         </a>
         developers. This includes wind power and site characterization, project and port development, installation and construction, transmission, operations, and maintenance technologies.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Program eligibility: Open to global applicants, no maximum company size but technology submitted should have a TRL between 4-7. Applicants must find the US market to be of considerable interest and actively investigate product-market fit. ⚡
         <br/>
         <br/>
         📅 📝 The final
         <a data-attribute-index="25" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=application&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #application
         </a>
         deadline is April 1st at 12pm noon EST, 2024!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ➡ Submit your application today:
         <a data-attribute-index="26" href="https://lnkd.in/eRynWueY" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/eRynWueY
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="27" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cleantech&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #cleantech
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="28" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=innovationhub&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #innovationhub
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="29" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=offshorewind&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #offshorewind
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="30" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cleanenergy&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7178786949023821824">
          #cleanenergy
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hiring for USA- Head of Sales
         <br/>
         Head of US sales – Atleast 20+yrs experience Candidate and should be hands-on. This position will be based out of East Coast Maryland
         <br/>
         Role: Head of Sales - Americas
         <br/>
         Position: Permanent
         <br/>
         Location: Maryland -Middle Atlantic region of the eastern United States
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Our client is Telecom Software Application Development and services  company based in Silicon valley and offices are in NJ ,NY ,Maryland USA and offshore development center are in in in Bengaluru and NCR Delhi India.
         <br/>
         We are looking Head of Sales USA in Telecom Domain . Pls see if profile relevant and ready to join in East Coast Maryland.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Mandatory Skills Required:
         <br/>
         Goal oriented, hands-on experience in Sales life-cycle (prospecting, lead qualification, requirement understanding, proposal presentation and Sales closure).
         <br/>
         Good communication and interpersonal skills are a must
         <br/>
         Experience is selling in the North American geography in the Telecom OEM and Media space in North America
         <br/>
         Must be willing to travel extensively on business in North America (expected travel upto 50%)
         <br/>
         Must possess an affable personality with a proven record in interworking with other functions (esp. Between Engineering &amp; Sales).
         <br/>
         Clear understanding of concepts in communications engineering, modern telecom networking and applications and the ability to do solution selling to customers
         <br/>
         Ability to meet and communicate with CXO or VP engineering titles in customers
         <br/>
         Exposure to working in Indian Companies
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Desired Skills Required (Preferred but not mandatory):
         <br/>
         Exposure to market analysis &amp; research
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Key Work Accountabilities / Responsibilities for the Position Holder:
         <br/>
         Planning and leading the growth of sales in North America
         <br/>
         Leading team of sales professionals in the region
         <br/>
         Selling to accounts in the Telecom OEM, Media, Carrier and ISV space,
         <br/>
         Territory development in USA-Canada regions primarily,
         <br/>
         Ensuring sales growth through [i] addition of new accounts and [ii] Revenue enhancement in existing accounts
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Any Additional Information:
         <br/>
         Past experience in selling to Telecom OEM’s or Media space is required
         <br/>
         Should have a mix of “hunter” and “farmer” skills with lot of emphasis on “hunting” skills
         <br/>
         Exposure to sales of software intensive services related to any of the following would be a big plus: Wireless Cellular, Media, Satellite, Datacom (IP, MPLS, Automotive), Converged Mobile Applications and Embedded Engineering(FPGA/ DSP/ ASIC), Smart phones and handheld devices such as Tablets
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Academic Qualification:
         <br/>
         Graduate Engineering Degree in Electrical/Electronics/Communications/Telecom/Computers Sc &amp; Engg. OR a relevant related qualification Post Graduate Engineering Degree Holders may also apply An MBA qualification though not mandatory would be an added advantage
         <br/>
         <br/>
         If profile relevant , pls share the cv on
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:suryasingh@indusitc.com" target="_self">
          suryasingh@indusitc.com
         </a>
         /
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="mailto:indushr@indusitc.com" target="_self">
          indushr@indusitc.com
         </a>
         or call me +91-9811107008
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Job Title: Sr. Golang Backend Developer
         <br/>
         Location: Hybrid from Cincinnati/Blue Ash, OH
         <br/>
         Job Type: Contract
         <br/>
         Client preference visa independent candidates only
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Skills/Experience:
         <br/>
         Microservices (MUST-HAVE!!!!)
         <br/>
         Experience working with high-volume applications.
         <br/>
         Both GO and Java experience (Experience with both is not a requirement but this would be a differentiator)
         <br/>
         Note: Candidates must be able to collaborate with offshore teams.
         <br/>
         Project: Backend development on a customer platform/profile. Will also provide production support.
         <br/>
         Specific skillsets we are looking for (in addition to the developer requirements we expect):
         <br/>
         * Senior Backend services developer
         <br/>
         * Experience with high throughput, distributed multi-region applications and databases
         <br/>
         * Backend REST micro services development experience
         <br/>
         * Deploying and maintaining micro services to Kubernetes
         <br/>
         * Expertise in Go language and/or Java (preferably Go)
         <br/>
         * Cloud expertise (preferably Azure)
         <br/>
         * Experience with distributed SQL and NOSQL databases
         <br/>
         * Expertise with CI/CD workflows (preferably Github)
         <br/>
         * Ability to work with remote offshore teams
         <br/>
         Key Responsibilities
         <br/>
         • Lead and participate in the design and implementation of large and/or architecturally significant applications.
         <br/>
         • Champion company standards and best practices. Work to continuously improve software delivery processes and practices.
         <br/>
         • Build partnerships across the application, business and infrastructure teams.
         <br/>
         • Develop programming specifications. Design, code and unit test application code using Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) best practices.
         <br/>
         • Complete estimates and work plans independently as appropriate for design, development, implementation and rollout tasks.
         <br/>
         • Create technical system documentation and ensure that this documentation remains current throughout all phases of the SDLC.
         <br/>
         • Participate in all phases of system testing.
         <br/>
         • Communicate with the appropriate teams to ensure that assignments are managed appropriately and that completed assignments are of the highest quality.
         <br/>
         If you are interested, please send me your updated resume at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:Labrez.k@kksoftwareassociates.com" target="_self">
          Labrez.k@kksoftwareassociates.com
         </a>
         . Thank you so much.
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         𝗥𝗲𝗻𝗲𝘄 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗖𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗲𝗿: 𝘄𝗲𝗲𝗸𝗹𝘆 𝗷𝗼𝗯 𝗽𝗶𝗰𝗸
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Every Monday, we highlight exciting job opportunities within the Oil &amp; Gas, Renewable Energy, and Maritime industries. Explore new career horizons and kickstart your week with fresh possibilities!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗖𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗼𝗿𝘆 𝗟𝗲𝗮𝗱 𝗕𝘂𝘆𝗲𝗿 - 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀
         <br/>
         Are you an experienced procurement professional with a knack for strategic negotiation and contract management? Join the Offshore Energy Industry as a Category Lead Buyer - Process. You’ll negotiate long-term agreements with strategic partners to boost competitiveness and supply security. Key tasks include developing category strategies, market analyses, finalizing commercial agreements, and supporting vendor relationships.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝘙𝘦𝘲𝘶𝘪𝘳𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘴:
         <br/>
         - 10+ years in procurement, EPCI company experience preferred.
         <br/>
         - Strong negotiation and contract management skills.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗦𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗹 𝗛𝘂𝗹𝗹 𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿
         <br/>
         Are you a skilled engineer with expertise in structural analysis and design? We’re looking for a Structural Hull Engineer to design and verify the strength of tanker conversions and new build hulls for FPSO projects. You’ll support technology development, create 3D models and 2D drawings, and conduct offshore inspections.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝘙𝘦𝘲𝘶𝘪𝘳𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘴:
         <br/>
         - MSc/BSc in Offshore Structures/Naval Architecture.
         <br/>
         - 5+ years in structural design.
         <br/>
         - Knowledge of classification society rules and VBA programming.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Both positions are long-term contracting roles based in the Rotterdam area.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗦𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗷𝗲𝗰𝘁 𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿 - 𝗦𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗹
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Join
         <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/cosco-shipping-lines/">
          COSCO SHIPPING Europe
         </a>
         Heavy Transport as a Senior Project Engineer with a structural background. You’ll independently perform and organize engineering activities, prepare technical tender documents, and lead structural design for support and seafastening arrangements. This role involves regular travel and collaboration with global offices.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝘙𝘦𝘲𝘶𝘪𝘳𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘴:
         <br/>
         - Bachelor's degree in Naval Architecture or equivalent.
         <br/>
         - Significant experience in structural design.
         <br/>
         - Minimum 5 years in a similar role (2 years for Project Engineer).
         <br/>
         - Proficiency with AUTOCAD, GHS, and OCTOPUS software.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Discover detailed specifications and requirements on our newly launched website under the "Jobs" section!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Ready to take the next step? Explore our vacancies and apply today at 𝘄𝘄𝘄.𝗺𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁.𝗻𝗹/𝗷𝗼𝗯𝘀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=renewyourcareer&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7205810969942401025">
          #RenewYourCareer
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=weeklyjobpick&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7205810969942401025">
          #WeeklyJobPick

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
        Web inventor Tim Berners-Lee’s latest startup, Inrupt, has raised $30 million to further develop its data privacy technology, according to data from PitchBook. Inrupt is making software applications based on an open-source standard for protecting and sharing digital data called Solid that Berners-Lee created at MIT.
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         We are
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207373524435374080">
          #hiring
         </a>
         .
         <a data-attribute-index="1" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/clairvoyant-llc/">
          Clairvoyant
         </a>
         an
         <a data-attribute-index="3" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/exl-service/">
          EXL
         </a>
         Company is looking for Databricks Architect to work from Charlotte, NC. Interested applicants may share your resume to
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="mailto:divya.rao@exlservice.com" target="_self">
          divya.rao@exlservice.com
         </a>
         .
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🚀 Job Description 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         The Solutions Architect will lead the team in migrating existing data platform to modern data bricks/azure data platform. Establishing standards, governance, and automation.
         <br/>
         Qualifications:
         <br/>
         -- At least 7 years of Information Technology experience
         <br/>
         -- Hands on experience in architecting Cloud data solutions using Azure Synapse, Databricks, Python, PySpark, SQL
         <br/>
         -- Significant experience with Cloud Data lake technologies and complex data architecture and models
         <br/>
         -- Experience building and managing cloud data platforms.
         <br/>
         -- Strong experience in building data ingestion, data catalog and data analytics framework.
         <br/>
         -- End to end Cloud Data Lake architecture design &amp; implementation including data ingestion, data modeling and data distribution.
         <br/>
         -- Build data integrations between on-prem/cloud-based systems.
         <br/>
         -- Good experience in end-to-end implementation of data warehouse and data marts
         <br/>
         -- Experience and detailed knowledge with ETL, Data Quality, metadata management, Data Engineering, streaming data loads
         <br/>
         -- Experience designing and implementing complex solutions for distributed systems.
         <br/>
         -- Experience in leading and mentoring teams in onshore-offshore model.
         <br/>
         -- Good understanding of data warehousing concepts, data integration, data quality and data architecture
         <br/>
         -- Good to have experience in Snowflake
         <br/>
         -- Experience in Relational Modeling, Dimensional Modeling and Modeling of Unstructured Data
         <br/>
         -- Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL, Unix shell scripting
         <br/>
         -- Good understanding of Agile software development frameworks
         <br/>
         -- Strong communication and Analytical skills
         <br/>
         -- Ability to work in teams in a diverse, multi-stakeholder environment comprising of Business and Technology teams and be able to manage the stake holders
         <br/>
         -- Experience and desire to work in a global delivery environment
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=databricks&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207373524435374080">
          #databricks
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=architect&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207373524435374080">
          #architect
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=sql&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207373524435374080">
          #SQL
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=etl&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207373524435374080">
          #ETL
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="10" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=python&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207373524435374080">
          #python
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="11" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=pyspark&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7207373524435374080">
          #pyspark
         </a>
        </span>

  <div role="status">
   <!-- -->

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--1-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         We are
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7157434229461561345">
          #hiring
         </a>
         Director HR
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Apply by 01 Feb, 2024
         <br/>
         About the Company
         <br/>
         A software development company providing IT services in various sectors along with the latest technologies.
         <br/>
         Description
         <br/>
         Useful Information:
         <br/>
         Department: HRJob Type: Full time/ PermanentWork Location: Lahore, PakistanWorking Days/ Time: Mon - Fri (Flexible working Hours) Remuneration: Market Competitive Salary along with attractive benefits
         <br/>
         Key Purpose:
         <br/>
         We are looking on behalf of our client for the position of Director - HR who will be responsible for overseeing and performing all Human Resource functions at the Offshore office, in close coordination with management. These include recruiting, onboarding, orientation, employee engagement and other support activities related to Human Resources.
         <br/>
         Key Accountabilities:
         <br/>
         The Responsibilities of Director Human Resources (Offshore) include but are not limited to:
         <br/>
         Collaborate with senior leadership to understand the organization goals and strategy related to recruitment, employee engagement, and retention with specific focus on Offshore.
         <br/>
         Establish departmental SMART goals in line with the organizational strategy.
         <br/>
         Provide counselling and guidance to middle and front-line managers.
         <br/>
         Plan and participate in university job fairs for company branding and recruitment.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Oversee and implement performance management processes in collaboration with senior leaders.
         <br/>
         Facilitate and monitor the implementation of standardized human resource processes.
         <br/>
         Partner with various teams on workforce planning, employer branding and Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) initiatives.
         <br/>
         Work with technical leadership teams on Mentoring programs for the new hires.
         <br/>
         Facilitate documentation and follow-up of US H1-B and Visit-visa process.
         <br/>
         Plan and facilitate execution of employee training and professional development programs.
         <br/>
         Conduct employee exit interviews, share trends and action plans with the Management to proactively prevent voluntary attrition.
         <br/>
         Prepare and propose budget for various HR initiatives and get management approval.
         <br/>
         Work with various teams on planning and execution of the approved HR initiatives.
         <br/>
         Monitor industry trends of compensation and employee benefits, periodically prepare and share them with management, and propose changes in keeping with market trends.
         <br/>
         Conducting performance evaluations and providing feedback to team members.
         <br/>
         Perform other tasks as required
         <br/>
         Essential Qualifications:
         <br/>
         Education: Master’s degree in human resources or related field preferredProfessional Experience: Minimum 15 years of progressive experience in the HR department of an IT company / software house.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Detail
         <br/>
         Experience: 12 Years - 15 Years
         <br/>
         Salary: Rs. 250,000 - 450,000
         <br/>
         Distance from CEO: 2nd Level
         <br/>
         Reports To: Global Head HR
         <br/>
         Industry: Information Technology
         <br/>
         Location: Lahore
         <br/>
         Please DM for further detail
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hrjobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7157434229461561345">
          #hrjobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hrjob&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7157434229461561345">
          #hrjob
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hr&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7157434229461561345">
          #hr
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=lahorejobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7157434229461561345">
          #lahorejobs
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hrcareer&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7157434229461561345">
          #hrcareer
         </a>
        </span>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Swedium Global is the growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&amp;D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.
         <br/>
         Location: Sweden
         <br/>
         Expected Start date: 1st  November 2023
         <br/>
         Job Name: Experienced Electronics Engineer
         <br/>
         We are looking for an Experienced Electronics Engineer 7+years
         <br/>
         As a person you are curious and enthusiastic and is always looking to learn and take on new challenges. You have at least a few years’ experience within the field and are passionate about electronics. You are a team driven person with a positive mindset, and you love sharing ideas and knowledge with others around you.
         <br/>
         You have a passion for product development, from first idea to when you stand with the product in your hand. You like to challenge old truths and to develop new innovative products.
         <br/>
         Finally, and most important of all, you love to be part of a creative and happy team that delivers extraordinary products.
         <br/>
         What you’ll do here:
         <br/>
         As an electronic engineer you will work with product development in areas such as network cameras, network speakers and access systems.
         <br/>
         In our project teams we work close together with mechanical engineers, firmware developers and many other internal functions such as quality, production, and sourcing. You will be responsible for the electronic design in your product which includes schematics design, component selection including supplier contacts, testing, production support and certifications. You are part of the project all the way from concept phase until the product is delivered to the market.
         <br/>
         Together with you, we will find the best suited opportunity within our teams.
         <br/>
         Reach out
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:nikitha.n@swediumglobal.com" target="_self">
          nikitha.n@swediumglobal.com
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

      <button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Open control menu for post by Anurag Bhandari" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember5827" tabindex="0" type="button">

   <!-- -->
   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         𝐌𝐚𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐦𝐨𝐧𝐞𝐲 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐧-𝐬𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐜𝐞 𝐬𝐨𝐟𝐭𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐞 📖 💰
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Listening to the Syntax podcast episode "What Open Source license should you use?" on my morning walk today triggered in me an important realization - I am so incredibly fortunate to be working for a company devoted to the open-source ways of creating software.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         When I was in college, I was frequently embroiled in debates over closed vs. open source software. People often argued that open-source was a nice &amp; structured way to create high-quality hobby software and that proprietary/patented (closed-source) software was the only way to make serious money.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         15 years later, I can proudly say not only were they wrong they certainly didn't see coming the ubiquitousness of open-source software. All big closed-source software companies - Microsoft, HP, Apple, Adobe, you name it - are both using and producing notable open-source apps &amp; libraries. Almost all new cool app startups offer both open-source and enterprise editions of their apps (this business model has a name - open core - I did a podcast on it some time ago).
         <br/>
         <br/>
         So, to work at a company that had open-source as one of its founding values is a dream come true for me. From Automattic's website:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         "We believe in Open Source and the vast majority of our work is available under the GPL. We proudly dedicate 5% of our time to the open source WordPress Project."
         <br/>
         <br/>
         𝗛𝗮𝘃𝗲 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗯𝗲𝗲𝗻 𝗽𝗮𝗶𝗱 𝘁𝗼 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸 𝗼𝗻 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻-𝘀𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗰𝗲 𝘀𝗼𝗳𝘁𝘄𝗮𝗿𝗲?
         <br/>
         <br/>
         P.S. One interesting insight from today's podcast was the Functional Source License (FSL), a solution to prevent competitors from shamelessly copying an open-source product and at the same time encouraging companies to innovate rapidly before their software becomes open source.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=automattic&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7213421688280031233">
          #automattic
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=closedsource&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7213421688280031233">
          #closedsource
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=license&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7213421688280031233">
          #license
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=opencore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7213421688280031233">
          #opencore
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=opensource&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7213421688280031233">
          #opensource
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Cross-posted from
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://lnkd.in/g6HtSa2P" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/g6HtSa2P
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

      <span>
       …more
      </span>
     </button>

       <ul class="display-flex">
        <li class="social-details-social-counts__item social-details-social-counts__reactions social-details-social-counts__reactions--left-aligned">

     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">

      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         We are
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7208537406810054656">
          #hiring
         </a>
         . Clairvoyant - an EXL Company is looking for a Solutions Architect (Fulltime only) in New York, USA.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🚀 Job Description: 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Solutions Architect
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Qualifications:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         -At least 7 years of Information Technology experience
         <br/>
         -Hands on experience in architecting Cloud data solutions using Azure Synapse, Databricks, Python, PySpark, SQL
         <br/>
         -Significant experience with Cloud Data lake technologies and complex data architecture and models
         <br/>
         -Experience building and managing cloud data platforms.
         <br/>
         -Strong experience in building data ingestion, data catalog and data analytics framework.End to end Cloud Data Lake architecture design &amp; implementation including data ingestion, data modeling and data distribution.
         <br/>
         -Build data integrations between on-prem/cloud-based systems.
         <br/>
         -Good experience in end-to-end implementation of data warehouse and data marts
         <br/>
         -Experience and detailed knowledge with ETL, Data Quality, metadata management, Data Engineering, streaming data loads
         <br/>
         -Experience designing and implementing complex solutions for distributed systemsExperience in leading and mentoring teams in onshore-offshore model.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Preferred Qualifications:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         -Good understanding of data warehousing concepts, data integration, data quality and data architecture
         <br/>
         -Good to have experience in Snowflake
         <br/>
         -Experience in Relational Modeling, Dimensional Modeling and Modeling of Unstructured Data
         <br/>
         -Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL, Unix shell scripting
         <br/>
         -Good understanding of Agile software development frameworks
         <br/>
         -Strong communication and Analytical skills
         <br/>
         -Ability to work in teams in a diverse, multi-stakeholder environment comprising of Business and Technology teams and be able to manage the stake holders
         <br/>
         -Experience and desire to work in a global delivery environment
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=solutionsarchitect&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7208537406810054656">

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         IM LOOKING FOR A GREAT IT PROJECT MANAGER with 5+ years experience!
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Experience with implementing NetSuite and or Microsoft Dynamics a huge plus! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Do you know anyone that may be interested?
         <br/>
         email me directly at
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:msuarez@appleone.com" target="_self">
          msuarez@appleone.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         I'm seeking an IT Project Manager with a focus on application development to be part of our team on a contract basis.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         About company
         <br/>
         Company has been a leader in emergency medical transportation insurance since 1974. They are not just a company – they are a close-knit team dedicated to "Protecting families with compassion when others don't." Our professional yet friendly company culture fosters collaboration, innovation, and a clear mission that resonates through every role as we support our expanding base of 2+ million members across the United States and the Caribbean.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What You Will Do
         <br/>
         Reporting to our Director of IT Applications, you will play a pivotal role in the successful delivery of large-scale ERP and CRM implementations and other projects as they arise.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Your main responsibilities will include:
         <br/>
         ·      Project Planning: Develop and manage project plans, collaborating closely with various functional teams to ensure a streamlined project execution process.
         <br/>
         ·      Implementation Mastery: Take charge of implementing project plans, coordinating with product and technology managers, and overseeing day-to-day activities for smooth project execution.
         <br/>
         ·      Strategic Planning: Assist senior management in ensuring that projects stay on track, meeting resource, time-to-market, and budgetary constraints.
         <br/>
         ·      Best Practices: Implement best practice product management methodologies, identify and manage program risks, track issues, and hold teams accountable for their commitments.
         <br/>
         ·      Effective Communication: Define and maintain processes for transparent communication with stakeholders and senior management regarding project status, issues, and risks.
         <br/>
         ·      SDLC Adherence: Ensure adherence to standard software development life cycle (SDLC) methodologies and critical project documentation.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What They Need From You
         <br/>
         They are looking for:
         <br/>
         ·      5+ years of experience as an IT Project Manager, leading large-scale ERP and CRM implementations.
         <br/>
         ·      A knack for being nimble, creative problem solving, and independent thinking in a highly dynamic environment.
         <br/>
         ·      Proficient in collaborating with offshore development teams.
         <br/>
         ·      Working knowledge and practical experience with waterfall and agile methodologies.
         <br/>
         ·      Effective verbal and written communication skills.
         <br/>
         ·      Comfortable providing clear and concise updates to senior leadership.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         What They Provide You
         <br/>
         ·      A fully remote position based within the Eastern United States.
         <br/>
         ·      A professional and friendly company culture that supports a clear mission: "Protecting families with compassion when others don’t."
         <br/>
         ·      An opportunity to unleash your expertise and create a lasting impact on our journey of growth and success!
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>

         </a>

         <br/>
         Company Information:
         <br/>
         InfoDigita Technologies is a dynamic IT firm dedicated to delivering groundbreaking solutions on offshore projects. With a strong focus on innovation and technological advancement, we are committed to fostering a collaborative and growth-oriented work environment.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         We are looking for a specialist in Flutter. You must be available full time. Being able to work in CET hours will be a plus. Skill requirements are below.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Technical requirements:
         <br/>
         Be able to write concise, well-documented code
         <br/>
         Have two or more iOS/Android apps developed with Flutter.
         <br/>
         Experience with third-party libraries and APIs;
         <br/>
         Experience with Git, Jenkins, or other version control tools;
         <br/>
         Ability to write readable code, create extensive documentation for existing code, and refactor the previously written code into readable state.
         <br/>
         5+ years in mobile software development;
         <br/>
         Java/Swift experience; (Preferred)
         <br/>
         Follows Dart-guidelines (
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://lnkd.in/dp9dnf_d" target="_self">
          https://lnkd.in/dp9dnf_d
         </a>
         )
         <br/>
         Must have experience with Agile development
         <br/>
         <br/>

         <br/>
         Good time management
         <br/>
         Team work
         <br/>
         Problem - solving
         <br/>
         Keep your commitment
         <br/>
         Follow the company guidelines and possess basic social skills
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Benefits:
         <br/>
         2 Weekends
         <br/>
         Lunch
         <br/>
         Yearly salary review
         <br/>
         Tea and coffee (unlimited)
         <br/>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         Hello Everyone,
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Greetings from Wilco Source - A CitiusTech Company.
         <br/>
         Our Offshore team is hiring! We are expanding our teams and looking for new talent. Check out the details below:
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Position: Sr. Salesforce Project Manager
         <br/>
         Location: Hyderabad | Chennai
         <br/>
         Mode: Full-Time
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Skills and Experience
         <br/>
         · 10+ years of experience in Agile Software development as a Project or Program Manager
         <br/>
         · Experience leading projects consisting of 10 or more people, or $1MM+ in budget.
         <br/>
         · Must have executed at least 5 full life cycle, end-to-end Salesforce implementations.
         <br/>
         · Experience in all phases of product, software, and testing lifecycles
         <br/>
         · Ability to serve as a liaison between both business and technical teams to drive effective, timely solutions that fulfil both strategic and operational needs.
         <br/>
         · Strong and effective communication skills: Ability to lead and communicate with a wide variety of team members and client roles + drive clarity on roles and accountability.
         <br/>
         · Strong logical and analytical problem-solving skills; a rigorous approach to project management to deliver enterprise-level projects in ambiguous environments.
         <br/>
         · Extensive experience leading all Agile ceremonies including sprint grooming, planning, stand-ups, reviews/demos, and retrospectives.
         <br/>
         · Strong track record of proficiency in Agile implementations using JIRA with the ability to quickly drive numerous high-quality releases into production.
         <br/>
         · A history of mentoring and/or teaching others around work plan development, progress tracking, time tracking, status reporting, financial and risk management
         <br/>
         · Experience creating Road Maps that provide clients with a vision of their implementation and helping them to transform their business processes be executing against those roadmaps.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         please send your updated resume to #
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="mailto:harinik@wilcosource.com" target="_self">
          harinik@wilcosource.com
         </a>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=salesforcecertified&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7160939184545763328">
          #salesforcecertified
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=projectmanager&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7160939184545763328">
          #projectmanager
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=sfdc&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7160939184545763328">
          #sfdc
         </a>
        </span>
       </span>

       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         [Binh Thanh - Ho Chi Minh] 🔻
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software_engineer&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #Software_Engineer
         </a>
         🔻 (
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=product&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #Product
         </a>
         )
         <br/>
         2 Vacancies:
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=leader_level&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #Leader_level
         </a>
         (
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=japanese&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #Japanese
         </a>
         N3 ~ N2)
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=staff_level&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #Staff_level
         </a>
         (
         <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=english&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #English
         </a>
         )
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Japanese construction company is looking for Software Engineer, who will cooperate with Project Leader to build internal and external systems at an offshore base of an engineering company
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ===================
         <br/>
         🔷JOB DESCRIPTION
         <br/>
         &lt;Main Responsibilities&gt;
         <br/>
         Design the system according to the project leader's instructions
         <br/>
         <br/>
         &lt;Development example&gt;
         <br/>
         ・Database of equipment construction related parts
         <br/>
         ・Systems used for electrical work, IT infrastructure work, etc.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🔷REQUIREMENTS:
         <br/>
         &lt;Language/Experience&gt;
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=leader&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #Leader
         </a>
         <br/>
         ・日本語：N3〜N2レベル（日本本社とやり取りができるレベル）
         <br/>
         ・実務経験：3〜6年程度
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=staff&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #Staff
         </a>
         <br/>
         ・About 3 years experience
         <br/>
         ・Able to communicate in English
         <br/>
         <br/>
         &lt;IT skills&gt;
         <br/>
         ・Development language:
         <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=java&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #Java
         </a>
         , #C#,
         <a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=python&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #Python
         </a>
         , Android,
         <a data-attribute-index="10" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=javascript&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #JavaScript
         </a>
         , etc.
         <br/>
         ・Database: SQL Server, Oracle, etc.
         <br/>
         ・Cloud:
         <a data-attribute-index="11" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=aws&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #AWS
         </a>
         ,
         <a data-attribute-index="12" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=azure&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7185510830384332800">
          #Azure
         </a>
         , GCP (Google Cloud Platform), etc.
         <br/>
         ・Low code: Outsystems, ServiceNow, M365, etc.
         <br/>
         *You can apply even if your main experience is only one above.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         &lt;Development example&gt;
         <br/>
         ・Database of equipment construction related parts
         <br/>
         ・Systems used for electrical work, IT infrastructure work, etc.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         ===================

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--2-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         We are
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hiring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7184209468434354176">
          #hiring
         </a>
         . Clairvoyant - an EXL Company is looking for a Lead Data Engineer (Fulltime only) in Foster City, CA, USA.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         🚀 Job Description: 🚀
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Role: Lead Data Engineer
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Job Description:
         <br/>
         •       8+ years of experience in software development and delivery.
         <br/>
         •       5+ of relevant work experience on large scale Data applications.
         <br/>
         •       Experience working (or willing to work) with distributed teams in different time zones and offshore teams.
         <br/>
         •       Experience building streaming data pipelines using event-based models.
         <br/>
         •       Strong SQL skills.
         <br/>
         •       Experience with programming in languages Python, and scripting tools like Bash, KSH.
         <br/>
         •       Good aptitude, strong problem-solving abilities, and analytical skills, ability to take ownership as appropriate.
         <br/>
         •       Should be able to do coding, debugging, performance tuning, and deploying apps to a Production environment.
         <br/>
         •       Should have good working experience in the bellow technologies and languages:
         <br/>
         o  Hadoop ecosystem (HDFS, Hive, Yarn, File formats like Avro/Parquet)
         <br/>
         o  Kafka
         <br/>
         o  Spark Streaming
         <br/>
         o  PySpark
         <br/>
         o  Airflow
         <br/>
         •       Good understanding of Design Patterns in software architecture.
         <br/>
         •       Experience working in Agile Methodology.
         <br/>
         •       Ability to learn and help the team learn new technologies quickly.
         <br/>
         •       Take up the complete planning/design/implementation/UAT/delivery of the project.
         <br/>
         •       Excellent communication and coordination skills.
         <br/>
         •       Knowledgeable (and preferred hands-on).
         <br/>
         •       UNIX environments, different continuous integration tools.
         <br/>
         •       Must be able to integrate quickly into the team and work independently towards team goals.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Responsibilities:
         <br/>
         •       Take the complete responsibility of the project execution.
         <br/>
         •       Be accountable for the delivery of the project in the defined timelines with good quality.
         <br/>
         •       Define and follow the processes for project execution and delivery.
         <br/>
         •       Drive and motivate the team to be agile and follow agile methodology.
         <br/>
         •       Guide the team technically and give the team a direction on how to plan, design, implement, and deliver the projects.
         <br/>
         •       Define the architecture and discuss the pros-cons of the same with the team.
         <br/>
         •       Involve the team during the brainstorming sessions as appropriate.
         <br/>
         •       Work with other team leads to get the architecture reviewed.
         <br/>
         •       Keep all the stakeholders updated about the project status/risks/issues if there are any.
         <br/>
         •       Work closely with the management wherever and whenever required, to ensure smooth execution and delivery of the project.
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>

   <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper mr2" style="" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--3-lines" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="update-components-text relative update-components-update-v2__commentary" dir="ltr">
      <!-- -->
      <span class="break-words tvm-parent-container">
       <!-- -->
       <span>
        <span class="text-view-model" dir="ltr">
         <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=uscitizens&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7087825846526234624">
          #uscitizens
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=greencard&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7087825846526234624">
          #greencard
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=salesforcedeveloper&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7087825846526234624">
          #salesforcedeveloper
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=contracttohire&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7087825846526234624">
          #contracttohire
         </a>
         <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=c2hrequirements&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7087825846526234624">
          #c2hrequirements
         </a>
         <br/>
         We looking for an independent visa candidate for our new Contract to Hire position, Please refer to the job description and let me know your interest, Thanks.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Title: Principal SalesForce Developer
         <br/>
         Location: Minneapolis MN (Prefers local candidates)
         <br/>
         Location: 6+ Months (Contract to Hire)
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Overview
         <br/>
         Provide senior technical leadership in areas of design, development, and support of our Salesforce implementation. This individual will provide technical oversight for a variety of projects, architecture, and integration support, along with developing strategies to ensure high availability/performance to meet customer demands. In addition, the position will involve hands-on application and tools development for complex software projects to deliver high-quality, cost-effective solutions aligning with company objectives.
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Summary of Accountabilities:
         <br/>
         Provide expertise and hands-on direction to strategic projects:
         <br/>
         Provide day-to-day technical guidance and direction to developers
         <br/>
         Share and adhere to industry best practices through ongoing research, benchmarking, professional organizations, and conferences.
         <br/>
         Provide leadership and support of offshore delivery
         <br/>
         Provide leadership in process improvement initiatives
         <br/>
         All other duties as assigned
         <br/>
         <br/>
         Qualifications
         <br/>
         MS in Computer Science preferred
         <br/>
         15+ years in any combination of senior design, development and analysis roles
         <br/>
         Works without supervision with complete latitude for independent judgment.
         <br/>
         Ability to distill complex technical challenges and problems into meaningful work objects
         <br/>
         Recognized as expert in field, knowledgeable of emerging trends and industry practices a broad working knowledge of information technology
         <br/>
         Salesforce Specific:
         <br/>
         Understand key technical Salesforce aspects like:
         <br/>
         Data migrations, data quality
         <br/>
         Systems integrations (including APIs) with other systems
         <br/>
         3rd party applications, AppExchange products, and custom code.
         <br/>
         Develop Apex (classes and triggers), Aura Components and Lightening Web Components to extend Salesforce in order to support business requirements.
         <br/>
         7+ years experience with Salesforce development
        </span>
       </span>
      </span>
     </div>
